entry.title: 百词斩高中复习第三轮20190508
entry.content: 复习conclusion n.结论，推论I finally drew a conclusion from these facts.我终于从这些因素中得出了一条结论。 panic n.慌乱v.使…惊慌失措After she fell, she reached for her shoes in a panic.跌倒之后她慌张地捡起了鞋子。 district n.地区，区域The city has four districts.这座城市由四个区域组成。 abrupt adj.突然的，鲁莽的The abrupt bang gave him a fright.气球突然爆炸，把他吓了一跳。 fade vi.逐渐消失adj.乏味的vt.使褪色The trees were fading away into the mist.树渐渐消失在薄雾中。 corporation n.企业，公司In our corporation, we listen to everyone’s opinion.在我们公司，我们会听取所有人的意见。 wipe v.擦The woman is wiping the mirror with a rag.这个女人正在用抹布擦拭镜子。 patent n.专利adj.显然的，明显的，独创的v.取得…的专利权The maker of this vehicle claimed a patent on the design of the first car.这辆车的制造者申请了首辆汽车的设计专利。 widow n.寡妇，遗孀v.使成寡妇This widow is reading letters from her late husband.这个寡妇正在读她已故丈夫写的信。 substitute v.代替n.代替着，代用品，替补队员You should substitute fruits for sweets.你应该用水果代替甜食。 elect v.选举，推选，选择We elect our next leader by voting.我们通过投票来选举下一任领导。 dizzy adj.眩晕的，头晕目眩的，头晕眼花的vt.使头晕目眩I felt so dizzy that I went to the hospital.我头太晕了，所以我去看医生。 resign v.辞职After much consideration, the employeee resigned from his job.深思熟虑后，这位员工辞职了。 desire n.渴望，要求vi.有希望，期望，愿望vt.请求，要求The cat is filled with the desire to eat the fish.这只猫心里充满了吃掉这条鱼的渴望。 climate n.气候，（社会思想等）趋势Climates differ from place to place, and from season to season.气候随着地域和季节的不同而变化。 nutrition n.营养，营养学Having balanced nutrition is important to maintain a healthy body.营养均衡对于维持身体健康很重要。 volcano n.火山Watch out - the volcano is about to erupt!小心！火山要喷发了！ noble adj.贵族的，高贵的n.贵族The women in the expensive dresses come from a noble family.这些穿着昂贵衣服的女人出身高贵。 distinguish v.区别，识别，辨别，使显著It’s easy to distinguish the blue man from the gray men.很容易就能把小蓝人从小灰人中辨别出来。 punish v.惩罚，处罚Her husband was punished for doing something wrong.她老公因为做错了事，受到了惩罚。 expedition n.探险，短途旅行They went on a mountain expedition.他们去山上探险。 reputation n.声誉，名声He has a good reputation among sportsmen, since he always wins.因为经常赢得比赛，所以他在体育圈里有很高的声誉。 cheat v.作弊，欺骗，哄骗，蒙骗n.骗子，骗术The man cheated in the card game.那个男人在打牌时作弊。 forecast n.预测，预报v.预报，预测The forecast shows that things are going up!预测显示形势在好转。 accurate adj.精确的，正确的，符合标准的I never miss my target because my aim is so accurate.我从未失手，因为我妙得很准。 ambition n.雄心，强烈欲望，抱负，（具体的）追求目标This powerful man’s political ambition was to unify the three kingdoms.作为一个有权势的男人，他的政治雄心是一统三国。 gather v.聚集，集合，收集，采集，推测n.聚集，衣服的褶子The students gathered on the playground.学生们在操场上集合。 clerk n.办事员The bank clerk is working behind the counter.银行职员正在柜台后面办公。 tale n.故事，叙述，传说v.谈论，讲述，搬弄是非Most little girls love to read fairy tales.很多小女孩都喜欢读童话故事。 fierce adj.凶猛的，激烈的Male animals can be fierce when they fight over females.当雄性动物为了雌性动物而打架时，它们会变得异常凶猛。 appreciation n.感激，欣赏，鉴识，评价My dog expressed its appreciation of the food I gave it.我的狗狗对我给它提供的食物表示感谢。 ankle n.踝，踝关节I hurt my ankle when I was running down the stairs.我跑下楼时把脚踝伤到了。 severe adj.严酷的，剧烈的It’s hard for people to walk in these severe weather conditions.人们在如此严酷的天气下行走很困难。 urgent adj.急迫的，紧迫的He needed urgent attention, so we called an ambulance.他需要急救，于是我们叫了救护车。 properly adv.适当地It’s important to sit properly at your desk.正确地坐在桌前很重要。 clarify v.阐明，澄清The son has to clarify what he wrote for his father.儿子需要把他写的东西给爸爸阐明。 tutor n.家庭教师，指导教师v.当…家庭教师The tutor is helping the little boy with his homework.这个家庭教师正在辅导小男孩的功课。 diploma n.毕业文凭，毕业证书I finally got my college diploma when I graduated.毕业的时候，我终于拿到了大学毕业证书。 annoy v.使烦恼，使生气He annoys me by talking all the time.他一直说个不停，烦死了。 stress n.压力，节拍vt.给…加压力She is under a lot of stress with her work.她在工作中承受着很大的压力。 garage n.修车厂，车库I took my car to the garage to be repaired.我把车送到了修车厂去修理。 ease v.缓解，顺利进出n.不拘束To ease her daily stress, she likes to practice yoga.她喜欢通过练瑜伽来缓解日常压力。 spread v.伸开，伸展，散步，传播，摊开，覆盖n.伸开，伸展，散步，传播，摊开，范围Spread the butter evenly to all parts of the bread.将黄油均匀地涂抹到面包的各个部分。 exhibition n.展览，展览会，奖学金The art gallery had an exhibition of my photos.这个艺术画廊举办了我的影视作品展。 harmful adj.有害的Smoking is harmful to your health.吸烟对你的健康有害。 friction n.摩擦，摩擦力The friction heats up the wood and starts a fire.摩擦力使得火柴着了起来。 joy n.欢乐，喜悦，乐事The old man is sitting on the stairs with a look of joy.这个老人面带喜悦地坐在阶梯上。 deserve v.值得，应得，应受She deserves such a high ranking because of her popularity.以她的高人气，她应该得到这样的名次。 dessert n.甜点Do you want to have some ice cream for dessert?你想来一些冰激凌当甜点吗？ welfare n.福利The organization aims to improve the welfare of animals.这个组织旨在提升动物福利。 contrary adj.相反的，对立的，矛盾的，叛逆的The lady and the man hold contrary views.这位女士和男士持有相反的意见。 prejudice n.偏见，损害vt.使抱偏见Some people had a prejudice against black people in the past.过去人们对黑人有偏见。 skeptical adj.表示怀疑的He told me he can fly, but of course I’m skeptical.他告诉我他可以飞，不过当然我表示怀疑。 diverse adj.不同的，差异的，多种多样的I can see diverse colors on their hands.在他们手上我能看到各种各样的颜色。 reasonable adj.合理的，通情达理的The snacks are sold at a reasonable price.这些零食售价十分合理。 correspond v.通信，相符，一致We correspond by email to stay in touch.我们靠电子邮件来保持联系。 grain n.谷物种子，谷物，少量v.使成粒状Grains like wheat are used to make bread.像小麦这样的谷物是用来做面包的。 theory n.理论，原理That student is interested in all kinds of science theories.那孩子对各种科学理论都感兴趣。 telescope n.望远镜vi.缩短adj.套筒的，伸缩式的vt.使套入You can see many distant stars through the telescope.通过望远镜，你可以看到许多遥远的星星。 achieve v.完成，达到，获得，实现I finally achieved my goal of winning the race.我赢了跑步比赛，终于达成了我的目标。 burden n.负担，重担v.使负重，装载，烦扰Our burden is too heavy, because we have too much homework.我们的负担太重了，因为每天都有很多作业。 frequent adj.时常的，频繁的Her frequent online shopping costs her a lot of money.频繁地网上购物花了她很多钱。 aware adj.意识到的，知道的He suddenly became aware of how to figure out the problem.他突然知道该怎么解决这道难题了。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习第三轮20190507
entry.content: 复习burglar n.窃贼The burglar is trying to break into the house.窃贼正试图闯进这个家。 controversial adj.引起争论的，有争议的The couple is discussing a controversial topic.这对夫妇正在讨论一个争议性话题。 acquaintance n.熟人，相识的人，认识They are acquaintances because they have been neighbors for many years.他们是老相识，因为她们做了许多年邻居。 lecture n.讲演，讲课v.讲演，向…讲演He gave a lecture in front of many people.他在很多人面前发表了演讲。 flee v.逃离，避开，逃走，（时间）飞逝He wants to flee from danger.他想要逃离危险。 casual adj.随便的n.临时工She prefers casual cloting when hanging out on the street.在街上闲逛时，她偏好休闲的穿着。 astonish v.使惊讶，使吃惊The magic astonished the kids.整个魔术使孩子们感到很吃惊。 fond adj.喜欢的，喜爱的，溺爱的，精神错乱的v.显出钟爱之情The man is very fond of his horse.这位男士很喜欢他的马。 yard n.院，场地，码What a large yard! We can have a barbecue.这个院子真大！我们可以来个烧烤。 collar n.项圈，衣服，轴环v.抓住，为…戴上项圈，为…上领子I put a collar on my dog to prevent him getting lost.我给我的狗狗带上项圈是为了防止他走丢。 contradictory adj.反驳的，自相矛盾的n.矛盾的事物，矛盾因素These signs are contradictory - I can’t obey them both.这些标志是矛盾的，我不能同时遵守它们。 fuel n.燃料v.给…加燃料A vehicle can run with fuel.一辆汽车有了燃料就可以行使。 persuade v.说服，劝说，使相信The salesman is persuading us to buy a car.这个销售员在劝我们买辆车。 defense n.防御，防护The best defense is a good attack!最好的防御就是一记好的攻击！ scold v.怒骂，责骂，训斥The mother scolds her child.那位母亲斥责她的小孩。 damage v.毁坏n.损害Oh no! My car was badly damaged after hitting the tree.噢不！我的车在撞上树后严重损坏了。 deliberately adv.故意地，慢条斯理地He put a leg out to deliberately make the man fall.他故意伸出一条腿绊倒老人。 curious adj.好奇的，好管闲事的The cats are curious about what’s behind the door.小猫们对门后面是什么很好奇。 discrimination n.歧视，偏见He shows discrimination between the poor and rich.他嫌贫爱富。 argue v.争吵The boy is arguing with his mother.男孩在和妈妈争吵。 regular adj.有规律的，定期的，经常的，匀称的n.正式队员We have a regular meeting on every Monday morning.我们每个星期一早晨都会有例会。 reach v.够得着，抵达n.范围，影响力The baby boy is trying to reach for the red ball.小宝宝正努力伸手去够红球。 scar n.伤疤，伤痕，内心创伤v.（给…）留下伤痕There is a lightening-shaped scar on his forehead.他额头上有一道闪电形的伤疤。 rigid adj.坚硬的，死板的Buildings made from steel tend to be very rigid.钢筋建构的房屋非常牢固。 mild adj.味淡的，轻微的Compared to the spicy hot pot, the chicken soup is milder.和麻辣火锅相比，鸡汤味道要清淡许多。 preserve v.保护It’s our duty to preserve our environment together.齐心协力保护环境是我们的责任。 stove n.炉，火炉，电炉Turn off the stove, or the food will be overcooked.快把炉子关掉，不然食物要烧焦了。 stain v.弄脏,沾污，染色n.污渍，污迹The man’s cloting is stained with the boy’s cola.男孩喷出的可乐把他的衣服弄脏了。 afford v.买得起Finally, I can afford this car.我终于买得起这辆车了。 chaos n.混乱，纷乱This kitchen is in chaos!厨房里一片狼藉！ consensus n.一致同意，合意We reached a consensus in the end.最后我们统一了意见。 collision n.碰撞，冲突A black car is in collision with a red car.黑车与红车相撞了。 abandon v.抛弃，放弃The mother has abandoned her baby.这个母亲抛弃了她的孩子。 influence n.影响，势力v.影响Stop smoking! It will have a bad influence on your child.别抽烟了！孩子会受你影响！ fiction n.虚构，想象I like science fiction movies with spaceships.我喜欢有太空飞船的科幻片。 agenda n.议事日程The meeting’s agenda still needs to be written.会议议程还需要写下来。 seize v.抓住，逮捕，夺取They seized one another by the wrist.他们抓住了对方的手腕。 triangle n.三角形She drew a triangle with a black pen.她用黑笔画了一个三角形。 spare adj.备用的，多余的，闲置的n.零件，备件v.抽出，腾出I have a spare tire for my car.我的车有一个备胎。 fortunate adj.幸运的He won the lottery! How fortunate!他中了彩票！多幸运啊！ calm adj.平静的，镇静的n.平静，安宁v.（使）平静，（使）镇定She is so calm although the endless work bothers her.尽管工作不胜其烦，但她依然淡定如山。 anxious adj.忧虑的，担心的，焦急的The boy is anxious about the exam.考试让小男孩很焦虑。 predict v.预言，预告，预测The magician pretended to be able to predict the future through the crystal ball.这位魔术师假装能够通过水晶球预测未来。 challenging adj.具有挑战性的，引起挑战性兴趣的The bike trick he’s attempting is extremely challenging!他正尝试的自行车特技真是相当的具有挑战性啊！ tournament n.锦标赛，联赛The basketball tournament will end with a single winner.这次篮球联赛会只有一个获胜队伍。 mentally adv.精神上，智力上，心理上She looks as if she is mentally tired.她看起来精神疲惫。 merry adj.欢乐的，愉快的The girls felt merry and happy at the party.在派对上这些女孩儿感到愉快高兴。 debate n.辩论，讨论v.辩论，议论The debate between the man and the woman is so fierce.这个男人和这个女人间的辩论太激烈了。 particular adj.特别的，不寻常的n.详细情况You should pay particular attention to spelling.你需要特别注意你的拼写。 satisffaction n.满足，满意，乐事，补偿I gave their service a good rating to show my satisfaction.我给了好评，来表示我对他们的服务很满意。 campaign n.（社会性、政治性）活动，运动v.从事活动，参加活动Many people came to support the president’s campaign.很多人都来这儿支持总统的竞选活动。 envelope n.信封，包装物，外壳，膜，气囊The sender put the letter into the red envelope.寄信的人把信放在了红色信封里。 consideration n.体贴，体谅，顾及，考虑，思考She shows a lot of consideration for her mother.她很体贴她的母亲。 tent n.帐篷The couple put up a tent beside the river.那对夫妇在河边支起了帐篷。 precious adj.珍贵的，宝贵的The crown is decorated with precious diamonds.这个皇冠上装饰着珍贵的钻石。 atmosphere n.大气层，空气The atmosphere can protect the earth from solar rays.大气层可以保护地球免受太阳射线的伤害。 obtain v.获得，赢的，取得The policeman is obtaining evidence from the crime scene.警察正在犯罪现场取证。 tolerate v.忍受，容忍They have to tolerate the smell in the elevator.他们不得不忍受电梯里的臭味。 recreation n.娱乐活动，消遣Old people like to play mah-jong for recreation.老年人喜欢玩麻将来作为消遣。 ambassador n.（特命全权）大使“Our country wished to have peace” said the ambassador.“我们国家渴望和平”大使说道。 section n.部分v.划分The chart has five sections in different colors.图表有颜色不同的五个部分。 qualification n.资格证明，条件，限制性条件I’m delighted that I received this qualification from my university.拿到了大学毕业证，我很开心。 academic adj.学术的，学院的，大学的n.学者They are having an academic meeting about physics.他们正在开一个物理领域的学术会议。 gale n.狂风，一阵（笑声）A sudden gale almost knocked me down.一阵狂风差点把我吹倒。 scissors n.剪刀He uses scissors to cut his hair.他用剪刀给自己剪头发。 disadvantage n.不利，不利地位，弱点The one ant is at a disadvantage against so many others.这一只蚂蚁在和其他许多蚂蚁的对抗中处于劣势。 acid n.【化学】酸adj.含酸过多的Make sure not to touch the acid - it will burn.千万不要去碰酸，它会灼伤你。 cuisine n.菜肴What kind of cuisine does this restaurant serve？这家饭店提供哪种菜肴？ avenue n.林荫道，道路This long avenue leads to a big country house.这条长林荫道通往一栋巨大的乡间别墅。 corrupt v.贿赂，使腐败，变腐败，堕落adj.腐败的He is trying to corrupt the man with money.他想用钱贿赂这个人。 dull adj.枯燥的，沉闷的The TV show is so dull that makes him want to sleep.电视节目无趣地让他想睡觉。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习第三轮20190506
entry.content: 复习fasten v.扎牢，扣住We should all fasten our seat belts before I start the car.在开车之前，我们都应该系牢安全带。 routine n.常规，例行公事，一套固定舞步（或动作）adj.例行的，普通的，惯例的This is the girl’s daily routine.这是小女孩每天都要做的事。 conceited adj.自负的，自高自大的He’s so conceited! He always thinks he’s better than others.这个男人很自负，他总以为他自己比别人更好。 raw adj.生的，未煮过的，未加工的The beef on the wooden board is raw.木板上的牛肉是生的。 awesome adj.极好的，棒极了的，引起敬畏的，可怕的His surfing skills are truly awesome!他的冲浪技术实在是非常好。 arbitrary adj.随意的，任性的，随心所欲的It’s an arbitrary way to make decisions by coins.抛硬币做决定是一种随意的方式。 regret vt.懊悔，后悔n.后悔，遗憾I really regret not finishing school.我好后悔没有完成学业。 centigrade n.摄氏度adj.百分度的The flower grows well at 25 degrees centigrade.花在25摄氏度的环境下生长的很好。 accent n.口音，腔调，重音符号v.重读He has such a funny accent!他的口音太搞笑了。 seldom adv.很少，不常It seldom rains in the desert.沙漠里很少下雨。 purchase v.购买n.购买，所购之物The shirt is so cheap that I really want to purchase it!这件T恤太便宜了，我想买。 acute adj.（疼痛、妒忌等）剧烈的，严重的I have a very acute, sharp pain in my stomach.我的胃有一阵剧烈的疼痛。 adore v.很喜欢，极喜欢It’s obvious that one elephant adores the other.很明显，那头小象喜欢另一头小象。 mature adj.成熟的vi.成熟vt.使成熟She looks mature with heavy make-up.她化着浓妆，看起来很成熟。 vice n.恶习，罪行Sleeping late is a vice.睡懒觉是一种恶习。 merely adv.仅仅，只不过It’s not a serious injury. It’s merely a scratch.不是很严重的伤口，只是擦伤而已。 virtue n.美德，德行Helping the old is a traditional virtue of China.帮助老人是中华民族的传统美德。 funeral n.丧葬，葬礼They will go to the man’s funeral in black.他们将着黑色服装出席男子的葬礼。 admire v.钦佩，崇拜The little boy admires the firemen and salutes them.小男孩很钦佩消防员叔叔并向他们敬礼。 rude adj.粗鲁的，无礼貌的Your salesmen are very rude. They yelled at me today.你的销售员们非常粗鲁，他们今天对我大吼大叫！ courage n.勇气，胆量，胆识He jumped off with great courage.他勇敢地一跃而下。 sacrifice vt.牺牲，祭献n.祭品vi.做出牺牲This man would sacrifice himself in the war.这个人准备在战争中牺牲了自己。 prescription n.处方，药方，（医生开）的药The doctor passed the prescription to the patient.医生把处方递给了病人。 locust n.蝗虫Oh no! The locusts are all our crops!哦不！蝗虫吃光了我们的作物！ innocent adj.天真的，单纯的The new born baby looks innocent when he smiles.这个新生儿笑的时候看起来好单纯。 mend v.修理，缝补The man is mending the car.这个人正在修汽车。 tension n.（精神上的）紧张，不安，紧张局面The writer is feeling great tension because of the coming deadline.截止日期就要到了，这位作家十分紧张。 opinion n.意见，看法，主张Everyone is encouraged to express their opinions on the matter.关于那件事，每个人都可以表达意见。 scholar n.学者，公费生，有奖学金的学生She’s so young, but she’s quite the little scholar.她很小，但是已经是一个小小的学者啦。 sweep v.打扫n.清扫The floor is so dirty! I need to sweep it.地板太脏了，我需要打扫。 helmet n.头盔，盔形物vt.给…戴头盔Wear a helmet to protect your head.戴上头盔来保护你的头部。 govern v.统治，管理vi.居支配地位The ambitious king wants to govern the entire world.这个野心勃勃的国王想要统治整个世界。 deaf adj.聋的，不愿听的The old man is almost deaf so please speak louder.老人几乎聋了，请说话大声一点。 spin v.（使）旋转n.旋转“Look, I can spin the basketball on my finger!” said the little girl.“看，我能让篮球在我的手指上转动！”小女孩说。 trend n.时尚，趋势v.转向，使趋向The new trend is for girls to wear very colorful clothing.女孩儿们现在流行多穿多彩的服饰。 doubt n.怀疑，疑虑v.怀疑She is having doubts about her husband’s loyalty.她怀疑她的丈夫出轨了。 wisdom n.智慧，学问，明智，正确判断This book is full of the wisdom of Confucius.这本书里蕴含着孔子的智慧。 wander v.漫游，迷路n.闲逛The young couple is wandering in the park.这对年轻的夫妇正在公园里漫步。 manner n.态度，举止，风俗，习惯It’s bad manners to speak while you are eating.一边吃饭一边说话是不礼貌的举止。 justice n.公平，应得的赏罚Everyone can seek justice in court.每个人都可以在法庭上寻求公正。 amuse v.娱乐，消遣，使发笑Their talk show amused the audience.他们的脱口秀逗乐了观众。 capsule n.胶囊，航天舱，密封舱The medicine can be taken in capsule form.该药可以通过胶囊的形式服用。 ample adj.富足的，丰满的，宽敞的The kitchen and dining room are of ample size.这间房子的厨房和餐厅很宽敞。 cave n.洞穴v.塌落He went into the dark cave by himself.他独自一个人走进了漆黑的山洞。 sightseeing n.游览，观光This photo was taken when I went sightseeing in Pairs.这张照片是我去巴黎旅游的时候拍的。 passage n.通道，走廊，（法案的）通过，段落，推移，旅程The passage is so long that I can’t even see the end.这条通道很长，以至于我看不见它的尽头。 lamp n.灯，台灯An oil lamp burned in darkness.一盏油灯在黑暗中发着光。 concentrate v.全神贯注于，集中于n.浓缩物He is concentrating on making his bread look perfect.他正专心做面包，使其看起来完美。 gradual adj.逐渐的，逐步的，平缓的The graph shows a gradual increase.图表显示出来逐步增长。 trial n.审判，审理，磨练，苦难adj.实验的，实验性的The trial has begun. What will be the outcome?审判开始了。结果会怎样呢？ squeeze v.用力挤压榨取n.压榨I’ll squeeze some oranges to make orange juice.我要榨这些橙子来做橙汁。 ward n.病房，受监护人The patients lie on the beds in the ward.病人躺在病房的床上。 caption n.（插图、照片等的）说明文字The kitty looks even funnier with the photo caption in the upper left.配合左上角的说明文字，猫咪显得更好笑了。 talent n.天赋，才能，天才，人才The girl has a talent for painting.这个女孩有绘画方面的天赋。 furniture n.家具，设备The furniture is very clean and tidy!这些家具非常干净整洁。 conclude v.使结束，推断出，缔结，结束，总结，作决定，作协议They conclude the successful meeting with a high five.他们以击掌来结束这次会议。 grill v.烤，拷问n.烤架She’s grilling the meat right now.她正在烤肉。 surplus adj.过剩的，多余的n.过剩，盈余，顺差He has some surplus cash every month.他每个月都可以存下一些闲钱。 porridge n.粥，麦片粥I ate a bowl of porridge for breakfast.我早晨吃了一碗粥。 steep adj.陡峭的n.陡坡v.沉浸于…This mountain is almost too steep to climb!这个山太陡峭了，几乎不能攀爬。 prove v.证实The ring proves that they’re married.戒指证明他们是夫妻。 scare vt.惊吓，使害怕v.受惊吓，感到害怕n.惊恐，恐慌The one thing that scares me most are giant mice!最让我害怕的东西，就是巨大的老鼠！ vacant adj.闲置的We should rent the house while it is still vacant.我们应该在房子还闲置着的时候把它租下来。 sausage n.香肠I can eat several sausages at one time.我一次可以吃好几根香肠。 settlement n.协议，解决The two sides shook hands on the settlement.双方握手言和。 belly n.肚子，圆形或凸起部分Wow, look at your belly - are you having a baby?哇！瞧瞧你这肚子，你是怀孕了吗？ oral adj.口腔的，口头的，口语的My teeth feel great after an oral cleaning.口腔清洁后我的牙齿感觉超棒。 rope n.绳，索v.用绳捆（或扎等）The four girls are pulling on a piece of rope.这四个女孩正在拉一条绳子。 stage n.舞台，阶段The children are playing music on the stage.孩子们在舞台上演奏音乐。 fever n.发热，狂热The girl has a fever, so she needs to have a good rest.那个女孩发烧了，所以她需要好好休息。 tough adj.健壮的，棘手的Stay away from that man - he looks tough.离那个男的远一点，他看起来很健壮。 dare v.敢，胆敢n.激将He’s daring to accept the challenge.他敢于接受这个挑战。 arrangement n.布置，组合体The arrangement of tables looks so crowded.桌子布置得很挤。 wrestle n.摔跤，角斗，斗争，努力n.摔跤，角力，扭斗I loved to wrestle and fight in college.上大学时，我喜欢玩摔跤搏斗。 worn adj.用旧的，疲倦的Look at this pair of worn shoes, you need to buy a new pair.看看你这双旧鞋，你得买双新的了。 superb adj.极好的，壮丽的Her performance was superb.她的表演很出色。 optimistic adj.乐观的，乐观主义的Even though he cannot walk, he is still optimistic about life.尽管他不能走路，他仍然乐观对待生活。 theoretical adj.理论（上）的These books are too theoretical, I cannot read them.这些书理论性太强了，我都读不懂。 decoration n.装饰They’re putting decorations on the Christmas tree.她们在往圣诞树上放装饰品。 steak n.牛排The steak looks so delicious.这牛排看起来美味极了。 enthusiastic adj.狂热的，极感兴趣的，热情的He was very enthusiastic about his new video game.他非常热衷于新的电子游戏。 continent n.大陆，洲The world has seven continents.世界有七大洲。 conservation n.保护，维持Conservation of our environment is very important.保护环境很重要。 thrill n.兴奋，激动，引起激动的事物v.（使）非常兴奋，（使）非常激动It gave me a real thrill to ride the rollercoaster!坐过山车真是太刺激啦！ nail n.指甲，爪v.将…钉牢，钉住She’s painting my nail.她正给我涂指甲。 symphony n.交响乐The musicians will give a symphony concert this week.这些音乐家这周将举办一场交响音乐会。 fountain n.泉水，喷泉The fountain in the city center is beautiful.市中心的喷泉好美。 appeal n.（人或物的）吸引力vi.有吸引力，呼吁，请求，申诉Money has great appeal to most people.金钱对一些人有很大的吸引力。 pillow n.枕头v.垫，枕着I love sleeping with soft pillows.我爱抱着软软的枕头入睡。 ordinary adj.普通的，平常的，平凡的I’m just an ordinary man.我只是一个再平常不过的男人。 principle n.原则，原理Our business success is based on four key principles.我们生意的成功是基于四项基本的原则。 brochure n.手册，小册子Travel brochures contain many beautiful pictures.旅行手册里有许多漂亮的图片。 committee n.委员会，全体委员The finance committee discussed the company’s financial plans.财务委员会讨论了公司的财务计划。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习第三轮20190505
entry.content: 复习encourage v.鼓励，支持I encourage my girlfriend to do exercise.我鼓励女友做运动。 brick n.砖块，砖Builders are using bricks to build the wall.建筑工人在用砖块砌墙。 confidential adj.机密的，表示信任的These confidential documents are top secret.这些秘密文件是绝对机密。 concern n.关心，担忧v.感兴趣，涉及，关心，（使）担忧She shows her concern by helping the old lady walk.通过帮助那位老太太走路，她表现出了她的关心。 bureaucratic adj.官僚的，官僚政治的This company has many bureaucratic procedures you need to go through.这个公司有很多繁文缛节。 facial adj.表面的，面部的n.面部按摩，美容His funny facial expressions always make me laugh.他面部表情太搞笑了，我简直笑到停不下来！ customs n.海关，关税You need a passport to pass through customs.你需要一本护照才能通过海关。 negotiate v.谈判，交涉，商议They’re negotiating a deal, but neither is willing to make a compromise.他们在协商一门生意，但双方都不愿意让步。 fantasy n.幻想，想象In his fantasy, he is a superhero!在他的幻想中，他是个超级英雄！ pedestrian n.步行者，行人adj.平庸无奇的，无聊的Many pedestrians are crossing the street.许多行人正在过马路。 picnic n.郊游，野餐The family enjoyed a nice picnic outside.一家人在室外享用了一顿很好的野餐。 missile n.导弹，投射出的物体或武器Missiles are used to attack enemies from a long distance.导弹被用于远距离攻击敌人。 sympathy n.同情，同感He felt a lot of sympathy for the dog and gave it a bone.他很同情那条小狗并给了它一块骨头。 flexible adj.易曲的，柔软的，灵活的The pencil is flexible enough to be knoteed.这铅笔非常柔韧，甚至能打个结。 react v.起反应，有影响，对…做出反应Different people react differently when shown a horror movie.看恐怖电影时不同的人有不同的反应。 vocabulary n.词汇（量），词（汇）表This software will help increase your English vocabulary!这个软件会帮助你增加你的英语词汇量。 addicted adj.上了瘾的，入了迷的He is addicted to computer games.他对电脑游戏上瘾了。 circumstance n.条件，情况Sucess depends on many different circumstances.成功取决于许多不同的条件。 moral adj.道德（上）的，道义的n.道德，品行To return the money you found or not, it’s a moral diemma.捡到的钱要不要还回去，这是一个道德难题。 purpose n.目的，意图v.打算They ran the race together, but with a diffenent purpose in mind.最然他们都在跑步，但是他们各自的目的不同。 ambiguous adj.含糊不清的，引起歧义的，模棱两可的Do you see a vase or two faces? It’s pretty ambiguous.你看到的是一个花瓶还是两张脸呢？这张图相当模棱两可。 leather n.皮革，皮制品The sofa and pillow are covered in real leather.沙发很枕头都是真皮做的。 participate v.参与，加入The students partcipate fully in the class.学生们积极参与到课堂中。 mist n.薄雾，朦胧The forest is covered in mist.这片森林被薄雾覆盖。 riddle n.谜，谜语v.解谜，出谜题，满是弹孔What is the answer to the riddle?这个谜语的谜底是啥啊？ relevant adj.有关的，贴切的Before you write this essay you should read some books relevant to the subject.在写论文之前，你应该阅读一些和主题相关的书籍。 appearance n.外貌，外表，公开露面Her appearance will become more beautiful after make-up.她的外表在化妆之后变得更漂亮了。 suck v.，吸入，吸收，使卷入n.吸允，吸力Little kids like to suck their own thumbs.小孩子喜欢吸允自己的拇指。 passive adj.被动的，消极的n.被动语态He played a passive role in the marriage.他在婚姻中扮演了一个被动的角色。 voluntary adj.自愿的，无偿的n.即兴曲Giving blood is 100% voluntary: nobody will force you to do it.献血是百分之百自愿的，没人会强迫你去做。 dentist n.牙医The dentist cleaned my teeth.牙医清洁力我的牙齿。 contradict v.与…发生矛盾，与…抵触，与…对立The signs contradict each other. Which way should wo go?这些标志互相矛盾，我们应该走哪条路呢？ competence n.能力，胜任，称职I hired both of them for their technical competence.鉴于他们的技术能力，他们两个我都雇佣了。 convenient adj.方便的It’s so convenient! You can buy things here at any time.太方便啦！你随时可以在这儿买东西。 gifted adj.有天赋的，有才华的This gifted child could be the next Einstein.这个有天赋的小孩也许可以成为下一个爱因斯坦。 gentle adj.温和的，轻柔的，文雅的He was very gentle and gave me his coat.他很绅士，把他的外套给我了。 pollute v.弄脏，污染，沾污Factory smoke can pollute the environment.工厂烟雾会污染环境。 dusk n.薄暮，黄昏I enjoy watching the sunset at dusk.我很享受在黄昏看日落。 applaud v.鼓掌vt.向…鼓掌表示赞赏We start to applaud when she stands up to speak.当她站起来准备说话的时候，我们开始鼓掌。 motivation n.动机，动力，刺激，积极性Money is his motivation for boxing.金钱是他拳击的动力。 promote v.提升She worked hard and was soon promoted.她工作勤奋，不久就要得到提升了。 artificial adj.人造的，人工的，假的He got an artificial leg after the accident.事故之后他接了假肢。 pension n.养老金，抚恤金，廉租屋v.发给…养老金After they retired, my grandparents received a pension every month.退休之后，我爷爷奶奶每个月都能领到一笔养老金。 profit n.利润，盈利，益处v.得益，有益于The girl made a profit by selling the dress.这个女孩卖掉这件裙子，赚了一笔。 convince v.使确信The footprints convinced the wife that the cat made the mess.地上的脚印使女主人确信是猫把房间弄乱的。 potential n.潜力，潜能adj.潜在的，可能的He has the potential to be very strong.他有变得非常强壮的潜力。 starvation n.饥饿I was suffering from starvation and exhaustion after heavy work.繁重的工作后，我又累又饿。 fragrant adj.香的，芬芳的The air is fragrant with the scent of coffee.空气中弥漫着咖啡香。 appetite n.食欲，胃口Wow, what a huge appetite you have!天哪，你的胃口真大！ allowance n.零用钱，津贴，补贴He has an allowance of 3,000 dollars every month.他每月有3000刀零用钱。 compromise n.妥协，折中v.使遭受危害The seller made a compromise and sold the dress at 50 yuan.商家做出了妥协，50元卖出了那条裙子。 shelter n.隐蔽处，躲避处v.遮蔽，掩护，庇护They build shelters from ice to keep themselves warm.他们用冰建造躲避处来抵御严寒。 advantage n.优势，利益，有利条件The rocket gives him an unfair advantage!火箭给了他不公平的优势。 stranger n.陌生人Kids, be careful of strangers offering candy!小朋友，小心拿糖给你吃的陌生人！

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习第二轮20190504
entry.content: 复习possess v.拥有，占有，缠住，迷住Take the key and now you possess a house.把钥匙拿去，现在你已经拥有一套房子了。 convenience n.方便Sometimes I eat pre0cooked meals for convenience.有时为了方便，我会吃事先做好的饭菜。 institution n.机构The United Nations is an international institution.联合国是一家国际机构。 violence n.暴力The two boys used violence to end the quarrel.这两个男孩动用武力结束了争吵。 refreshments n.点心，茶点Help yourself to the refreshments on the table.请自取桌上的茶点。 gradually adv.逐步地The full moon gradually changes to a new moon.圆月会逐渐变成新月。 guarantee v.保证，担保n.保证金I guarantee that you will have our best service.我保证你会得到我们最优质的服务。 absorb vt.吸收，汲取Sponges can absorb a lot of water.海绵可以吸收很多水。 evident adj.显然的，明显的，明白的It is evident who the real murderer is.真正的凶手是谁很明显。 excellent adj.优秀的，极好的He’s an excellent student who always gets excellent scores.他是个优秀的学生，总是得高分。 grand adj.壮丽的，宏伟的，重大的n.一千美元，大钢琴This grand building has always been an attraction for tourists.这座宏伟的建筑一直吸引着游客前来参观。 proper adj.得体的，正确的，完全的At a cocktail party, you should wear a proper outfit.在酒会上，你应该穿得体的衣服。 poisonous adj.有毒的One bite from a poisonous snake could kill you.被毒蛇咬一口就能要你的命。 desperate adj.绝望的，孤注一掷的The unemployed man looks so desperate.那个失业的男人看上去如此的绝望。 racial adj.种族的Racial origin has nothing to do with making friends.种族背景毫不影响结交朋友。 theatre n.戏院，剧院Let’s go to the theatre and watch a play!我们去剧院看戏吧！ chest n.胸膛We can see his strong chest under his shirt.我们可以看到他衬衫下强壮的胸膛。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习第二轮20190503
entry.content: 复习religious adj.虔诚的He is a religious believer, he goes to church every week.他是个虔诚的教徒，每周都会去教堂。 seminar n.研讨会A teacher and some students are attending a math seminar.一名老师和学生们正在开数学研讨会。 salute v.向…行举手礼，赞扬，赞颂n.致敬，欢迎The policeman salutes me as I walk by.当我走过时，这位警察向我行礼。 vacation n.休假，假期v.休假，度假The girl took a vacation on the beach.这个女孩在海边度假。 garlic n.大蒜Garlic makes any meal taste better.大蒜让所有菜肴更好吃了。 extraordinary adj.非同寻常的The teacher said my daughter has extraordinary musical talent.老师说我女儿在音乐方面天赋异禀。 wounded adj.受伤的The wounded soldier goes to the doctor every day.这位负伤的士兵每天都去看医生。 chew v.嚼，咀嚼n.嚼碎，咀嚼The boy is chewing the rice.他在咀嚼米饭。 conventional adj.依照惯例的，依照传统的Altohough we can now pay online, some people still prefer the conventional method of cash.尽管我们现在可以线上支付了，部分人仍然喜欢传统的现金支付手段。 serious adj.认真的，严肃的He is always very serious while working。他工作时总是很认真。 instruct v.指导，通知My mom instructs me how to play golf.我妈妈教我怎么打高尔夫。 badminton n.羽毛球，羽毛球运动These kids are playing badminton in the park.小孩子们在公园打羽毛球。 punishment n.惩罚，处罚The student was given punishment for doing something wrong.这个学生因为做错事受到了惩罚。 ruin v.毁灭，毁坏，（使）破产n.毁灭，废墟These buildings were ruined by a powerful earthquake.一场大地震摧毁了这些建筑。 wage n.薪水，报酬v.开展，进行（战争、运动）The worker was so happy when she got her wages.这个工人拿到工资的时候，很开心。 basin n.水池，流域，盆The basin in our bathroom was very clean.我们的浴室的水池很干净。 awful adj.糟糕的，讨论的，可拍的，极坏的This fish smells awful. Take it away!这条鱼的气味太糟糕了，快把它拿走！ prevent v.预防，阻止The mother prevented her child from eating sweets.妈妈不让她的小孩吃糖。 roof n.屋顶，顶部The cats climbed on the roof of the house.猫咪爬上了屋顶。 swear v.发誓，郑重地说，咒骂I swear I’m telling the truth.我发誓我讲的是实话。 distinction n.优秀，卓越，杰出，差别，区分Receiving a medal is a sign of distinction.获得奖牌是优秀的象征。 consultant n.顾问，会诊医师，顾问医生The consultant will explain how we should run our business.顾问将会解释我们应该如何经营我们的事业。 foresee v.预知，预料，预测He foresaw that the stock market would rise.他预测到了股市行情。 anxiety n.焦虑It is difficult to disguise her great anxiety.很难掩饰她严重的焦虑。 honest adj.诚实的“Wow. the emperor is naked!” should an honest boy.“哇哦，这个皇帝没穿衣服”一个诚实的小男孩大叫道。 insect n.昆虫There’re many kinds of insects.昆虫有很多不同的种类。 cough v.咳嗽n.咳嗽It’s polite to cover your mouth when you cough.咳嗽的时候挡着嘴是种礼貌。 league n.社团，联盟v.使…结盟，与…联合This is a group photo of our football league.这是我们的足球社团的一张合影。 digest v.消化n.摘要The food he ate was hard to digest.他吃的食物很难消化。 tear v.撕裂，撕碎n.眼泪The hands tear the wall wide open.一双手撕裂了这面墙。 stubborn adj.顽固的，难对付的Both of them are stubborn and don’t want to say sorry first.他俩都很顽固，不愿意第一个道歉。 rough adj.粗糙的The hands of the farmer are rough.这个农民的手很粗糙。 litter n.垃圾v.乱丢Lots of litter was left on the beach by tourists.沙滩上有很多游客留下的垃圾。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习第二轮20190501
entry.content: 复习tube These tubes are made of steel.这些管子都是钢做的。 frequent adj.时常的，频繁的Her frequent online shopping costs her a lot of money.频繁地网上购物花了她很多钱。 anecdote n.轶事，趣闻The anecdote is about the mysterious creature in the ancient times.这桩轶事是关于古代的神兽的。 dimension n.维度，方面These shapes have three dimensions.这些图形有三个维度。 aware adj.意识到的，知道的He suddenly became aware of how to figure out the problem.他突然知道该怎么解决这道难题了。 disaster n.灾难，天灾Many houses were damaged in the disaster. What a pity!很多房屋在那场灾难中损坏了，真是不幸！ acquisition n.获得，掌握，获得物，取得物Reading is essential to the acquisition of knowledge.阅读杜宇获取知识来说是必要的。 plenty n.丰富，大量We have plenty of fruit and vegetables.我们有充足的水果和蔬菜。 compensate v.补偿，赔偿，给…报酬He must compensate for his mistakes.他必须弥补他的过失。 pool n.水塘，其中起来的一批人v.挖掘，集中资源There a big swimming pool in the park.公园里有个超大的游泳池。 cathedral n.大教堂adj.有权威的we visited a magnificent cathedral.我们参观了一座宏伟的教堂。 experiment n.实验v.进行实验The scientist is doing an experiment.科学家在做一项实验。 accumulate vt.积攒，积累vi.聚集，堆积He accumulates money for future use.他攒了些钱，以供将来使用。 memorial n.纪念像，纪念物，纪念碑，纪念仪式adj.纪念的The gravestones are decorated with flags on National Memorial Day.在国家公祭日，墓碑都用国旗装饰了起来。 fibre n.纤维（物质），性格，质地We use optical fibre to channel information effectively.我们运用光纤来有效传输信息。 wrinkle n.皱纹，褶皱，转折，改变v.（使）起褶皱These are some wrinkles around the old lady’s eyes.老妇人眼睛周围上长了一些皱纹。 adapt vi.适应不同情况vt.使适合Human beings have adapted to the changing environment.人类已经适应了不断变化的环境。 razor n.剃刀，刮胡刀He shaved his face with a razor.他正在用刮胡刀刮胡子。 authentic adj.真实的，真正的This diamond isn’t fake - I’m sure it’s authentic.这颗钻石不是假的，我敢保证它是真的！ commercial adj.商业性的，贸易的n.商业广告This is the busiest commercial street in the city.这是这个城市最繁华的商业街。 tendency n.趋向，趋势，倾向There’s a good tendency for our company’s business.我们公司的业务有一个良好的趋势。 tense adj.（神经）紧张的v.使拉紧，拉紧n.时态I feel really tense about the coming exam.我真的很担心即将来临的考试。 astronaut n.宇航员I would love to be an astronaut and go to space.我想成为一名宇航员并进入太空。 splendid adj.壮观的，辉煌的，华丽的Look at this splendid sunset! I love this place.看着日落多美啊！ 我真喜欢这里。 liquid n.液体adj.液体的Water is a kind of liquid without color.水是一种没有颜色的液体。 budget n.预算v.预算，安排adj.廉价的I don’t have much money for the budget.我的钱不够预算。 drill v.钻孔，在…上钻孔n.钻头The worker drills into the wall.工人在墙上钻孔。 sacred adj.神圣的，宗教（性）的In India, the elephant is a sacred animal.在印度，大象被视为神圣的动物。 allergic adj.过敏的，对…讨厌的Look at his face! The poor guy was allergic to seafood.看他的脸，这个可怜的家伙对海鲜过敏。 athletic adj.运动的，体育的，强壮的The athletic man runs for long distances without needing to rest.这运动员可以跑很长的距离，并且不用休息。 sorrow n.悲伤，苦恼，伤心v.感到悲伤，为…悲痛Her tears are full of sorrow.她的眼泪充满悲伤。 heat n.高温，【物理学】热vt.给…加热Be careful of the heat from the fire!小心这堆火的高温！ permanent adj.永久的，持久的Her eyebrows are being made permanent.这位女士正在做永久纹眉。 adequate adj.充足的 ，充分的，足够的，尚可的，过得去的I have prepared an adequate mount of food for 5 people.我为五个人准备了充足的食物。 accomplish v.完成，做到，实现I have accomplished my tasks on schedule.我已经完成了计划上的任务。 patience n.耐心，忍耐Fishing demands a great deal of patience.钓鱼需要极大的耐心。 construct v.建造，构筑The workers are constructing a tall building.工人们正在建造一座高楼。 pardon v.原谅，宽恕excl.请再说一遍n.原谅，饶恕，赦免The king pardoned the prisoner.君主赦免了那名囚犯。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习第二轮20190430
entry.content: 复习elect v.选举，推选，选择We elect our next leader by voting.我们通过投票来选举下一任领导。 dizzy adj.眩晕的，头晕目眩的，头晕眼花的vt.使头晕目眩I felt so dizzy that I went to the hospital.我头太晕了，所以我去看医生了。 harbor n.海湾，避风港v.心怀（怨恨等）‘Hong Kong’ means “fragrant harbor“.“香港”的意思是”芳香之港”。 resign v.辞职After much consideration, the employee resigned from his job.深思熟虑后，这位员工辞职了。 desire n.渴望，要求vi.有希望，期望，愿望vt.请求，要求The cat is filled with the desire to eat the fish.这只猫心里充满了吃掉这条鱼的渴望。 climate n.气候，（社会思想等）趋势Climates differ from place to place, and from season to season.气候随着地域和季节的不同而变化。 nutrition n.营养，营养学Having balanced nutrition is important to maintain a healthy body.营养均衡对于维持身体健康很重要。 volcano n.火山Watch out - the volcano is about to erupt!小心！火山要爆发了！ noble adj.贵族的，高贵的n.贵族The women in the expensive dresses come from a noble family.这些穿着昂贵衣服的女人出身高贵。 duty n.责任，职责，义务，税It’s our duty to protect the global environment.保护环境，人人有责。 distinguish v.区别，识别，辨别，使显著It’s easy to distinguish the blue man from the gray men.很容易就能把小蓝人从小灰人中辨别出来。 energetic adj.精力充沛的，充满活力的She is an energetic child.她是个精力旺盛的孩子。 punish v.惩罚，处罚Her husband was punished for doing something wrong.她老公因为做错了事，受到了惩罚。 essay n.论文，随笔You must complete this essay before graduation.毕业之前，你一定要完成论文。 ecology n.生态，生态学We should protect the native ecology.我们应该保护原生生态。 expedition n.探险，短途旅行They went on a mountain expedition.他们去山上探险。 smooth adj.光滑的，平稳的v.使平稳She said the taste of the chocolate is as smooth as silk. Give me some!她说这种巧克力的口感如丝绸般柔滑，给我一点试试！ alcohol n.酒，酒精，乙醇She rejected the glass of strong alcohol because she’s pregnant.她拒绝喝这杯烈酒，因为她怀孕了。 reputation n.声誉，名声He has a good reputation among sportsmen, since he always wins.因为经常赢得比赛，所以他在体育圈里有很高的声誉。 diagram n.图解，图表The engineer drew different kinds of diagrams.工程师画了很多种图表。 cheat v.作弊，欺骗，哄骗，蒙骗n.骗子，骗术The man cheated in the card game.那个男人在打牌时作弊。 occupation n.职业，工作Which occupation will you take on when you grow up?你长大后想做什么工作呢？ tyre n.轮胎，车胎The strongman is trying to lift the big tyre.这个强壮的男人试着抬起那个大轮胎。 forecast n.预测，预报v.预报，预测The forecast shows that things are going up!预测显示形势在好转。 alley n.小巷，小径The narrow alley winds through the old town.这条窄巷弯弯曲曲地穿过古老的小镇。 accurate adj.精确的，正确的，符合标准的I never miss my target because my aim is so accurate.我从未失手，因为我瞄得很准。 admit v.承认，准许…进入，允许…加入His mother made him admit that he broke the vase.他妈妈让小男孩承认是他把花瓶打碎了。 jog n.轻推，慢跑，漫步v.慢跑Every morning I go for a jog for my health.每天早上，我都会为了健康去慢跑。 sob vi.呜咽，抽泣，发呜咽声，哭诉n.呜咽，哭泣That movie was so sad. I could’t stop sobbing!这部电影太催泪了，我止不住地啜泣！ maid n.女仆，少女That maid cafe mainly focuses on the male customers.那家女仆主题咖啡厅的顾客主要为男性。 clay n.（制砖瓦、陶瓷制品）黏土vt.用黏土处理We are trying to make a cup out of clay.我们试着用粘土制作一个杯子。 wax n.蜡，蜡状物v.给…上蜡adj.蜡制的The wax of the red candle fell on the table.红蜡烛的蜡油滴到了桌子上。 shallow adj.浅的，肤浅的v.变浅，使变浅The water is shallow here.这里的水很浅！ aggressive adj.好斗的，挑衅性的，有闯劲的，积极进取的I was terrified by this aggressive dog.我被这条攻击性很强的狗吓到了。 escape v.逃跑，避开，避免n.逃跑，逃脱She ran to escape from the fire.她跑着逃离火灾现场。 aspect n.（问题等的）方面This passage is written from three aspects.这篇文章是从三个方面来写的。 ambition n.雄心，强烈欲望，抱负，（具体的）追求目标This powerful man’s political ambition was to unify the three kingdoms.作为一个有权势的男人，他的政雄心是一统三国。 gather v.聚集，集合，收集，采集，推测n.聚集，衣服的褶子The students gathered on the playground.学生们在操场上集合。 clerk n.办事员The bank clerk is working behind the counter.银行职员正在柜台后面办公。 tale n.故事，叙述，传说v.谈论，讲述，搬弄是非Most little girls love to read fairy tales.很多小女孩都喜欢读童话故事。 fierce adj.凶猛的，激烈的Male animals can be fierce when they fight over females.当雄性动物为了磁性动物而打架时，它们会变得异常凶猛！ mention v.提及，提名n.谈到，提及She mentioned her child during their conversation.她在谈话中提到了她的孩子。 ankle n.踝，踝关节I hurt my ankle when I was running down the stairs.我跑下楼时把脚踝伤到了。 severe adj.严酷的，剧烈的It’s hard for people to walk in these severe weather conditions.人们在如此严酷的天气下行走很困难。 applicant n.申请人，请求者The applicants for this job are waiting outside before the interview.面试开始之前，应聘者在外面等候。 urgent adj.急迫的，紧迫的He needed urgent attention, so we called an ambulance.他需要急救，于是我们叫了救护车。 receptionist n.接待员Please leave a message with my receptionist.请给我的接待员留言。 extremely adv.非常，极其Wow, his mouth is extremely big!哇塞，他的最太大了！ spade n.铁锹，铲子，黑桃（扑克）A farmer uses a spade to remove soll easily.一个农夫用铁锹轻松地就能把土铲起来。 proud adj.骄傲的，引以自豪的He’s proud because his colleagues liked his new idea.因为同事们都很满意他的新想法，他为此感到骄傲。 sweat v.出汗n.汗I sweat a lot on the way to work.我去上班的路上，我出了很多汗。 clarify v.阐明，澄清The son has to clarify what he wrote for his father.儿子需要把他写的东西给爸爸阐明。 academy n.学院This is an academy for soldiers to train.这是一所训练士兵的学院。 astronomer n.天文学家The astronomer watches the stars.天文学家在观测星星。 tutor n.家庭教师，指导教师v.当…家庭教师The tutor is helping the little boy with his homework.这个家庭教师正在辅导小男孩的功课。 diploma n.毕业文凭，毕业证书I finally got my college diploma when I graduated.毕业的时候，我终于拿到了大学毕业证书。 annoy v.使烦恼，使生气He annoys me by talking all the time.他一直说个不停，烦死了。 fence n.篱笆，围栏，栅栏v.击剑，用篱笆围住，束缚The school is surrounded by a large fence.学校被很大的围栏围住。 stress n.压力，节拍vt.给…加压力She is under a lot of stress with her work.她在工作中承受着很大的压力。 garage n.修车厂，车库I took my car to the garage to be repaired.我把车送到了洗车场去修理。 gruel n.稀粥v.使极度疲劳I sometimes have gruel for breakfast.有的时候，我早餐喝稀粥。 herb n.药草Herbs can be made into medicine.药草可以用来制药。 ease v.缓解，顺利进出n.不拘束To ease her daily stress, she likes to practice yoga.她喜欢通过练瑜伽来缓解日常压力。 cafeteria n.自助餐馆We had our lunch in a cafeteria.我们在一家自助餐厅吃了午饭。 guilty adj.有罪的The man was found guilty and put into prison.这个人被判有罪，进了监狱。 spread v.伸开，伸展，散步，传播，摊开，覆盖n.伸开，伸展，散步，传播，摊开，范围Spread the butter evenly to all parts of the bread.将黄油均匀地涂抹到面包的各个部分。 consequence n.结果，后果，重要性The consequence of eating too much junk food is getting fat.吃太多垃圾食品的后果就是长胖。 curtain n.窗帘，幕（布）v.装帘子，遮掉The play starts as the curtain opens.帘幕打开的时候，戏剧就开始了。 construction n.建筑业，建筑物I work in construction - I build houses.我在建筑行业工作 – 我盖房子。 canal n.运河，河流This city has many canals running through it.这座城市有很多运河穿流其中。 criterion n.标准，准则The criterion for selecting each candidate varies from one to another.我们挑选每位选手的标准各不相同。 arrange v.整理，达成协议I arrange my toys so that they can fit in a box.我把玩具排列好，这样它们就能都放在一个盒子里。 welfare n.福利The organization aims to improve the welfare of animals.这个组织旨在提升动物福利。 tailor n.裁缝v.修改，使合适，调整使适应vt.裁制A tailor can turn the cloth into fashionable clothing.裁缝能把布料做成时髦的衣服。 prejudice n.偏见，损害vt.使抱偏见Some people had a prejudice against black people in the past.过去人们对黑人有偏见。 ache n.疼痛v.觉得疼痛Mark had an ache in his back.马克背部疼痛。 diverse adj.不同的，差异的，多种多样的I can see diverse colors on their hands.在他们手上我能看到各种各样的颜色。 squid n.鱿鱼，枪乌贼Squids are my favorite seafood.鱿鱼是我最爱的海鲜。 correspond v.通信，相符，一致We correspond by email to stay in touch.我们靠电子邮件来保持联系。 chimney n.烟囱The chimney spits out smoke every day.烟囱每天都往外喷烟。 leak v.漏，泄露n.漏洞Water is leaking through the ceiling Poor guy!他家房顶正漏水呢！真可怜！ grain n.谷物种子,谷物，少量v.使成粒状Grains like wheat are used to make bread.像小麦这样的谷物是用来做面包的。 theory n.理论，原理That student is interested in all kinds of science theories.那孩子对各种科学理论都感兴趣。 achieve v.完成，达到，获得，实现I finally achieved my goal of winning the race.我赢了跑步比赛，终于达成了我的目标。 lack n.欠缺v.缺乏，不足Because of a lack of water, few plants can grow here.因为缺乏水，植物很难在这儿存活下来。 burden n.负担，重担v.使负重，装载，烦扰Our burden is too heavy, because we have too much homework.我们的负担太重了，因为每天都有很多作业。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习第二轮20190429
entry.content: 复习phrase n.短语，习语，简短的警句“Attitude is everything” is a common phrase.“态度决定一切”是一句习语。 sincerely adv.真诚地，诚挚地The robot sincerely hopes to make friends with human.这个机器人真心希望和人类坐朋友。 influence v.影响，势力v.影响Stop smoking! It will have a bad influence on your child.别抽烟了！孩子会受你影响！ fiction n.虚构，想象I like science fiction movies with spaceships.我喜欢有太空飞船的科幻片。 agenda n.议事日程The meeting’s agenda still needs to be writen.会议议程还需要写下来。 hall n.会堂，门厅，过道There are many seats in the hall.会堂里有许多座位。 subtraction n.减法You don’t know the answer? This is a basic subtraction!你不会做吗？这是最基本的减法唉！ seize v.抓住，逮捕，夺取They seized one another by the wrist.他们抓住了对方的手腕。 triangle n.三角形She drew a triangle with a black pen.她用黑笔画了一个三角形。 policy n.政策，方针，保险单China has adopted one-child policy for a few decades.中国在过去几十年中实行独生子女政策。 found v.成立，建立，创办The bosses found a new store together.老大们一起开了家新店。 pride n.自豪，骄傲v.使得意，以…自豪The parents took pride in their son’s graduation.父母为儿子的毕业感到自豪。 spare adj.备用的，多余的，闲置的n.零件，备件v.抽出，腾出I have a spare tire for my car.我的车有一个备胎。 fortunate adj.幸运的He won the lottery! How fortunate!他中了彩票！多幸运啊！ calm adj.平静的，镇静的n.平静，安宁v.（使）平静，（使）镇定She is so calm although the endless work bothers her.尽管工作不胜其烦，但她仍然淡定如山。 secretary n.秘书，部长，大臣My secretary helped me with my email.我的秘书正在帮我弄邮件。 accustomed adj.习惯的，适应了的He got accustomed to the food after 10 year of living here.住在这儿十年后他习惯了这里的食物。 pioneer n.先驱，先锋，开拓者v.开辟，首倡He’s a pioneer in climbing, the first man to reach the summit.他是登山的先锋，即第一个到达山顶的人。 attain v.获得，达到（某个年纪、水平、条件）n.成就I finally attained my driving license!我终于拿到了驾照！ anxious adj.忧虑的，担心的，焦急的The boy is anxious about the exam.考试让小男孩很焦虑。 suppose vt.想，认为vi.推测I suppose that I can be back before nine o’clock.我想我九点前能回来。 ashamed adj.感到羞愧的She felt ashamed of her bad grades.她为自己糟糕的成绩感到羞愧。 legal adj.合法的，法定的，法律的In some areas of America, it’s legal to carry a gun.在美国一些地区，持枪合法。 appreciate v.为…表示感激，增值Grandma appreciated the gift of flowers on her birthday.外婆很感谢她生日上收到的鲜花礼物。 pepper n.胡椒粉，胡椒The cook used many different kinds of peppers in his recipe.这个厨师在他们的食谱里用了很多不同种类的胡椒。 mercy n.宽恕，仁慈，怜悯，恩惠May God have mercy on his soul.愿上帝宽恕他的灵魂。 predict v.预言，预告，预测The magician pretended to be able to predict the future through the crystal ball.这位魔术师假装能够通过水晶球预测未来。 accountant n.会计人员，会计师You need a good accountant to get the money for you.你需要一个好会计来帮你把钱弄到手。 challenging adj.具有挑战性的，引起挑战性兴趣的The bike trick he’s attempting is extremely challenging!他正尝试的自行车特技真是相当的有挑战性啊！ steward n.乘务员，服务员The stewards are responsible for serving passengers on the plane.空乘人员负责为飞机上的乘客提供服务。 corner n.角落v.将…逼入困境The dog is in the corner facing the wall.那只狗在角落里面壁。 tournament n.锦标赛，联赛The basketball tournament will end with a single winner.这次篮球联赛会只有一个获胜队伍。 pretend v.假装，装扮I pretended to study hard, but actually I chatted on my phone.我假装很努力地学习，但是实际上我在手机上聊天。 particular adj.特别的，不寻常的n.详细情况You should pay particular attention to spelling.你需要特别注意你的拼写。 satisfaction n.满足，满意，乐事，补偿I gave their service a good rating to show my satisfaction.我给了好评，来表示我对他们的服务很满意。 temptation n.引诱，诱惑Faced with the temptation of money, he said no!面对钱的诱惑，他说了不。 laser n.激光，激光器They are playing laser tag game.他们在玩激光束游戏。 campaign n.（社会性、政治性）活动，运动v.从事活动，参加活动Many people came to support the president’s campaign.很多人都来这儿支持总统的竞选活动。 consideration n.体贴，体谅，顾及，考虑，思考She shows a lot of consideration for her mother.她很体贴她的母亲。 realize v.认识到，体会到“So that’s how the word is spelled!” The little boy finally realized.男孩终于意识到，”原来这个单词是这样拼的！” precious adj.珍贵的，宝贵的The crown is decorated with precious diamonds.这个皇冠上装饰着珍贵的钻石。 arrest v.逮捕，拘留n.逮捕，拘留The police officer arrested the man for drunk driving.警察以酒后驾驶为由逮捕这个人。 obtain v.获得，赢的，取得The policeman is obtaining evidence from the crime scene.警察正在犯罪现场取证。 tolerate v.忍受，容忍They have to tolerate the smell in the elevator.他们不得不忍受电梯里的臭味。 appendix n.阑尾She has an acute pain in her appendix.她的阑尾痛的厉害。 recreation n.娱乐活动，消遣Old people like to play mah-jong for recreation.老年人喜欢玩麻将来作为消遣。 allocate v.分配，配给Allocate one piece of cake to each person.给每个人都分一块蛋糕。 ambassador n.（特命全权）大使“Our country wishes to have peace” said the ambassador.“我们国家渴望和平”， 大使说道。 section n.部分v.划分The chart has five sections in different colors.图表有颜色不同的五个部分。 qualification n.资格证明，条件，限制性条件I’m delighted that I received this qualification from my university.拿到了大学毕业证，我很开心。 academic adj.学术的，学院的，大学的n.学者They are having an academic meeting about physics.他们正在开一个物理领域的学术会议。 restriction n.限制，约束There is a restriction on fishing here.这里限制钓鱼。 agricultural adj.农业的，农艺的Agricultural land is important for growing crops.农田对于种庄稼来说很重要。 brilliant adj.聪颖的，卓越的，有才气的The brilliant girl can solve the math problems easily.这个聪明的女孩可以轻松解决这些数学难题。 punctual adj.准时的，守时的I’m always punctual, I’m never late for work.我总是很守时，上班从来不迟到。 avenue n.林荫道，道路This long avenue leads to a big country house.这条林荫道通往一栋巨大的乡间别墅。 corrupt v.贿赂，使腐败，变腐败，堕落adj.腐败的He is trying to corrupt the man with money.他想用钱贿赂这个人。 dull adj.枯燥的，沉闷的The TV show is so dull that makes him want to sleep.电视节目无趣地让他想睡觉。 needle n.针，针状物，指针Sew these buttons on using this needle.用这根针把扣子缝上。 conclusion n.结论，推论I finally drew a conclusion from these facts.我终于从这些因素中得出了一条结论。 panic n.慌乱v.使…惊慌失措After she fell, she reached for her shoes in a panic.跌倒之后她慌张地捡起了鞋子。 district n.地区，区域The city has four districts.这座城市由四个区域组成。 abrupt adj.突然地，鲁莽的The abrupt bang gave him a fright.气球突然爆炸，把他吓了一跳。 disagreement n.分歧，不和，不一致They had a disagreement about what to build with their toys.他们对用这些积木造什么产生了分歧。 corporation n.企业，公司In our corporation,we listen to everyone’s opinion.在我们公司，我们会听取所有人的意见。 wipe v.擦The woman is wiping the mirror with a rag.这个女人正在用抹布擦拭镜子。 unfortunate adj.不幸的，令人遗憾的I’m so unfortunate - why does it only rain on me?我真不幸，为什么雨知下在我头上？ affection n.感情，作用，影响She shows a great affection for her dog.她非常喜爱她的狗。 inform v.通知，向…报告，赋特征于Please inform us of the news as soon as you know.请你一有消息就通知我们。 substitute v.代替n.代替者，代用品，替补队员You should substitute fruits for sweets.你应该用水果代替甜食。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习第二轮20190428
entry.content: 复习bachelor n.学士学位，单身汉After four years of hard work, I finally got my bachelor‘s degree!经过了四年的努力学习，我终于拿到了学士学位！ independent adj.独立自主的，独自的，无偏见的She is independent despite her broken legs.尽管腿脚不便，但她依然非常独立。 stout adj.矮胖的，结实的n.矮胖子，烈性啤酒The stout guy carries many persons on him.那个矮胖的人带着好多人在身上。 patient n.病人，患者adj.有耐心的，能忍耐的The doctor is talking to her patient about his illness.医生正在跟她的男患者讲解病情。 vacant adj.闲置的We should rent the house while it is still vacant.我们应该在房子还闲置的时候把它租下来。 sausage n.香肠I can eat several sausages at one time.我一次可以吃好几根香肠。 sneeze v.打喷嚏n.喷嚏The poor man caught a cold so he can’t stop sneezing.这个可怜的男子感冒了，所以他不停地打喷嚏。 cellar n.酒窖，地下室The cellar is filled with wine barrels.酒窖里装满了酒桶。 hire v.雇佣，出租n.租金，雇佣，租用They hired an employee to do some typing work.他们雇了一个员工来打字。 settlement n.协议，解决The two sides shook hands on the settlement.双方握手言和。 dash vi.猛冲，突进n.破折号The woman is dashing forward.这个女人朝前猛冲。 oral adj.口腔，口头的，口语的My teeth feel great after an oral cleaning.口腔清洁后我的牙齿感觉超棒。 rope n.绳，索v.用绳捆（或扎等）The four girls are pulling on a piece of rope.这四个女孩正在拉一条绳子。 paragraph n.（文章的）段，节The writer mentioned me by name in this paragraph!作者在这一段落提到了我的名字！ eruptv.（火山、喷泉、蒸汽等）喷发，喷射出 This volcano erupts three times a day.这座火山一天喷发三次。 swallow v.咽下，吞下n.燕子vi.做吞咽动作，咽口水I can’t believe that the actor can swallow a sword!我简直没法相信，那个演员居然能吞一把剑。 tough adj.健壮的，棘手的Stay away from that man - he looks tough.离那个男的远一点，他看起来很健壮。 dare v.敢，胆敢n.激将He’s daring to accept the challenge.他敢于接受这个挑战。 concert n.音乐会The animals are holding a concert in the forest.动物们正在森林里开演唱会呢！ royal adj.王室的，皇家的，第一流的，高贵的The king wears his royal clothes.国王穿着他的御用衣服。 respect n.敬重，尊敬v.尊敬，敬重They showed respect to each other by bowing.他们互相鞠躬来表达尊重。 arrangement n.布置，组合体The arrangement of tables looks so crowded.桌子布置得很挤。 wrestle v.摔跤，角斗，斗争，努力n.摔跤，角力，扭斗I loved to wrestle and fight in college.上大学时，我喜欢玩摔跤搏斗。 prairie n.大草原，（尤指）北美大草原Many cows eat grass on the prairie.许多奶牛在大草原上吃草。 astronomy n.天文学I’ve always loved looking at the stars, so now I study astronomy.我一直都很喜欢看星星，所以现在我在研究天文学。 optimistic adj.乐观的，乐观主义的Even though he cannot walk, he is still optimistic about life.尽管他不能走路，他仍然乐观对待生活。 theoretical adj.理论（上）的These books are too theoretical, I cannot read them.这些书理论性太强了，我都读不懂。 enthusiastic adj.狂热的，极感兴趣的，热情的He was very enthusiastic about his new video game.他非常热衷于新的电子游戏。 continent n.大陆，洲The world has seven continunts.世界有七大洲。 chance n.机会，偶发事件vi.偶然发生adj.偶然的vt.冒…的险The boy still has three chances to get the toy bear.这男孩还有三次机会能拿到玩具熊。 conservation n.保护，维持Conservation of our environment is very important.保护环境很重要。 apron n.围裙The girl looks good in that black apron.系着黑色围裙的她看起来很好看。 committee n.委员会，全体委员The finance committee discussed the company’s financial plans.财务委员会讨论了公司的财务计划。 controversial adj.引起争论的，有争议的The couple is discussing a controversial topic.这对夫妇正在讨论一个争议性话题。 acquaintance n.熟人，相识的人，认识They are acquaintances because they have been neighbors for many years.她们是老相识，因为她们做了许多年邻居。 casual adj.随便的n.临时工She prefers casual clothing when hanging out on the street.在街上闲逛时，她偏好休闲的穿着。 astonish v.使惊讶，使吃惊The magic astonished the kids.整个魔术使孩子们感到很吃惊。 attentively adv.仔细地，注意地He observed the flowers attentively hoping to see them grow.他仔细地观察着这些花儿，希望能看见它们的生长。 contradictory adj.反驳的，自相矛盾的n.矛盾的事物，矛盾因素These signs are contradictory - I can’t obey them both.这些标志是矛盾的，我不能同时遵守它们。 persuade v.说服，劝说，使相信The salesman is persuading us to buy a car.这个销售员在劝我们买辆车。 nail n.指甲，爪v.将…钉牢，钉住She’s painting my nail.她正给我涂指甲。 fountain n.泉水，喷泉The fountain in the city center is beautiful.市中心的喷泉好美。 peasant n.农民，农夫，庄稼人，小耕农The peasants are working on the farm land.农民在地里劳作。 scold v.怒骂，责骂，训斥The mother scolds her child.那位母亲斥责她的小孩。 damage v.毁坏n.损害Oh no! My car was badly damaged after hitting the tree.噢不！我的车在撞上树后严重损坏了。 flood v.淹没，充满n.洪水The town was flooded due to the big storm.这个城镇由于一场大雨被洪水淹没了。 deliberately adv.故意地，慢条斯理地He put a leg out to deliberately make the man fall.他故意伸出一条腿绊倒老人。 curious adj.好奇的，好管闲事的The cats are curious about what’s behind the door.小猫们对门后面是什么很好奇。 discrimination n.歧视，偏见He shows discrimination between the poor and rich.他嫌贫爱富。 pity n.憾事，怜悯v.（觉得）可怜，惋惜What a pity! The ice cream dropped before I ate it.真遗憾！我还没来得及吃冰激淋就掉地上了。 gain v.获得，增加，从中受益，增值n.获得，增加（财富、重量），利益We can gain valuable knowledge by rading books.我们能通过阅读获得宝贵的知识。 champion n.冠军adj.夺得第一名的The French football team became the champions of the 2018 World Cup!法国队成为2018年世界杯冠军。 collision n.碰撞，冲突A black car is in collision with a red car.黑车与红车相撞了。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习第二轮20190427
entry.content: 复习representative n.代表adj.典型的，有代表性的They chose her as their representative to speak for them.他们选她作为代表为他们发声。 promote v.提升She worked hard and was soon promoted.她工作勤奋，不久就要得到提升了。 plastic adj.塑料的n.塑料，塑料制品Plastic cups and bowls are safer for babies than glass ones.塑料的杯和碗对于宝宝来说比玻璃的更安全。 beneficial adj.有益的，有利的Eating nurtitious food and exercising are beneficial to our health.吃有营养的食物和锻炼身体的对我们的健康有益。 profit n.利润，盈利，益处v.得益，有益于The girl made a profit by selling the dress.这个女孩卖掉这件裙子，赚了一笔。 revision n.修改，修订本He made a lot of revisions in his novel.他对他的小说做了很多的修改。 convince v.使确信The footprints convinced the wife that the cat made the mess.地上的脚印使女主人确信是猫把房间弄乱的。 consult v.请教，咨询She is consulting the doctor about her illness.她正向医生咨询她的病情。 potential n.潜力，潜能adj.潜在的，可能的he has the potential to be very strong.他又变得非常强壮的潜力。 starvation n.饥饿I was suffering from starvation and exhaustion after heavy work.繁重的工作后，我又累又饿。 amusement n.娱乐，消遣This amusement park is still open at night.这座游乐园晚上也会开放。 merciful adj.慈善的，仁慈的，宽大的The old man is merciful so he let turtles free.老人很仁慈，他放生了海龟。 decade n.十年，十年间People can change a lot after a decade.十年会给人带来很大的变化。 fragrant adj.香的，芬芳的The air is fragrant with the scent of coffee.空气中弥漫着咖啡香。 appetite n.食欲，胃口Wow, what a huge appetite you have!天哪，你的胃口真大！ allowance n.零用钱，津贴，补贴He has an allowance of 3,000 dollars every month.他每月有3000刀零用钱。 adventure n.冒险，冒险活动The boy went on an adventure in the jungle.这个男孩到丛林里冒险了。 compromise n.妥协，折中v.使遭受危害The seller made a compromise and sold the dress at 50 yuan.商家做出了妥协，50元卖出了那条裙子。 advantage n.优势，利益，有利条件The rocket gives him an unfair advantage!火箭给了他不公平的优势。 appoint v.委派，任命，约定，确定，指定My boss has appointed me to manage this project.我的老板任命我来管理这个项目。 stranger n.陌生人Kids, be careful of stranger offering candy!小朋友，小心拿糖给你吃的陌生人。 fasten v.扎牢，扣住We should all fasten our seat belts before I start the car.在开车之前，我们都应该系牢安全带。 regret vt.懊悔，后悔n.后悔，遗憾I really regret not finishing school.我好后悔没有完成学业。 virtue n.美德，德行Helping the old is a traditional virtue of China.帮助老人是中华名族的传统美德。 courage n.勇气，胆量，胆识He jumped off with great courage.他勇敢地一跃而下。 innocent adj.天真的，单纯的The new born baby looks innocent when he smiles.这个新生儿笑的时候看起来好单纯。 scholar n.学者，公费生，有奖学金的学生She’s so young, but she’s quite the little scholar.她很小，但是已经是一个小小的学者了。 ample adj.富足的，丰满的，宽敞的The kitchen and dining room are of ample size.这间房子的厨房和餐厅很宽敞。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习第二轮20190426
entry.content: 复习contribute v.捐献，捐助Many people contribute money to help people in need.很多人捐钱来帮助有需要的人们。 unconditional adj.绝对的，无条件的Mothers have unconfitional love for their children.母亲对孩子的爱是无条件的。 brick n.砖块，砖Builders are using bricks to build the wall.建筑工人在用砖块砌墙。 confidential adj.机密的，表示信任的These confidential documents are top secret.这些秘密文件是绝对机密的。 silly adj.傻的，愚蠢的n.（通常指小孩子）淘气鬼，傻孩子He looks so silly with his head in his clothes.他把头缩进衣服里，看起来真傻。 obey v.服从，听从，遵从He always obeys his wife without question.他对他夫人唯命是从。 leftover n.剩菜，残余物adj.残余的The leftovers were a feast for the the hungry dog.对于饥肠辘辘的狗来说剩菜都是盛宴。 acquire v.（尤指靠自己的努力或行动或经过一个过程）获得The little boy acquired knowledge of the universe from reading.小男孩通过阅读学到了很多关于宇宙的知识。 approximately adv.近似地，大约Pi is approximately equal to 3.1416.圆周率大约等于3.1416. sew v.缝，缝纫vt.缝补She uses the machine to sew a new dress.她用机器缝制新裙子。 concern n.关心，担忧v.感兴趣，涉及，关心，（使）担忧She shows her concern by helping the old lady walk.通过帮助那位老太太走路，她表现出了她的关心。 subjective adj.主观（上）的，个人的The taste in art is a highly subjective matter.品味艺术是一件主观性很强的事。 dignity n.威严，威风，尊严，高贵The policeman and the firefighter serve with dignity and honor.警察和消防队员怀着尊严和荣誉任职。 bureaucratic adj.官僚的，官僚政治的This company has many bureaucratic procedures you need to go through.这个公司有很多繁文缛节。 ferry n.渡船，渡轮v.渡运（人、车或物等）We took the ferry down the river.我们乘坐了渡船顺流而下。 facial adj.表面的，面部的n.面部按摩，美容His funny facial expressions always make me laugh.他面部表情太搞笑了，我简直笑到停不下来！ abundant adj.大量的This garden has an abundant amount of flowers.这个花园有大量的花朵。 customs n.海关，关税You need a passport to pass through customs.你需要一本护照才能通过海关。 bid n.出价，努力争取v.出价The winning bid was just $5.中标价仅是5美元。 harmony n.和睦，和谐They live together in perfect harmony.他们和睦地址在一起。 negotiate v.谈判，交涉，商议They’re negotiating a deal, but neither is willing to make a compromise.他们在协商一门生意，但双方都不愿意让步。 owe v.把…归于，欠钱I owe my full mark to this phone app!我把我的满分归功于这个手机应用！ fantasy n.幻想，想念In his fantasy, he is a superhero!在他的幻想中，他是个超级英雄！ pedestrian n.步行者，行人adj.平庸无奇的，无聊的Many pedestrians are crossing the street.许多行人正在过马路。 poison n.毒物，毒药v.放毒，毒害Don’t drink that poison. It will kill you.不要喝那瓶毒药，它会置你于死地。 damp adj.潮湿的，有湿气的London is damp and wet.伦敦很潮湿。 picnic n.郊游，野餐The family enjoyed a nice picnic outside.一家人在室外享用了一顿很好的野餐。 sympathy n.同情，同感He felt a lot of sympathy for the dog and gave it a bone.他很同情那条小狗并给了它一块骨头。 react v.起反应，有影响，对…做出反应Different people react differently when shown a horror movie.看恐怖电影时不同的人有不同的反应。 introduce v.介绍，传入，引进Please introduce me to your boss.请把我介绍给你的老板。 vocabulary n.词汇（量），词（汇）表This software will help increase your English vocabulary!这个软件会帮你增加你的英语词汇量。 circumstance n.条件，情况Success depends on many different circumstances.成功取决于许多不同的条件。 moral adj.道德（上）的，道义的n.道德，品行To return the money you found or not, it’s a moral dilemma.捡到的钱要不要还回去，这是一个道德难题。 competition n.比赛，竞争者Who is going to win this competition?谁会赢的这场比赛呢？ purpose n.目的，意图v.打算They ran the race together, but with a different purpose in mind.虽然他们都在跑步，但是他们各自的目的不同。 ambiguous adj.含糊不清的，引起歧义的，模棱两可的Do you see a vase or two faces? It’s pretty ambiguous.你看到的是一个花瓶还是两张脸呢？这张图相当模棱两可。 leather n.皮革，皮制品The sofa and pillow are covered in real leather.沙发和枕头都是真皮做的。 effort n.努力，成就I made every effort to push the ball up.我用尽全力把球往上推。 participate v.参与，加入The students participate fully in the class.学生们积极参与到课堂中。 fortune n.运气What a good fortune! I won the first prize.运气真好！我中了一等奖。 expression n.表情，神情，表达，表述She took many pictures of different expressions.她照了很多不同表情的照片。 athlete n.运动员，体育家，强壮的人He was a great athlete who ran really fast.他以前是个优秀的运动员，跑得非常快。 mist n.薄雾，朦胧The forest is covered in mist.这片森林被薄雾覆盖。 riddle n.谜，谜语v.解谜，出谜题，满是弹孔What is the answer to the riddle?这个谜语的谜底是啥啊？ attractive adj.吸引人的，有魅力的，引起兴趣的I find orange food attractive.我觉得橙色的食物很吸引人。 tissue n.面巾纸，（动植物的）组织，纱布The little girl uses a tissue when she sneezes.打喷嚏时，小女孩扯了张纸巾。 defence n.防御，防务，辩护The woman learns self defence.这个女人学习自卫。 reception n.前台，接待处，接收，欢迎，招待会The couple got their room key at the hotel reception.这对夫妇在酒店前台拿到了房间钥匙。 feast n.盛宴，节日v.尽情地吃We are having a big Thanksgiving feast.我们正在吃感恩节大餐。 relevant adj.有关的，贴切的Before you write this essay you should read some books relevant to the subject.在写论文之前，你应该阅读一些和主题相关的书籍。 determine v.确定，决定The chubby dog is determined to lose weight.这只胖狗下定了决心要减肥。 sick adj.有病的，恶心的n.病人v.呕吐All this cold has made me sick, and now I can’t stop sneezing!这大冷天把我冻生病了，我现在一直打喷嚏！ civilization n.文明，开化，教养The Egyptian civilization lasted for thousands of years.埃及文明延续了上千年。 contribution n.贡献，投稿稿件，捐献物Thanks to all of you for making a contribution to our organization.感谢各位给我们慈善团体的捐献。 ancestor n.祖宗It was said that the ancestors of mankind looked like apes.据说人类的祖宗看起来像猿猴。 restrict v.限制This sign board indicates that all vehicles are restricted to enter.这个标志表示所有机动车辆禁止通行。 phenomenon n.现象The green northern lights are a natural electrical phenomenon.绿色极光是一种自然电学现象。 pub n.酒吧，酒馆Let’s go down to the pub to get some drinks!我们去酒吧里喝点酒吧！ overlook v.忽视，未注意到n.忽视，远眺She’s so busy on her tablet that she’s totally overlooking her daughter.她忙着玩平板，全然忽视了她的女儿。 passive adj.被动的，消极的n.被动语态He played a passive role in the marriage.他在婚姻中扮演了一个被动的角色。 storage n.存储，贮藏，仓库We put all the paper boxes in storage.我们把所有的纸箱粗放在仓库里。 dentist n.牙医The dentist cheaned my teeth.牙医清洁了我的牙齿。 disturbing adj.令人不安的His snoring is very disturbing.他的鼾声实在是太烦人了！ practical adj.心灵手巧的，【人】注重实际的，务实的，实际的，实用的，实践的，切合实际的My daughter’s very practical - she’s helping to build our house.我女儿心灵手巧，她在帮助我们建造房子。 weep n.哭泣，（伤口）化脓I could feel his sadness when I saw him weeping.看到他在哭泣，我都能感受到他的悲伤。 slip v.滑倒，跌落，溜走，疏忽n.溜走He slipped on the wet floor and fell.他在湿地板上滑倒了。 competence n.能力，胜任，称职I hired both of them for their technical competence.鉴于他们的技术能力，他们两个我都雇佣了。 technique n.技能，技巧，方法，技术I learnt some fighting techniques from the master.我向师父学了点搏斗技能。 convenient adj.方便的It’s so convenient! You can buy things here at any time.太方便啦！你随时可以在这儿买东西。 firmly adv.坚固地，稳固地，坚定地，坚决地He firmly squeezed the piece of paper.他牢牢攥紧那张纸。 elegant adj.优美的，文雅的，漂亮雅致的，陈设讲究的How elegant the ballet dancer is!芭蕾舞者真优雅！ gifted adj.有天赋的，有才华的This gifted child could be the next Einstein.这个天赋的小孩也许可以成为下一个爱因斯坦。 gentle adj.温和的，轻柔的，文雅的He was very gentle and gave me his coat.他很绅士，把他的外套给我了。 pollute v.弄脏，污染，沾污Factory smoke can pollute the environment.工厂烟雾会污染环境。 dusk n.薄暮，黄昏I enjoy watching the sunset at dusk.我很享受在黄昏看日落。 applaud v.鼓掌vt.向…鼓掌表示赞赏we start to applaud when she stands up to speak.当她站起来准备说话的时候，我们开始鼓掌。 cheque n.支票She writes a cheque for her bills.她为账单开了张支票。 motivation n.动机，动力，刺激，积极性Money is his motivation for boxing.金钱是他拳击的动力。 cottage n.村舍，小屋I offten spend weekends in my cottage by the lake.我经常在我湖边的小木屋里度过周末。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习20190425
entry.content: 复习besides prep.除…之外adv.而且，还有As the winner, I received lots of money besides the cup.作为胜利者，我除了得到了奖杯外，还获得了一大笔钱。 associate v.联想，联合，联系，交往n.伙伴，同事adj.副的I associate this picture with a star.这图片让我联想到了星星。 suspect n.嫌疑犯，可疑分子v.怀疑，猜疑，推测adj.可疑的The suspect was body-searched by a policeman.警察对嫌疑犯进行了搜身。 perfume n.香水v.使充满芳香This perfume smells like flowers.这个香水闻起来像花一样。 anxiety n.焦虑It is difficult to disguise her great anxiety.很难掩饰她严重的焦虑。 botanical adj.植物（学）的I went to the botanical gardens to see the beautiful plants.我们去了植物园欣赏那些美丽的植物。 league n.社团，联盟v.使…结盟，与…联合This is a group photo of our football league.这是我们足球社团的一张合影。 rough adj.粗糙的The hands of the farmer are rough.这个农民的手很粗糙。 confuse v.混淆，使混乱，使迷糊I always confuse the girl with her twin sister.我一直把那个女孩和她的双胞胎姐姐搞混淆。 fancy adj.华丽装饰的，别致的，引人注目的n.喜爱，幻想，想象力vt.想象，幻想This fancy gold tableware must have been so expensive!这套华丽的金色餐具肯定很贵！ organize v.整理，组织Please organize the cards by number.请按编号整理好卡片。 custom n.风俗adj.定制的It’s our custom to visit relatives during the Spring Festival.春节期间走亲访友是我们的一种习俗。 hooray excl.万岁Hooray! The exams are over!万岁！考试结束了！ litter n.垃圾v.乱丢Lots of litter was left on the beach by tourists.沙滩上有很多游客留下的垃圾。 possess v.拥有，占有，缠住，迷住Take the key and now you possess a house.把钥匙拿去。现在你已经拥有一套房子了。 instant adj.即食的n.瞬间Making a cup of instant coffee is a simple process.制作一杯速溶咖啡的过程很简单。 hatch v.孵出，孵n.船舱盖Look, the eggs are hatching!看啊，小鸡出壳了！ convenience n.方便Sometimes I eat pre-cooked meals for convenience.有时为了方便，我会吃事先做好的饭菜。 anchor n.锚，担任（广播电视新闻节目）的主持人The ship dropped the anchor and hit the shark on head.船抛出锚，打到了一只鲨鱼。 dilemma n.进退两难的窘境I am in a dilemma. Both ways are so dangerous!我处在进退两难的困境里，两条路都好危险啊！ institution n.机构The United Nations is an international institution.联合国是一家国际机构。 violence n.暴力The two boys used violence to end the quarrel.这两个男孩动用武力结束了争吵。 offshore adj.近海的，海岸的adv.离岸地，近海地Offshore oil extraction is the best way to get oil.近海原油开采是得到石油的最好方式。 refreshments n.点心，茶点Help yourself to the refreshments on the table.请自取桌上的茶点。 unconscious adj.不省人事，未察觉的We found him unconscious on the floor.我们发现他倒在地上，不省人事。 devote vt.奉献The woman devotes her entire life to her religion.这个女人把一辈子都献给了宗教信仰。 donate v.捐赠We donated a sum of money to the charity.我们向慈善机构捐了一笔钱。 comrade n.战友My comrade and I are good friends.我和我战友是好朋友。 gradually adv.逐步地The full moon gradually changes to a new moon.圆月会逐渐变成新月。 expect v.期待She’s expecting her baby to be born soon.她期待着宝宝的到来。 sheet n.纸张，被单Please write your name on this sheet of paper.请在这张纸上写下你的名字。 alphabet n.字母表The English alphabet has 26 letters.英语字母表有26个字母。 guarantee v.保证，担保n.保证金I guarantee that you will have our best service.我保证你会得到我们最优质的服务。 indeed adv.的确，真正地，事实上My coworkers told me that I did a good indeed.我的同事告诉我真的干的不错！ achievement n.成绩，成就，实现，完成He is known for his great achievements in the sport of tennis.他在网球运动上的成就令人瞩目。 quite adv.相当，十分My hair is quite soft and smooth.我的头发很柔顺。 transparent adj.透明的，清澈的，明净的The bear didn’t see the transparent glass, so he hit it.小熊没看见这块透明的玻璃，所以就撞上了。 willingness n.自愿The student raised his hand to show his willingness to clean the blackboard.这位学生举手表示自愿去擦黑板。 accessible adj.可进入的，可使用的The building is only accessible if you have a card.有卡才能进入这栋大楼。 temporary adj.暂时的，临时的She looks happy with her new temporary tattoo.她对这个临时的新纹身很满意。 absorb vt.吸收，汲取Sponges can absorb a lot of water.海绵可以吸收很多水。 tentative adj.试探性的，犹豫不决的When walking in darkness, every step you take is tentative.在黑暗中行走时，你走的每一步都是试探性的。 quarrel n.争吵，口角v.争吵，争论I had a terrible quarrel with my wife.我跟我的妻子大吵了一架。 resist v.抵抗，抵制The overweight girl managed to resist the temptation of hamburgers.这个胖女孩抵制住了汉堡的诱惑。 evident adj.显然的，明显的，明白的It is evident who the real murderer is.真正的凶手是谁很明显。 embassy n.大使馆，大使馆全体人员The US embassy in the U.K. is located in London.美国驻英大使馆位于伦敦。 beneath prep.在…下方adv.在下方Most of the iceberg is beneath the surface.冰山的大部分在海面之下。 politician n.政治家，政客The female politician is giving an election speech.女政治家正为竞选做演讲。 variety n.品种，种类，变化，多样化，多样性There is a wide variety of fruits on the table.桌子上有各种各样的水果。 drum n.鼓，圆桶v.击鼓The little guy played that song on the drums.这个小家伙用鼓演奏出那首曲子。 vehicle n.交通工具，机动车The vehicle drives off while carrying a container.那辆车载着一个集装箱开走了。 excellent adj.优秀的，极好的He’s an excellent student who always gets excellent scores.他是个优秀的学生，总是得高分。 curriculum n.课程，（学校或专业的）全部课程The curriculum includes math, science and English.这些课程包含数学、科学和英语。 evidence n.证据，证明v.证明They are gathering evidence to solve the case.为了侦破案件，他们正在收集证据。 recipe n.食谱She follows the recipe to cook.她照着食谱来做饭。 extreme adj.极端的n.极端The roller coaster is an extreme test of courage.过山车是对勇气的极端考验。 yummy adj.美味的，好吃的That pizza looks so yummy, give me a slice!这个披萨看起来太美味了，给我一片吧！ cushion n.坐垫v.减轻，缓和There are several chshions on the bed. It’s confortable.床上有几个垫子，很舒服呢。 destination n.目的地，终点The destination of their journey is the west.他们的目的地是西天。 grand adj.壮丽的，宏伟的，重大的n.一千美元，大钢琴This grand building has always been an attraction for tourists.这座宏伟的建筑一直吸引着游客前来参观。 inspire n.激发，激励，使生灵感His speech inspired so many people to fight for equality.他的演讲激励了很多人为平等而奋斗。 disappointed adj.失望的He was disappointed that his favorite football team lost.他很失望，因为他最喜欢的足球队输了。 proper adj.得体的，正确的，完全的At a cocktail party, you should wear a proper outfit.在酒会上，你应该穿得体的衣服。 poisonous adj.有毒的One bite from a poisonous snake could kill you.被毒蛇咬一口就能要你的命。 statesman n.政治家Statesmen always capture the attention of media.政治家总是受到媒体的关注。 relate v.相关，有联系，讲述The family tree shows everyone I’m related to.这个家谱显示了和我有关联的所有人。 sauce n.酱，调味汁Wow! The tomato sauce in the bowl looks so delicious.哇！碗里的番茄酱看起来很好吃的样子。 disease n.疾病The man has a heart disease. Get him to the hospital!这个男人有心脏病，快送他去医院！ desperate adj.绝望的，孤注一掷的The unemployed man looks so desperate.那个失业的男人看上去如此的绝望。 bound adj.受约束的，有义务的v.束缚，跳跃着前行n.跳跃These ropes are bound to the ring.这些绳子和铁环绑在了一起。 buffet n.自助餐，（火车内）餐室，冷餐桌v.反复敲打，打击，重击You can eat as much as you like at the buffet.吃自助餐的时候，你可以想吃多少就吃多少。 physician n.内科医生My physician told me to eat more fruits and vegetables.我的内科医生告诉我要多吃水果和蔬菜。 racial adj.种族的Racial origin has nothing to do with making friends.种族背景毫不影响结交朋友。 deposit v.存款，存放n.存款，定金I deposit money in my piggy bank when I can.当我有钱我会往我的存钱罐里存钱。 chest n.胸膛We can see his strong chest under his shirt.我们可以看到他衬衫下强壮的胸膛。 training n.训练，培养You should be prepared before training.训练前你得准备好。 sniff v.嗅，吸气n.嗅，吸气（声）You might see dogs at the airport sniffing for illegal drugs.你可能会在机场看见狗在嗅毒品的味道。 accelerate v.加速，增长，使增速，促进The car accelerated from 60km/h to 100km/h.汽车从60km/h加速到了100km/h。 quantity n.数量，数目I eat a large quantity of food every day.我每天都吃大量的食物。 meaning n.意义，意思This word has so many different meanings.这个单词有好多不同的意思。 pancake n.烙饼，薄饼In the west, they like to eat pancakes for breakfast.在西方，人们早餐喜欢吃薄烤饼。 pile n.一堆v.堆积，累积What a tall pile of books!多么高的一摞书！ awkward adj.尴尬的，不方便的He felt a bit awkward when receiving a bunch of crops.收到一束大麦，他有点尴尬。 petrol n.（英）汽油“Please fill my car up with petrol!” the driver said.司机说：”麻烦加满油！” complex adj.复杂的，难解的n.建筑群，情结Modern road system can be very complex.现代道路系统十分复杂。 glory n.光荣，荣誉Winning the first prize brings him much glory.得了第一名他感到非常光荣。 sculpture n.雕刻，雕塑The lion sculpture is made of stone.狮子雕塑是用石头刻的。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习20190424
entry.content: 复习liberty n.自由The bird flew from the cage and got liberty.这只鸟飞出了鸟笼得到了自由。 irrigate v.灌溉，冲洗This machine can irrigate the field.这台机器可以灌溉田地。 accompany v.陪伴，为…伴奏（或伴唱）I always accompany my children to their school.我总是陪着我的小孩去学校。 barrier n.障碍The road was closed by a barrier.这条路被一个路障封锁了。 biography n.传记文学，传记He likes reading the biography of famous people.他喜欢读名人传记。 voyage n.航海，航行v.航海The ship is on a vogage now.这艘船正在航行。 fiber n.纤维（物质）We can see the fibers of the rope under a magnifying glass.在放大镜下，我们能看见编成这条绳子的纤维。 chew v.嚼，咀嚼n.嚼碎，咀嚼The boy is chewing the rice.他在咀嚼米饭。 conventional adj.依照惯例的，依照传统的Although we can now pay online,some people still prefer the conventional method of cash.尽管我们现在可以线上支付了，部分人仍然喜欢传统的现金支付手段。 vast adj.辽阔的This vast desert looks impossible to pass.这片辽阔的沙漠看上去不可能穿越。 department n.部门，部，系Our company consists of financial department, sales department, and technical department.我们的公司由财务部、销售部和技术部组成。 mass n.众多，群众v.聚集A mass of people are waiting.一大堆人在等待。 serious adj.认真的，严肃的He is always very serious while working.他工作时总是很认真。 emergency n.紧急情况It’s an emergency. Get her to the hospital now!紧急情况，即刻送她去医院！ tongue n.舌头vi.吹管乐器The boy sticks out his tongue to make a face to me.男孩伸出了舌头来对我做鬼脸。 instruct v.指导，通知My mom instructs me how to play golf.我妈妈教我怎么打高尔夫。 strange adj.奇怪的，陌生的I met a guy wearing strange clothes on the subway.我在地铁上遇到了一个衣着奇怪的男人。 badminton n.羽毛球，羽毛球运动These kids are playing badminton in the park.小孩子们在公园打羽毛球。 diamond n.钻石Diamond rings are very popular among young couples.钻戒在年轻夫妻中十分流行。 bucket n.水桶，（机器上的）桶装物，大量The cute cat is hiding in a bucket.那只可爱的小猫躲在一个桶子里。 appropriate adj.合适的，适当的v.私占Cinderella’s foot size is appropriate for the glass shoe.灰姑娘刚好能穿进水晶鞋。 punishment n.惩罚，处罚The student was give punishment for doing something wrong.这个学生应为做错事受到了惩罚。 disgusting adj.令人厌恶的，令人无法接受的He finds the smell of the sock disgusting.袜子的味道实在是让他恶心。 non-violent adj.非暴力的Every conflict has a non-violent solution.每个争端都有非暴力的解决方式。 apartment n.（美）公寓，一套房间This apartment is so bright with these windows.这套公寓窗户多，很明亮。 colleague n.同事，同行I really learned a lot by discussing with my colleagues.通过和同事们讨论，我真的学到了很多。 associate v.联想，联合，联系，交往n.伙伴，同事adj.副的I associate this picture with a star.这图片让我联想到了星星。 senior adj.年长的，资格老的，地位较高的n.（大学或高中）毕业生Senior citizens should be respected.老年人应该被尊重。 parcel n.包裹The person has a lot of parcels to send on November 11th.这个人在双十一有很多包裹要送。 suspect n.嫌疑犯，可疑分子v.怀疑，猜疑，推测adj.可疑的The suspect was body-searched by a policeman.警察对嫌疑犯进行了搜身。 junior n.年少者，晚辈，（美国四年制大学）三年级学生adj.低年级的“Junior“ means young or younger children.“少年”是指年少或者更小的孩子。 forgive v.原谅，饶恕，宽恕“Please forgive me, my dear.” the man said to his girlfriend.“原谅我吧，亲爱的”这个男人向他女朋友说。 statistics n.统计数字，数据I use facts and statistics to prove my point.我用事实和统计数字来证明我的观点。 decision n.决定I’ve made my decision, I find the defendant guilty!我已做出决定，我认为被告罪名成立！ rid v.使摆脱Thank god! Finally I have gotten rid of all my debts.谢天谢地！我终于摆脱了全部债务！ survival n.生存，存活He taught me survival skills, like how to start a fire in the forest.他教我野外求生技能，比如如何在森林里生火。 amateur adj.业余爱好的，业余（身份）的n.业余爱好者，外行This office worker is also an amateur soccer player.这个上班族也是一名业余球员。 marble n.大理石，（游戏用的）玻璃弹子The table is made of marble.这张桌子是由大理石做的。 radiation n.辐射物，放射物Don’t get closer to radiation if you are not in protective suit.没有穿放射服就不要靠近。 altitude n.海拔，高度The altitude of this mountain is 8844 meters.这座山的海拔为8844米。 constant adj.持续不断的，不变的，始终如一的n.常数，恒量The constant noise from the construction site makes me crazy.建筑工地持续不断的噪音让我快疯啦。 carpenter n.木匠，木工The carpenter works on the house.木匠从事房屋建造工作。 abolish v.彻底废除The black slavery of America was abolished by the president in 1865.这位总统于1865年废除了美国的奴隶制度。 glance v.看一下n.一瞥，扫视She glanced at his computer screen to see what he was watching.她扫了一眼他的电脑想知道他在看什么。 dawn n.黎明v.破晓The rooster standing on the field crows at dawn.田野里的公鸡在黎明时分打鸣。 comprehension n.理解力，测试These guys must have a high level of comprehension to understand this.这俩人肯定有非常好的理解力才能看懂这幅画。 exploit v.剥削，利用，开发，开拓n.辉煌功绩The greedy employer exploits his workers for his own profits.这个贪婪的老板为了自己的利益剥削工人。 grasp v.抓住，领会n.紧握I grasp the money in my right hand.我把钱紧紧地抓在右手里。 breast n.胸膛，乳房，胸脯肉She held her baby to her breast to give some milk.她把宝宝放在胸前喂母乳。 spiritual adj.精神（上）的，宗教（上）的Living a simple life, she devoted herself to the pursuit of spiritual world.她裹着简朴的生活，致力于追求自己的精神世界。 assumption n.假定，设想Having a baby is just their assumption.有个宝宝只是他们的设想而已。 strait n.海峡，窘迫It may take 2 hours to swim across the strait.游过这湾海峡可能得花2小时。 situation n.形势，局面，处境，状况It’s hard to choose which way to go in this situation.这种情形下很难选择出路。 hobby n.业余爱好，癖好People have different hobbies, some like reading books and some like playing football.人们有不同的业余爱好，有人喜欢读书，有人喜欢踢球。 coincidence n.巧合，巧事They’re wearing the same dress today, what a coincidence!她们今天穿了一样的衣服，真是太巧了！ frighten v.使惊恐，使害怕My brother jumped out of the closet and frightened me.我的弟弟从衣柜里跳出来，吓到我了。 ruin v.毁灭，毁坏，（使）破产n.毁灭，废墟These buildings were ruined by a powerful earthquake.一场大地震摧毁了这些建筑。 excite v.使激动，使兴奋She was excited when she rceived email from the interviewer.收到面试官的邮件时她很激动。 delighted adj.欣喜的，快乐的She was very delighted that she got full marks in the final exam.期末考试得了一百分，她开心的不得了！ wage n.薪水，报酬v.开展，进行（战争、运动）The worker was so happy when she got her wages.这个工人拿到工资的时候，很开心。 bandage n.绷带v.用绷带绑扎I hurt my hand, so I wrapped it in a bandage.我把手弄伤了，所以包了绷带。 bond n.联系，束缚物，联结物vi.团结一致Everyone has a bone with another person in this web.在这张网络中，每个人都与其他人有关系。 basin n.水池，流域，盆The basin in our bathroom was very clean.我们的浴池的水池很干净。 condemn v.谴责，责备We all condemned him for his bad behavior.我们都指责他的坏行为。 superior adj.较高级的，上层的，出众的n.上级，高手The boy’s five-stripe badge shows that he is superior to the other boy.他肩上的五道杠表明他比另一个人级别高。 deed n.行为Superman did many good deeds for people.超人为人们做了很多好事。 vivid adj.（颜色）鲜艳的，强烈的（颜色，光），生动的，清晰的（记忆、描述）She is dressed in vivid colors.她穿的很鲜艳。 ownership n.所有权The couple have the certificate to prove their ownership of this house.房产证可以证明这对夫妻拥有了房子的所有权。 awful adj.糟糕的，讨厌的，可怕的，极坏的This fish smells awful. Take it away!这条鱼的气味太糟糕了，快把它拿走！ prevent v.预防，阻止The mother prevented her child from eating sweets.妈妈不让她的小孩吃糖。 instrument n.乐器，工具Which is your favorite musical instrument?你最喜欢的乐器是哪一种？ entrance n.入口，通道，大门口The entrance is over there. Follow the red carpet.入口在那边，顺着红毯过去吧。 roof n.屋顶，顶部The cats climbed on the roof of the house.猫咪爬上了屋顶。 telegram n.电报They used to use telegrams for messages.他们曾经用电报发送信息。 fortnight n.两星期，十四日She can keep the book for a fortnight, which means two weeks.她的借书期限是两周。 drawback n.缺点，障碍，不利条件His short arms are his biggest drawback, he’s struggling to reach the toilet paper!他的小短手是他最大的缺点，他很努力地去拿厕纸。 thus adv.因此，这样，如此She studied hard, thus she got high marks.她用功读书，因此获得高分。 mourn v.哀悼，哀伤They are mourning the death of their friend.他们在哀悼死去的朋友。 swear v.发誓，郑重地说，咒骂I swear I’m telling the truth.我发誓我讲的是实话。 significance n.重要性The necklace is of great significance to her.这条项链对她有着重要意义。 perfume n.香水v.使充满芳香This perfume smells like flowers.这个香水闻起来像花一样。 whisper vt.低声低语地讲，悄悄地说v.耳语，密谈n.私语，谣传My friend whispered a secret in my ear.我的朋友在我耳边悄悄地告诉了我一个秘密。 distinction n.优秀，卓越，杰出，差别，区分Receiving a medal is a sign of distinction.获得奖牌是优秀的象征。 consultant n.顾问，会诊医师，顾问医生The consultant will explain how we should run our business.顾问将会解释我们应该如何经营我们的事业。 condition n.环境，形势，条件The hotel room is in poor condition.这家宾馆的条件挺差。 foresee v.预知，预料，预测He foresaw that the stock market would rise.他预测到了股市行情。 anxiety n.焦虑It is difficult to disguise her great anxiety.很难掩饰她严重的焦虑。 orbit v.环绕…的轨道运行n.轨道vi.环绕…的轨道运行All of our planets orbit the sun.所有行星环绕太阳运行。 botanical adj.植物（学）的I went to the botanical gardens to see the beautiful plants.我们去了植物园欣赏那些美丽的植物。 insect n.昆虫There’re many kinds of insects.昆虫有很多不同的种类。 drug n.药物，麻醉品，毒品v.下麻药This drug will lower your blood pressure.这个药会降低你的血压。 cough v.咳嗽n.咳嗽It’s polite to cover your mouth when you cough.咳嗽的时候挡着嘴是种礼貌。 tremble v.发抖，摇动n.震动That movie made him tremble with fear.这部电影让他害怕得发抖。 league n.社团，联盟v.使…结盟，与…联合This is a group photo of our football league.这是我们足球社团的一张合影。 challenge v.挑战n.挑战He likes to climb and challenge himself.他喜欢攀岩和挑战自我。 digest v.消化n.摘要The food he ate was hard to digest.他吃的食物很难消化。 lavatory n.厕所，盥洗室The lavatory in the middle is for the disabled.中间的厕所是给残疾人用的。 drawer n.抽屉Remember to keep all your files in the drawer.记得把你所有文件都放在抽屉里。 forehead n.前额，前部She cares so much about her forehead.她非常在意她的前额。 botany n.植物学，（总称）一个地区的植物Botany is the study of plants.植物学是研究植物的学科。 visual adj.看的，视觉的The color of this dress is just a visual trick.这条裙子颜色只是一个视觉游戏罢了。 gravity n.重力，引力An apple fell on his head because of gravity.苹果因为重力砸到了他的头上。 tear v.撕裂，撕碎n.眼泪The hands tear the wall wide open.一双手撕裂了这面墙。 glue n.胶水v.用胶粘Glue is very useful for sticking things together!要把东西粘在一起，胶水会十分有用。 delight n.高兴，愉快，高兴事v.使高兴“I finally got this bag!” she yelled with delight.“我终于买到这个包包了！”她高兴地尖叫着。 arithmetic n.算术，计算The boy is doing arithmetic homework. It’s easy for him.那个小男孩在写算术作业。这对他来说很容易。 period n.时期Each class period is one hour.每节课的时间是一小时。 resemble v.像，相像，相似My dog resembles a brown mop.我的狗像一根棕色的拖把。 betray v.背叛，（非故意地）暴露My girlfriend betrayed me. She fell in love with someone else.我的女朋友背叛了我，她跟别人好上了。 abuse v.虐待，辱骂，（对麻醉毒品、兴奋剂等的）非法服用Stop abusing her, you evil old lady!!不要再虐待她了，你这个坏嬷嬷。 brake v.刹车n.刹车，制动器，闸Not again - I hate having to brake my car for cows.不要吧，又来？我讨厌为牛刹车！ supper n.晚餐They are having their last supper together.他们正在吃最后的晚餐。 conservative adj.保守的，保守党的n.保守主义者The man has such a conservative attitude he even despises the couple holding hands.他保守得连情侣牵手都看不惯。 immigration n.移民，移居入境Immigration to Germany has risen in recent times.如今，向德国的移民越来越多了。 attach v.贴，系，附上The card player has several pieces of paper attached to his face.这个打牌的人脸上被贴了好多纸条。 apparent adj.显然的，明白的，清晰可见的，表面上的，貌似（真实）的It’s apparent that the boy is taller than the girl.很明显，那个男孩比女孩高。 statue n.雕像There stands a huge statue in New York city.一座巨大的雕像坐落在纽约市。 adolescence n.青春期，青春He began to shave after hitting adolescence.进入青春期后，他开始刮胡子了。 receipt n.收据，收条，收入You will get a receipt when you buy things in a store.当你在店里买东西时，会得到一个收据。 indicate vt.表明，表示，显示Can you guess what the graph indicates?你能猜到这个图表表明着什么吗？ shock v.（使）震惊，（使）震动n.震动，震惊，冲击，休克She was shocked to see how much her stock value had fallen.看到股票跌了这么多，她真是惊呆了！ eager adj.热切的，渴望的，急不可耐的The kids are eager to eat the cake on the table.孩子们急不可耐想要吃掉桌上的蛋糕。 federal adj.联邦制的，联邦政府的The USA is a federal republic.美国是一个联邦共和国。 entertainment n.娱乐，招待，款待We go to the movies for entertainment.我们看电影是为了娱乐。 stubborn adj.顽固的，难对付的Both of them are stubborn and don’t want to say sorry first.他俩都很顽固，不愿意第一个道歉。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习20190423
entry.content: 复习laundry n.洗衣，送洗的衣物Doing laundry is part of my housework.我的家务之一是洗衣服。 razor n.剃刀，刮胡刀He shaved his face with a razor.他正在用刮胡刀刮胡子。 authentic adj.真实的，真正的This diamond isn’t fake - I’m sure it’s authentic.这颗钻石不是假的，我敢保证它是真的！ commercial adj.商业性的，贸易的n.商业广告This is the busiest commercial street in the city.这是这个城市最繁华的商业街了。 waist n.腰The man put the measuring tape around his waist.这个人在腰上围了一条软尺。 tendency n.趋向，趋势，倾向There’s a good tendency for our company’s business.我们公司的业务有一个良好的趋势。 coal n.煤，煤块Coal is a very popular form of energy.煤是种很常见的能源。 wire n.电缆，电线，金属线Look, many birds are sitting on the wires!看，有很多鸟站在电线上呢！ tense adj.（神经）紧张的v.使拉紧，拉紧n.时态I feel really tense about the coming exam.我真的很担心即将来临的考试。 astronaut n.宇航员I would love to be an astronaut and go to space.我想成为一名宇航员并进入太空。 grocery n.食品杂货店Every day she goes shopping in the grocery store.她每天都去食品杂货店购物。 suspension n.悬浮，暂停In outer space, things are in a state of suspension.在外太空，东西处于悬浮状态。 conscience n.良心，良知My conscience always tells me to do something right.我的良心经常告诉我要做对的事。 cast v.投，掷，放钓n.演员表、演员阵容He’s going to cast that rock by the seaside.他在海边准备把石块投掷出去。 helicopter n.直升机We took a helicopter ride over the sea.我们搭乘直升机飞过大海。 monument n.纪念碑，遗迹，遗址The Washington Monument stands in the center of Washington DC.华盛顿纪念碑矗立在华盛顿市中心。 starve v.（使）饿死，挨揍The bear is starving, it doesn’t have enough food to eat.这只熊快饿死了，它没有食物吃。 splendid adj.壮观的，辉煌的，华丽的Look at this splendid sunset! I love this place.看这落日多美啊！我真喜欢这里。 servant n.仆人This is my servant with the drinks.这是我送饮料的仆人。 mess n.凌乱状态，混乱状态v.浪费时间，瞎闹My dog made a mess in the room.我的狗狗把房间里弄得乱七八糟的。 architecture n.（总称）建筑物，建筑学，建筑体系，结构The bright colors is one feature of ancient Chinese architecture.艳丽的色彩是中国古建筑的特点之一。 retire v.退休，退役The retired couple are traveling together.这对已经退休的夫妻正在一起旅行。 harmless adj.无害的，无恶意的，不致伤的The tiger is locked in the cage, so it’s harmless to the people outside.老虎被关在笼子里，所以对外面的人无害。 demand v.强烈要求，需要n.要求（坚决的），需求The bad guy demanded $1,000,000, or he would kill the boy.坏人要求100万赎金，否则他就要撕票。 currency n.货币，流通In different countries, we must use a different currency to buy things.在不同的国家，我们得用不同的货币来买东西。 punctuate v.加标点与，强调Which one do I use to punctuate my sentence?这个句子里我该用哪个标点呢? balcony n.阳台，剧院楼厅I like to stand on my apartment’s balcony.我喜欢站在公寓的阳台上。 assess v.评估How do you assess the risk level of this investment? Low, medium or high?你对这次投资的风险评估是怎样的？低，中等，还是高风险？ deliver v.递送，交付，履行Santa delivers many gifts on December 25th.圣诞老人在12月25号会递送很多礼物。 cautious adj.小心的，谨慎的The maid is very cautious not to make a mistake in front of the empress.这个丫鬟在皇后面前非常谨慎，不敢犯任何错误。 liquid n.液体adj.液体的Water is a kind of liquid without color.水是一种没有颜色的液体。 flour n.面粉，粉状物质There is a bag of flour.这里有一包面粉。 enquiry n.询问，问询处I make enquiries at the information desk.我在咨询台咨询了一些事情。 budget n.预算v.预算，安排adj.廉价的I don’t have much money for the budget.我的钱不够预算。 drill v.钻孔，在…上钻孔n.钻头The worker drills into the wall.工人在墙上钻孔。 sacred adj.神圣的，宗教（性）的In India, the elephant is a sacred animal.在印度，大象被视为神圣的动物。 allergic adj.过敏的，对…讨厌的Look at his face! The poor guy was allergic to seafood.看他的脸，这个可怜的家伙对海鲜过敏。 muddy adj.泥泞的，浑浊的v.显得扑朔迷离It’ll take hours to drive down this muddy road.驶过这段泥泞的小路要花好几个小时。 athletic adj.运动的，体育的，强壮的The athletic man runs for long distances without needing to rest.这个运动员可以跑很长的距离，并且不用休息。 equipment n.设备High-tech equipment is used in the factory.工厂运用高科技设备。 neat adj.整洁的，不掺水的The folded clothes look very neat in the drawer.抽屉里折叠起来的衣服看起来很整洁。 sorrow n.悲伤，苦恼，伤心v.感到悲伤，为…悲痛Her tears are full of sorrow.她的眼泪充满悲伤。 circus n.马戏团，环形广场We saw many animals at the circus.我们在马戏团看到了许多动物。 iron n.熨斗adj.刚强的v.烫（衣），熨Use an iron to straighten clothing.用熨斗把衣服烫平。 ash n.灰，灰烬The ashtray is full of ash.这个烟灰缸里满是烟灰。 settle v.安顿，调停They are getting settled in their new house.他们在新房子里安顿下来。 symptom n.症状Flu symptoms include a headache, sore throat and a fever.流感的症状包括头痛、嗓子痛和发烧。 inn n.客栈，小旅馆This traditional inn is surrounded by trees.这个传统的小旅店被绿树环绕。 disappoint v.使失望，使扫兴，使受挫折The exam result disappointed him.考试成绩让他很失望。 nervous adj.紧张的，焦虑不安的The father is nervous about his baby’s birth.这个父亲因为宝宝的出生很紧张。 bungalow n.平房，小屋I live in a little bungalow by the beach.我住在沙滩边的小屋里。 brand n.商标，品牌v.归为（不好的事物）This famous brand makes many different products.这个著名品牌有各式各样的周边产品。 clap v.拍（手），鼓（掌）n.轻拍（以示热情招呼），拍手（喝彩），鼓掌（欢迎），善意的拍打In a show of support, they all began to clap their hands.为了表示支持，他们开始鼓掌。 evolution n.进化，演变This picture shows the evolution of humans over millions of years.这张图展示了百万年来人类的进化。 independence n.（国家的）独立，（人的）自立，独立America gained its independence from Britain in 1776!1776年，美国脱离英国取得独立！ fear v.害怕，担心n.顾虑，胆怯The little girl fears the injection.这个小女孩害怕打针。 occupy v.占领，占据，侵占，担任（职务），任职The little dog has occupied her heart.这只小狗占据了她的心。 dormitory n.宿舍，学生宿舍，宿舍楼Look! This dormitory is so dirty!快看呀！这件宿舍好脏！ greedy adj.贪婪的，贪心的，贪吃的The greedy woman wanted more food from the pot before she’d even finished her bowl.贪婪的她吃着碗里的，想着锅里的。 standard n.标准，规格adj.标准的Should this be the standard for the perfect figure?这种身材是完美身材的标准吗？ dioxide n.二氧化碳Carbon dioxide is making our planet warmer.二氧化碳正在使地球升温。 beyond prep.超过，在能力、理解力之外，除…之外adv.更远处，更多，以后I couldn’t hit him as he was beyond
