my reach.我打不了他，因为我根本够不着他。 pregnant adj.怀孕的The pregnant woman is drinking water.这个怀孕的女人正在喝水。 heat n.高温，【物理学】热vt.给…加热Be careful of the heat from the fire!小心这堆火的高温！ permanent adj.永久的，持久的Her eyebrows are being made permanent.这位女士正在做永久纹眉。 cordless adj.（电器）不用电线的A cordless mouse is convenient for using your computer.操作电脑时，无线鼠标很好用。 presentation n.演讲，颁奖仪式The sheep gave a presentation to his friends about protecting themselves.这个绵羊给小伙伴们开展了一次讲座。 intention n.意图，意向，目的，打算I have every intention of buying a house, so I must start saving now.我打算买房，所以现在必须开始存钱了。 adequate adj.充足的，充分的，足够的，尚可的，过得去的I have prepared an adequate amount of food for 5 people.我为五个人准备了充足的食物。 delicate adj.易碎的，易坏的，脆弱的Porcelain cups are very delicate, do not drop them!瓷杯易碎，小心掉落！ pulse n.脉搏v.（使）跳动，搏动，震动，（感情等）洋溢，充满The doctor felt the patient’s pulse.医生给病人把了脉。 insure v.为…投保，保险，买保险He insures the cars against traffic accidents.他为车投保了事故险。 savage n.野蛮人，粗鲁的人adj.凶猛的，猛烈的v.（狗等）乱咬Their wordy conversation made me feel like a total savage!他们文邹邹的对话让我觉得自己完全就像个野人！ glad adj.高兴的I am very glad to hear from my mother.我很高兴收到母亲的来信。 rely v.依赖，依靠，信赖Babies rely on their parents for food and care.宝宝们依靠爸妈照顾和提供食物。 conductor n.指挥，售票员The conductor is the leader of the band.指挥是乐队的老大。 rescue v.营救，救援n.营救，救援The fireman rescued the little boy from the fire.消防员把小男孩从火中救了出来。 fee n.费用，酬金He was shocked by the huge amount of hidden fees behind such a haircut.他被这个发型背后的巨额隐形性费用惊呆了。 accomplish v.完成，做到，实现I have accomplished my tasks on schedule.我已经完成了计划上的任务。 organ n.器官Every organ plays an important role in our body.每一个器官在我们身体中都扮演着重要的角色。 patience n.耐心，忍耐Fishing demands a great deal of patience.钓鱼需要极大的耐心。 candidate n.（官职、获奖资格等的）候选人The candidates are presenting the speeches for the election.候选人正在为选举发表演说。 merchant n.商人，批发商The merchant checks the quality of his produce.商人在检查农产品质量。 construct v.建造，构筑The workers are constructing a tall building.工人们正在建造一座高楼。 cure v.治愈，治疗These pills will cure your sickness.这些药片能治好你的病。 ridiculous adj.可笑的，荒谬的She looks ridiculous wearing this dress when waliing in the street.她穿着这件衣服上街，看上去太可笑了。 fluency n.流畅，流利He speaks with perfect fluency.他说话极其流畅。 hug v.拥抱，紧抱n.拥抱The happy couple hug in front of their new home.这对开心的夫妇想用在他们的新房子前。 pardon v.原谅，宽恕excl.请再说一遍n.原谅，饶恕，赦免The king pardoned the prisoner.君主赦免了那名囚犯。 fur n.毛皮，毛皮外套，人造毛A fur coat is very warm, but very expensive!皮毛外套很温暖，但也很昂贵。 bacterium n.细菌This kind of bacterium can cause a very dangerous disease.这种细菌能引发非常危险的疾病。 shoulder n.肩膀，肩部vt.肩负，承当The old man has pain in his shoulder.这位老年人肩膀疼。 religious adj.虔诚的He is a religious believer, he goes to chuch every week.他是个虔诚的教徒，每周都会去教堂。 pupil n.小学生The pupils are walking to school.小学生们正在走路去学校。 seminar n.研讨会A teacher and some students are attending a math seminar.一名老师和学生们正在开数学研讨会。 salute v.向…行举手礼，赞扬，赞颂n.致敬，欢迎The policeman salutes me as I walk by.当我走过时，这位警察向我行礼。 vacation n.休假，假期v.休假，度假The girl took a vacation on the beach.这个女孩在海边度假。 pilot n.飞行员adj.实验性的v.给…领航，驾驶Wow! The pilots in the movie look so cool!哇塞！这部电影里的飞行员啊好酷好帅啊！ mustard n.芥末adj.芥末色的I like to add some mustard on my sushi.我喜欢往寿司上加点芥末。 agriculture n.农业We depend on agriculture to give us food.我们依靠农业给我们提供食物。 lip n.嘴唇，唇状物Her lips are the most beautiful part of her face.她的嘴唇是她脸上最漂亮的部分。 extraordinary adj.非同寻常的The teacher said my daughter has extraordinary musical talent.老师说我女儿在音乐方面天赋异禀。 wounded adj.受伤的The wounded soldier goes to the doctor every day.这位负伤的士兵每天都去看医生。 pure adj.纯净的，纯粹的，纯洁的The water seems so pure and clean.水看起来真纯净。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习20190422
entry.content: 复习frost n.霜冻，严寒v.结霜，冻死The leaf was covered with frost.树叶上覆盖率一层霜。 spear n.标枪v.刺戳She used her full strength to throw the spear at the target.她用尽全力把标枪向目标仍去。 cubic adj.立方体的，立体的，立方的There is a cubic cake on the plate.盘子里有一块方形的蛋糕。 sight n.视力，看见，视线，景物v.瞄准，看见，观测She can see the last line in the sight test!她的视力检查中可以看清最后一行！ spread v.伸开，伸展，散步，传播，摊开，覆盖n.伸开，伸展，散步，传播，摊开，范围Spread the butter evenly to all parts of the bread.将黄油均匀地涂抹到面包的各个部分。 consistent adj.始终如一的，持续的，一致的Her dream of becoming a nurse remained consistent throughout her life.在她的一生中，成为一名护士的愿望始终没有变。 exhibition n.展览，展览会，奖学金The art gallery had an exhibition of my photos.这个艺术画廊举办了我的影作品展。 bush n.灌木丛Look, there is a rabbit in the bush!看，那丛灌木里有一只兔子！ crop n.作物，庄稼，一批，大量The farmers are planting new rice crops.农民在种新水稻。 consequence n.结果，后果，重要性The consequence of eating too much junk food is getting fat.吃太多垃圾食品的后果就是长胖。 snatch v.强夺n.片断The boy snatches the ball from his friend.这个男孩从朋友手上把球夺走。 clumsy adj.笨拙的，不灵活的She finds yoga difficult because she’s clumsy!她觉得瑜伽很难，因为她的身体不太灵活。 freeze v.冻结，使冻僵n.严寒，冻结She was able to freeze the mountain with her magic.她用自己的法术把整座山冻结了。 figure n.体型，数字v.想出，估计，计算出Men’s figures are different from women’s figures.男性和女性的体型是不一样的。 population n.人口，全体居民The population of the world is about seven billion people.世界人口大约有70亿。 surrounding adj.周围的，环境的，周围的（事物）The sheep is constrained by the surrounding fence.那只羊被周围的栅栏给关起来了。 sword n.剑，刀The man is holding the sword over his head.他把剑举在头上。 curtain n.窗帘，幕（布）v.装帘子，遮掉The play starts as the curtain opens.帘幕打开的时候，戏剧就开始了。 construction n.建筑业，建筑物I work in construction - I build houses.我在建筑行业工作 - 我盖房子。 heel n.（鞋）后跟v.给（鞋）订后掌，倾侧，紧跟The red shoes with the high heels look great.这双红色高跟鞋真漂亮。 interpreter n.口译员，口译者The interpreter helps the two people to communicate with each other.口译员帮助这两个人相互交流。 canal n.运河，河流This city has many canals running through it.这座城市有很多运河穿流其中。 criterion n.标准，准则The criterion for selecting each candidate varies from one to another.我们挑选每位选手的标准各不相同。 pavement n.人行道Please walk on the pavement, not the grass.请在人行道上行走，不要践踏草坪。 among prep.在…中间，在…之中The red apple is eye-catching among the yellow ones.这个红苹果在黄苹果中很显眼。 arrange v.整理，达成协议I arrange my toys so that they can fit in a box.我把玩具排列好，这样它们就能都放在一个盒子里。 pace n.步，步伐v.踱步The ducks follow their mother’s pace to cross the road.小鸭子们跟着妈妈的步伐过马路。 harmful adj.有害的Smoking is harmful to your health.吸烟对你的健康有害。 advocate v.提倡，为…辩护n.提倡者The man is advocating that we should save water.他正在提倡大家节约用水。 powder n.粉，火药v.抹粉Flour is a kind of white powder.面粉是一种白色的粉末。 friction n.摩擦，摩擦力The friction heats up the wood and starts a fire.摩擦力使得火柴着了起来。 rot v.（使）腐烂n.腐烂Eat your fruit before it starts to rot.在水果腐烂前吃掉。 joy n.欢乐，喜悦，乐事The old man is sitting on the stairs with a look of joy.这个老人面带喜悦地坐在阶梯上。 cater v.供应伙食，为（集会、婚礼等）承办酒席We hired a fancy restaurant to cater for our party.我们雇了一家很棒的饭店给我们的派对供应伙食。 temple n.庙宇，圣堂，神殿，太阳穴The old temple was beautiful at night.这个古老的庙宇在晚上十分漂亮。 deserve v.值得，应得，应受She deserves such a high ranking because of her popularity.以她的高人气，她应该得到这样的名次。 dessert n.甜点Do you want to have some ice cream for dessert?你想来一杯冰激凌当甜点吗？ welfare n.福利The organization aims to improve the welfare of animals.这个组织旨在提升动物福利。 bow v.鞠躬，点头，弯腰n.弓，蝴蝶结，鞠躬The singer bowed to us after the show.演出结束后，歌手向我们鞠躬致谢。 contrary adj.相反的，对立的，矛盾的，叛逆的The lady and the man hold contrary views.这位女士和男士持有相反的意见。 vain adj.徒劳的，没有真正意义的，没有真正价值的，无关紧要的Using a basket to fetch water, all his efforts were in vain.他用竹篮子打水，所以他所有的努力都徒劳无功的。 prejudice n.偏见，损害vt.使抱偏见Some people had a prejudice against black people in the past.过去人们对黑人有偏见。 ache n.疼痛v.觉得疼痛Mark had an ache in his back.马克背部疼痛。 absurd adj.可笑的，荒唐的n.荒唐It’s absurd for a grown man to ride such a small bike.成年人骑这么小的自行车是很可笑的。 skeptical adj.表示怀疑的He told me he can fly, but of course I’m skeptical.他告诉我他可以飞，不过当然我表示怀疑。 diverse adj.不同的，差异的，多种多样的I can see diverse colors on their hands.在他们手上我能看到各种各样的颜色。 ministry n.（政府的）部，内阁，（全体）牧师Governments have many different ministries, such as the Ministry of Health.政府设有许多不同的部门，比如卫生部。 comb v.梳理n.梳理The mother is combing her daughter’s hair.妈妈正在帮她的女儿梳头发。 reasonable adj.合理的，通情达理的The snacks are sold at a reasonable price.这些零食售价十分合理。 fold v.折叠n.折叠She is good at folding paper into animals.她很擅长折纸。 oval adj.椭圆形的n.椭圆形The mirror is in oval shape.这镜子是椭圆形的。 entire adj.全部的，完整的，整个的From the airplane, I could see the entire city.在飞机上，我可以看到整个城市。 vague adj.含糊的，模糊的，不明确的，茫然的He didn’t understand her vague words.他没有理解女孩含糊的话语。 attempt vt.视图，尝试，努力去做n.尝试The cat attempts to catch that fish!那个喵星人视图抓到那条鱼！ correspond v.通信，相符，一致We correspond by email to stay in touch.我们靠电子邮件来保持联系。 chimney n.烟囱The chimney spits out smoke every day.烟囱每天都往外喷烟。 leak v.漏，泄露n.漏洞Water is leaking through the ceiling! Poor guy!他家房顶正漏水呢！真可怜！ grain n.谷物种子，谷物，少量v.使成粒状Grains like wheat are used to make bread.像小麦这样的谷物是用来做面包的。 theory n.理论，原理That student is interested in all kinds of science theories.那孩子对各种科学理论都感兴趣。 urban adj.城市的，城镇的，都市的I like urban environments, especially the landscape at night.我喜欢都市的氛围，尤其是夜晚的景色。 telescope n.望远镜vi.缩短adj.套筒的，伸缩式的vt.使套入You can see many distant stars through the telescope.通过望远镜，你可以看到许多遥远的星星。 achieve v.完成，达到，获得，实现I finally achieved my goal of winning the race.我赢了跑步比赛，终于达成了我的目标。 lack n.欠缺v.缺乏，不足Because of a lack of water, few plants can grow here.因为缺乏水，植物很难在这儿存活下来。 pack v.打包n.行李My cat packed his stuff to leave.我家的猫打包行囊，准备离家出走。 burden n.负担，重担v.使负重，装载，烦扰Our burden is too heavy, because we have too much homework.我们的负担太重了，因为每天都有很多作业。 considerate adj.体贴的，考虑周到的He is a considerate husband reminded his wife to take an umbrella.他是一位体贴的丈夫，会提醒妻子带伞。 pest n.害虫，讨厌的人（或东西）Pests are annoying and harmful bugs.害虫是讨厌又有害的昆虫。 disappointment n.沮丧His disappointment at not getting the job showed in his face.他未得到工作，沮丧就写在脸上。 sleeve n.袖子One sleeve is too long while the other is fine.这只袖子太长了点，但另一只还好。 frequent adj.时常的，频繁的Her frequent online shopping costs her a lot of money.频繁地网上购物花了她很多钱。 anecdote n.轶事，趣闻The anecdote is about the mysterious creature in the ancient times.这桩轶事是关于古代的神兽的。 dimension n.维度，方面These shapes have three dimensions.这些图形有三个维度。 affect v.影响，感动，作用Second hand smoking may affect other people’s health.二手烟会影响其他人的健康。 aware adj.意识到，知道的He suddenly became aware of how to figure out the problem.他突然知道该怎么解决这道难题了。 courtyard n.庭院，院子The dog is having fun in the courtyard.狗狗在院子里愉快地玩耍。 expert n.专家adj.熟练的，专业的He is an expert at fixing the computer.他是修电脑的专家。 squirrel n.松鼠v.存储That squirrel looks so cute in snow.那只松鼠在雪地里看起来真可爱。 acquisition n.获得，掌握，获得物，取得物Reading is essential to the acquisition of knowledge.阅读对于获取知识来说是必要的。 plenty n.丰富，大量We have plenty of fruit and vegetables.我们有充足的水果和蔬菜。 compensate v.补偿，赔偿，给…报酬He must compensate for his mistakes.他必须弥补他的过失。 constitution n.组成，结构，宪法，章程The chemical constitution of vitamin B6 seems quite complex.维他命b6的化学构造看起来很复杂。 professor n.教授The actor plays the role of a professor in that TV series.那个演员在那部电视剧中扮演一位教授。 cathedral n.大教堂adj.有权威的We visited a magnificent cathedral.我们参观了一座宏伟的教堂。 satisfy v.（使）满意，满足，符合…的标准The delicious pizza satisfied that boy.这个好吃的披萨满足了那个小朋友。 experiment n.实验v.进行实验The scientist is doing an experiment.科学家在做一项实验。 accumulate vt.积攒，积累vi.聚积，堆积He accumulates money for future use.他攒了些钱，以供将来使用。 pyramid n.金字塔I will travel to Egypt to look at the pyramids.我想去埃及旅行看看金字塔。 lame adj.瘸的，【借口或解释】无说服力的，站不住脚的，蹩脚的He walked into the hospital with a lame leg.他跛着腿走进医院。 fibre n.纤维（物质），性格，质地We use optical fibre to channel information effectively.我们运用光纤来有效传播信息。 lorry n.卡车，运货汽车All the stuff was carried in the lorry.所有货物都搬上卡车了。 undivided adj.（注意力）专一的，（国家）没分开He givies undivided attention to his work and doesn’t hear the phone ringing.他专心致志地工作，并没有听到手机铃声。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习20190421
entry.content: 复习noble adj.贵族的，高贵的n.贵族The women in the expensive dressess come from a noble family.这些穿着贵族衣服的女人出身高贵。 duty n.责任，职责，义务，税It’s our duty to protect the global environment.保护环境，人人有责。 distinguish v.区别，识别，辨别，使显著It’s easy to distinguish the blue man from the gray men.很容易就能把小蓝人从小灰人中辨别出来。 energetic adj.精力充沛的，充满活力的She is an energetic child.她是个精力旺盛的孩子。 ugly adj.丑陋的I have never seen such an ugly dog as this.我从未见过如此丑的狗。 lung n.肺We use our lungs to breathe.我们用肺呼吸。 punish v.惩罚，处罚Her husband was punished for doing something wrong.她老公因为做错了事，受到了惩罚。 essay n.论文，随笔You must complete this essay before graduation.毕业之前，你一定要完成论文。 tomb n.墓穴，坟墓vt.埋葬The tomb is full of treasure.墓穴里满是宝藏。 ecology n.生态，生态学We should protect the native ecology.我们应该保护原生生态。 expedition n.探险，短途旅行They went on a mountain expedition.他们去山上探险。 smooth adj.光滑的，平稳的v.使平稳She said the taste of the chocolate is as smooth as silk. Give me some!她说这种巧克力的口感如丝绸般润滑，给我一点试试！ reputation n.声誉，名声He has a good reputation among sportsmen, since he always wins.因为经常赢得比赛，所以他在体育圈里有很高的声誉。 cheat v.作弊，欺骗，哄骗，蒙骗n.骗子，骗术The man cheated in the card game.那个男人在打牌时作弊。 occupation n.职业，工作Which occupation will you take on when you grow up?你长大后想做什么工作呢？ forecast n.预测，预报v.预报，预测The forecast shows that things are going up!预测显示形式在好转。 alley n.小巷，小径The narrow alley winds through the old town.那条窄巷弯弯曲曲地穿过古老的小镇。 sneaker n.运动鞋，鬼鬼祟祟的人My yellow sneakers are comfortable, fit my feet, and look good! Awesome!我的黄色运动鞋很舒服，合脚又好看！真棒！ admit v.承认，准许…静茹，允许…加入His mother made him admit that the broke the vase.他妈妈让小男孩承认是他把花瓶打碎了。 sob vi.呜咽，抽泣，发呜咽声，哭诉n.呜咽，哭泣That movie was so sad. I couldn’t stop sobbing!这部电影太催泪了，我止不住的啜泣！ maid n.女仆，少女That maid cafe mainly focuses on the male customers.那家女仆主题咖啡厅的顾客主要为男性。 wax n.蜡，蜡状物v.给…上蜡adj.蜡制的The wax of the red candle fell on the table.红蜡烛的蜡油滴到了桌子上。 escape v.逃跑，避开，避免n.逃跑，逃脱She ran to escape from the fire.她跑着逃离火灾现场。 ambition n.雄心，强烈欲望，抱负，（具体的）追求目标This powerful man’s political ambition was to unify the tree kingdoms.作为一个有权势的男人，他的政治雄心是一统三国。 clerk n.办事员The bank clerk is working behind the counter.银行职员正在柜台后面办公。 mad adj.异常狂暴的，精神错乱的，蠢笨的n.狂怒He got mad with so much paper work.如此多的工作令他发狂。 appreciation n.感激，欣赏，鉴识，评价My dog expressed its appreciation of the food I gave it.我的狗狗对我给它提供的食物表示感谢。 severe adj.严酷的，剧烈的It’s hard for people to walk in these severe weather conditions.人们在如此严酷的天气下行走很艰难。 applicant n.申请人，请求者The appkicants for this job are waiting outside before the interview.面试开始之前，应聘者在外面等候。 urgent adj.急迫的，紧迫的He needed urgent attention, so we called an ambulance.他需要急救，于是我们叫了救护车。 proud adj.骄傲的，引以自豪的He’s proud because his colleagues lkied his new idea.因为同事们都很满意他的新想法，他为此感到骄傲。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习20190420
entry.content: 复习challenging adj.具有挑战性的，引起挑战性兴趣的The bike trick he’s attempting is extremely challenging!他正尝试的自行车特技真是相当的有挑战性啊！ steward n.乘务员，服务员The stewards are responsible fro serving passengers on the plane.空乘人员负责为飞机上的乘客提供服务。 corner n.角落v.将…逼入困境The dog is in the corner facing the wall.那只狗在角落里面壁。 tournament n.锦标赛，联赛The basketball tournament will end with a single winner.这次篮球联赛会只有一个获胜队伍。 explode v.爆炸，激增，爆发，使爆炸，驳倒The fireworks exploded in the air.烟花在空中爆炸开来。 trick n.恶作剧，诡计，技艺，戏法v.哄骗He played a trick on his friend.他捉弄了一下他的朋友。 grateful adj.感激的I gave my mom flowers to show that I’m grateful to her.我送妈妈一朵花来表示感谢。 mentally adv.精神上，智力上，心理上She looks as if she is mentally tired.她看起来精神疲惫。 envy n.妒忌，妒忌的对象v.嫉妒，羡慕The little puppy envies the big dog who has a ball to play with.小狗嫉妒那只有球可以玩的大狗。 debate n.辩论，讨论v.辩论，议论The debate between the man and the woman is so fierce.这个男人和这个女人间的辩论太激烈了。 pretend v.假装，装扮I pretended to study hard, but actually I chatted on my phone.我假装很努力地学习，但是实际上我在手机上聊天。 particular adj.特别的，不寻常的n.详细情况You should pay particular attention to spelling.你需要特别注意你的拼写。 satisfaction n.满足，满意，乐事，补偿I gave their service a good rating to show my satisfaction.我给了好评，来表示我对他们的服务很满意。 illegal adj.不合法的，非法的Occupying a bus lane is illegal.占用公交车道是违法行为！ windbreaker n.风衣，防风（皮）夹克Her windbreaker jacket protected her from the wind and the rain.她的防风皮夹克能帮她挡风遮雨。 blind adj.瞎的，盲目的v.使失明n.盲点，百叶窗The blind woman is crossing the street with her guide dog.这位失明的女士正和她的导盲犬一起过街。 conduct v.指挥，进行，实施，处理，传导（电、热等），护送n.行为，举止，指挥，带领He is conducting an orchestra.他正指挥着交响乐团。 temptation n.引诱，诱惑Faced with the temptation of money, he said no!面对钱的诱惑，他说了不。 laser n.激光，激光器They are playing laser tag game.他们在玩激光束游戏。 sickness n.疾病Her sickness caused frequent nosebleeds.她的病导致她频繁地流鼻血。 settler n.移民者，定居者The first settlers in Australia were from Britain.最早一批移民澳大利亚的是英国人。 envelope n.信封，包装物，外壳，膜，气囊The sender put the letter into the red envelope.寄信的人把信放在了红色信封里。 consideration n.体贴，体谅，顾及，考虑，思考She shows a lot of consideration for her mother.她很体贴她的母亲。 tent n.帐篷The couple put up a tent beside the river.那对夫妇在河边支起了帐篷。 precious adj.珍贵的，宝贵的The crown is decorated with precious diamonds.这个皇冠上装饰着珍贵的钻石。 arrest v.逮捕，拘留n.逮捕，拘留The police officerr arrested the man for drunk driving.警察以酒后驾车为由逮捕这个人。 obtain v.获得，赢得，取得The policeman is obtaining evidence from the crime scene.警察正在犯罪现场取证。 tolerate v.忍受，容忍They have to tolerate the smell in the elevator.他们不得不忍受电梯里的臭味。 recreation n.娱乐活动,消遣Old people like to play mah-jong for recreation.老年人喜欢玩麻将来作为消遣。 skyscraper n.摩天大楼The skyscraper is hiding the sun!这栋大楼把太阳都遮住了。 allocate v.分配，配给Allocate one piece of cake to each person.给每个人都分一块蛋糕。 bay n.海湾，港湾I like to watch the bay and the mountains from here.我喜欢从这里眺望山和海湾。 ambassador n.（特命全权）大使“Our country wishes to have peace”, said the ambassador.“我们国家渴望和平”大使说道。 section n.部分v.划分The chart has five sections in different colors.图表有颜色不同的五个部分。 qualification n.资格证明，条件，限制性条件I’m delighted that I received this qualification from my university.拿到了大学毕业证，我很开心。 catastrophe n.大灾难We lost our house in the catastrophe.我们在灾难中失去家园。 academic adj.学术的，学院的，大学的n.学者They are having an academic meeting about physics.他们正在开一个物理领域的学术会议。 restriction n.限制，约束There is a restriction on finishing here.这里限制垂钓。 agricultural adj.农业的，农艺的Agricultural land is important for growing crops.农田对于种庄稼来说很重要。 brilliant adj.聪颖的，卓越的，有才气的The brilliant girl can solve the math problems easily.这个聪明的女孩可以轻松解决这些数学难题。 disadvantage n.不利，不利位置，弱点The one ant is at a disadvantage against so many others.这一只蚂蚁在和其他许多蚂蚁的对抗中处于劣势。 religion n.宗教信仰，虔诚的追求His religion taught him to be kind.他的宗教信仰教他要善良。 referee n.裁判员，仲裁者The soccer referee took out a Red card.足球裁判拿出了一张红牌。 acid n.【化学】酸adj.含酸过多的Make sure not to touch the acid - it will burn.千万不要去硼酸，它会灼伤你。 appointment n.约会，会面，接受委派者I have an appointment for tomorrow with my doctor.我和医生约了明天见面。 punctual adj.准时的，守时的I’m always punctual, I’m never late for work.我总是很守时，上班从来不迟到。 plain adj.朴素的，不尚修饰的I like plain T-shirts as they are simple and cheap.我喜欢朴素的T恤，因为他们简约又便宜。 offense n.犯罪，冒犯，过错，触怒，犯规，进攻He committed a serious offense when breaking into the car.他打破车玻璃的时候犯了严重的罪。 avenue n.林荫道，道路This long avenue leads to a big country house.这条长林荫道通往一栋巨大的乡间别墅。 dull adj.枯燥的，沉闷的The TV show is so dull that makes him want to sleep.电视节目无趣地让他想睡觉。 needle n.针，针状物，指针Sew these buttons on using this needle.用这根针把扣子缝上。 conclusion n.结论，推论I finally drew a conclusion from these facts.我终于从这些因素中得出了一条结论。 panic n.慌乱v.使…惊慌失措After she fell, she reached for her shoes in a panic.跌倒之后她慌张地捡起了鞋子。 district n.地区，区域The city has four districts.这座城市由四个区域组成。 abrupt adj.突然的，鲁莽的The abrupt bang gave him a fright.气球突然爆炸，把他吓了一跳。 minister n.部长，大臣The government’s minister gave a speech.政府部长在演讲。 pole n.杆，竿极（点）The telephone pole holds the cables.电线杆支撑着电缆。 caution n.警告v.劝…谨慎小心Caution: the road is dangerous ahead.警告：前方道路危险。 patent n.专利adj.显然的，明显的，独创的v.取得…的专利权The maker of this vehicle claimed a patent on the design of the first car.这辆车的制造者申请了首辆汽车设计专利。 inform v.通知，向…报告，赋特征于Please inform us of the news as soon as you know.请你一有消息就通知我们。 finance v.资金供给，筹措资金n.金融，财政，资金The old man financed the poor student’s education.老人资助那个贫困学生上大学。 elect v.选举，推选，选择We elect our next leader by voting.我们通过投票来选举下一任领导。 dizzy adj.眩晕的，头晕目眩的，头昏眼花的vt.使头晕目眩I felt so dizzy that I went to the hospital.我头太晕了，所以我去看医生了。 shame n.羞耻，羞愧vt.使感到羞耻She covers her face in shame.她羞愧地遮住了脸。 resigh v.辞职After much consideration, the employee resigned from his job.深思熟虑后，这位员工辞职了。 postpone v.延迟，推迟，延缓I had to postpone the meeting until later.我不得不向后推迟一点这个会议。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习20190419
entry.content: 复习concept n.概念，观念Copernicus presented a new concept regarding the solar system.哥白尼提出来太阳系的新概念。 nail n.指甲，爪v.将…钉牢，钉住She’s painting my nail.她正给我涂指甲。 affair n.事情，事务，恋爱事件The CEO is handling some commercial affairs.这位CEO正在处理一些商务事宜。 furnished adj.有家具的The house that we rented came fully furnished.我们租的房子里有全套的家具。 enemy n.敌人，危害物The green soldier is attacking his enemy from behind.绿衣战士正从背后攻击敌人。 inspect v.检查，审查She inspects my ticket before I get on the train.在我上火车前，她检查了我的火车票。 symphony n.交响乐The musicians will give a symphony concert this week.这些音乐家这周将举办一场交响音乐会。 alternative n.可供选择的事物adj.可供选择的He has the alternative of either riding or driving.他可以在骑车或开车中选择一种。 fountain n.泉水，喷泉The fountain in the city center is beautiful.市中心的喷泉好美。 appeal n.（人祸物的）吸引力vi.有吸引力，呼吁，请求，申诉Money has great appeal to most people.金钱对一些人有很大的吸引力。 pillow n.枕头v.垫，枕着I love sleeping with soft pillows.我爱抱着软软的枕头入睡。 peasant n.农民，农夫，庄稼人，小耕农The peasants are working on the farm land.农民在地里劳作。 ordinary adj.普通的，平常的，平凡的I’m just an ordinary man.我只是一个再平常不过的男人。 canteen n.食堂，小卖部Let’s go get some food at the canteen.我们一起去食堂吃点东西吧。 surgeon n.外科医生My surgeon decided to give me an operation.我的外科医生决定给我动手术。 principle n.原则，原理Our business success is based on four key principles.我们生意的成功是基于四项基本的原则。 adjust v.调整，调节，改变…以适应“It’s too hot in here; I’ll adjust the temperature.”“这里太热了，我调节一下温度。” correction n.改正，修正The teacher made a correction on my homework.老师修改了我的家庭作业。 brochure n.手册，小册子Travel brochures contain many beautiful pictures.旅行手册里有许多漂亮的图片。 committee n.委员会，全体委员The finance committee discussed the company’s financial plans.财务委员会讨论了公司的财务计划。 burn v.烧，燃烧n.烧伤Did you burn the toast?你把土司烤焦啦？ term n.学期，任期vt.把…称为，把…叫作The Autumn term in China begins from September 1st.中国的秋季学期是从9月1日开始的。 premier n.总理，首相Churchill was a great premier in the UK history.丘吉尔是英国历史上一位伟大的首相。 burglar n.窃贼The burglar is trying to break into the house.盗贼正试图闯进这个家。 stomach n.胃，胃口Something that I ate is making my stomach very upset.我吃了什么东西让我的胃很不舒服。 kite n.风筝The girl ran through the field pulling her kite behind her.女孩牵着风筝在原野上跑着。 controversial adj.引起争论的，有争议的The couple is discussing a controversial topic.这对夫妇正在讨论一个争议性话题。 fist n.拳头，笔迹If you see a fist coming at you, get down!如果你看到拳头冲你来了，要趴下！ acquaintance n.熟人，相识的人，认识They are acquaintances because they have been neighbors for many years.她们是老相识，因为她们做了许多年邻居。 idiom n.习语，惯用语法“Rome wasn’t built in a day” is a famous idiom.“罗马不是一天建成的”是一句著名的习语。 paddle v.用脚（手）划水，荡桨n.桨I paddle my boat down the river.我划着我的小船沿河而下。 motto n.格言，座右铭There is a motto on the wall in our classroom.我们教室的墙上有一句格言。 worthwhile adj.值得（花时间、精力）的，有意义的Studying English words with this app is definitely worthwhile.用这个软件学英语单词绝对超值哦！ lecture n.讲演，讲课v.讲演，向…讲演He gave a lecture in front of many people.他在很多人面前发表了演讲。 advance adj.预先n.预先，超前，增长v.提升He finished his homework in advance.他提前做完了作业。 flee v.逃离，避开，逃走，（时间）飞逝He wants to flee from danger.他想要逃离危险。 coral n.珊瑚The fish swim among the coral.鱼儿在珊瑚中游来游去。 conference n.会议，讨论会He is delivering his speech at the pet owners’conference.他正在工作者会议上发表演讲。 casual adj.随便的n.临时工She prefers casual clothing when hanging out on the street.在街上闲逛时，她偏好休闲的穿着。 astonish v.使惊讶，使吃惊The magic astonished the kids.整个魔术使孩子们感到很吃惊。 swing v.摇荡，来回摆动，转动，转向n.秋千，摇摆，摆幅，转弯，打击，旋律The little girl laughs as she swing in the meadow.小女孩儿在草地上一边荡秋千一边笑。 plot n.情节，阴谋，小块土地v.密谋，计划，为小说写情节This story has a romantic plot.这个故事有一个浪漫的情节。 fond adj.喜欢的，喜爱的，溺爱的，精神错乱的v.显出钟爱之情The man is very fond of his horse.这位男士很喜欢他的马。 fluent adj.流畅的，（说话）流利的I can speak fluent English like a native English speaker.我能像英语母语者一样讲一口流利的英文。 attentively adv.仔细地，注意地He observed the flowers attentively hoping to see them grow.他仔细地观察着这些花儿，希望能看见它们的生长。 yard n.院，场地，码What a large yard! We can have a barbecue.这个院子真大！我们可以来个烧烤。 explore v.探险，探索，尝试They will explore the dark cave.他们即将探索这个黑洞穴。 collar n.项圈，衣领，【机】轴环v.抓住，为…戴上项圈，为…上领子I put a collar on my dog to prevent him getting lost.我给我的狗狗戴上项圈是为了防止他走丢。 clinic n.门诊（部、室）Patients are waiting to see a doctor in clinic.病人们在门诊室等着看病。 quilt n.被子The quilt is on the bed.被子在床上。 part-time adj.兼职的，部分时间的adv.以部分时间The college student has a part-time job after school.她在没课的时候做一份兼职工作。 contradictory adj.反驳的，自相矛盾的n.矛盾的事物，矛盾因素These signs are contradictory - I can’t obey them both.这些标志是矛盾的，我不能同时遵守它们。 fuel n.燃料v.给…加燃料A vehicle can run with fuel.一辆汽车有了燃料就可以行使。 persuade v.说服，劝说，使相信The salesman is persuading us to buy a car.这个销售员在劝我们买辆车。 treasure n.金银财宝，不可多得的人才v.珍视All of this treasure will make me rich!这些财宝会让我富有。 graduate v.毕业，取得资格n.学位获得者adj.研究生的v.授予…学位We finally graduated from the college.我们终于大学毕业了。 defense n.防御，防护The best defense is a good attack!最好的防御就是一记好的攻击！ scold v.怒骂，责骂，训斥The mother scolds her child.那位母亲斥责她的小孩。 towel n.毛巾，手巾v.用毛巾擦I use a towel to dry off after swimming.游泳后我用毛巾擦干。 damage v.毁灭n.损害Oh no! My car was badly damaged after hitting the tree.噢不！我的车在撞上树后严重损坏了。 radioactive adj.反射性的Be careful! These yellow barrels are radioactive!小心！这些黄色桶子有放射性！ flood v.淹没，充满n.洪水The town was flooded due to the big storm.这个城镇由于一场大雨被洪水淹没了。 bite n.（咬下的）一口v.咬，叮，螫I took a big bite out of my sandwich.我猛咬了一大口三明治。 deliberately adv.故意地，慢条斯理地He put a leg out to deliberately make the man fall.他故意伸出一条腿绊倒老人。 compressed adj.被压缩的，扁平的I hate being compressed into this tiny box!我讨厌整个人都蜷缩在这个小盒子里！ nest n.巢，温床v.筑巢，嵌入Most birds lay their eggs in their nests.大多数鸟儿把蛋生在它们的巢穴里。 curious adj.好奇的，好管闲事的The cats are curious about what’s behind the door.小猫们对门后面是什么很好奇。 discrimination n.歧视，偏见He shows discrimination between the poor and rich.他嫌贫爱富。 pity n.憾事，怜悯v.（觉得）可怜，惋惜What a pity! The ice cream dropped before I ate it.真遗憾！我还没来得及吃冰激淋就掉地上了。 argue v.争吵The boy is arguing with his mother.男孩和妈妈争吵。 regular adj.有规律的，定期的，经常的，匀称的n.正式队员We have a regular meeting on every Monday morning.我们每个星期一早晨都会有例会。 truck n.卡车，载重汽车Big trucks carry goods across the country.大卡车载着货在乡间穿行。 reach v.够得着，抵达n.范围，影响力The baby boy is trying to reach for the red ball.小宝宝正努力伸手去够红球。 tight adj.紧身的，紧的，紧贴的，牢固的adv.紧紧地，牢牢地Oh no, these cloths are too tight for me.哦不，这衣服对我来说太紧了。 tire n.轮胎，车胎v.（使）疲倦，（使）厌倦The tires are arranged in order on the shelves.轮胎被整齐摆放在货架上。 scar n.伤疤，伤痕，内心创伤v.（给…）留下伤痕There is a lightening - shaped scar on his forehead.他额头上有一道闪电形的伤疤。 whistle n.口哨v.吹口哨The little policeman blew his whistle to stop us.小警察吹响了口哨，让我们停下来。 rigid adj.坚硬的，死板的Buildings made from steel tend to be very rigid.钢筋建筑的房屋非常牢固。 adolescent n.青少年adj.青春期的Acne is common among adolescents.青少年长痘很普遍。 twist v.扭，歪曲n.搓，扭拧I think I twisted my arm while playing basketball.我想我打篮球的时候扭到了胳膊。 mild adj.味淡的，轻微的Compared to the spicy hot pot, the chicken soup is milder.和麻辣火锅相比，鸡汤味道要清淡很多。 gain v.获得，增加，从中受益，增值n.获得，增加（财富、重量），利益We can gain valuable knowledge by reading books.我们能通过阅读获得宝贵的知识。 cousin n.堂（或表）兄弟（姐妹）When I go to my aunties’house I always play with my little cousin.我去姑妈家的时候总是跟我的小表妹玩。 contemporary adj.当代的，现代的，同时代的n.同龄人，同时代的They are two popular contemporary 21th century artists.他们是两位受欢迎的21世纪当代歌手。 champion n.冠军adj.夺得第一名的The French football team became the champions of the 2018 World Cup!法国队成为2018年世界冠军。 carve v.雕刻，（把肉等）切成片He carves watermelons into beautiful shapes.他把西瓜雕刻成漂亮的形状。 stove n.炉，火炉，电炉Turn off the stove, or the food will be overcooked.快把炉子关掉，不然食物要烧焦了。 rag n.抹布，破布，碎步She used a rag to clean the glass window.她在用抹布擦玻璃窗。 admirable adj.令人钦佩的，极好的，值得赞扬的He is an admirable policeman in my heart.在我心中，他是位令人敬佩的警察。 spirit n.灵魂，精神，心灵，幽灵，意志，精力，实质The Olympic spirit is “faster, higher and stronger”.奥运精神是”更快，更高，更强”。 stain v.弄脏，玷污，染色n.污渍，污迹The man’s clothing is stained with the boy’s cola.男孩的可乐把他的衣服弄脏了。 afford v.买得起Finally, I can afford this car.我终于买得起这辆车了。 stewardess n.女服务员，女管家，女干事I chose this airline because of its stewardesses.因为空乘的原因我选了这家航空公司。 chaos n.混乱，纷乱This kitchen is in chaos!厨房里一片狼藉！ companion n.同伴，志同道合的人，参考书My dog is a great running companion.我的狗是很好的跑步伴侣。 consensus n.一致同意，合意We reached a consensus in the end.最后我们统一了意见。 collision n.碰撞，冲突A black car is in collision with a red car.黑车与红车相撞了。 boundary n.边界，分界线Many students will draw a line on the desk as the boundary.许多学生会在课桌上画一条线作为分界。 staff n.全体职员，员工adj.职员的，作为正式工作人员的n.五线谱The doctors and nurses are important members of the hospital staff.医生和护士都是医院重要的职责。 pollution n.污染，污染物The gas he produced brought pollution to the environment.炼金术士排放的尾气对环境造成了污染。 mustache n.小胡子She looks funny with that mustache on her face.脸上的胡子让她看起来很好笑。 abandon v.抛弃，放弃The mother has abandoned her baby.这个母亲抛弃了她的孩子。 junk n.废旧物品，垃圾，假货v.把…（当废物）丢弃What a mess! Must get rid of all this smelly junk.真是一团糟！必须把这些发臭的垃圾清扫出去。 vest n.汗衫，背心，内衣v.使穿衣服I put on my white vest to get ready for exercise.我穿上我的白色背心准备锻炼。 maple n.枫树In autumn, maple leaves turn red.枫树叶子在秋天变成红色。 phrase n.短语，习语，简短的警语“Attitude is everything” is a common phrase.“态度决定一切”是一句习语。 sincerely adv.真诚地，诚挚地The robot sincerely hopes to make friends with human.这个机器人真心希望和人类做朋友。 influence n.影响，努力v.影响Stop smoking! It will have a bad influence on your child.别抽烟了！孩子会受你影响！ fiction n.虚构，想象I like science fiction movies with spaceships.我喜欢有太空飞船的科幻片。 agenda n.议事日程The meeting’s agenda still needs to be written.会议议程还需要写下来。 chef n.厨师The chef is really good t cooking chicken.这位厨师做的鸡肉真是太棒了。 hall n.会堂，门厅，过道There are many seats in the hall.会堂里有许多座位。 murder n.谋杀，凶杀，谋杀罪v.谋杀，凶杀The cow chef was arrested for murder by the chicken policeman.厨师因为谋杀被警察抓捕了。 seize v.抓住，逮捕，夺取They seized one another by the wrist.他们抓住了对方的手腕。 triangle n.三角形She drew a triangle with a black pen.她用黑笔画了一个三角形。 policy n.政策，方针，保险单China has adopted one-child policy for a few decades.中国在过去几十年中实行独生子女政策。 consume v.消耗，耗尽Sichuan has consumed a great amount of chilli.四川人民消费了大量辣椒。 found v.成立，建立，创办The bosses found a new store together.老大们一起开了家新店。 pride n.自豪，骄傲v.使得意，以…自豪The parents took pride in their son’s graduation.父母为儿子的毕业感到很自豪。 spare adj.备用的，多余的，闲置的n.零件，备件v.抽出，腾出I have spare tire for my car.我的车有一个备胎。 brewery n.啤酒厂This brewery is producing a large amount of beer everyday.这家啤酒厂每天生产大量啤酒。 album n.相册，集邮册I’m looking at the old photos in this album.我在看这本相册中的老照片。 fortunate adj.幸运的He won the lottery! How fortunate!他中了彩票！多幸运啊！ calm adj.平静的，镇静的n.平静，安宁v.（使）平静，（使）镇定She is so calm although the endless work bothers her.尽管工作不胜其烦，但她依然淡定如山。 secretary n.秘书，部长，大臣My secretary helped me with my email.我的秘书正在帮我弄邮件。 accustomed adj.习惯了，适应了的He got accustomed to the food after 10 years of living here.住在这儿十年之后他习惯了这里的食物。 pioneer n.先驱，先锋，开拓者v.开辟，首倡He’s a pioneer in climbing, the first man to reach the summit.他是登山的先锋，即第一个到达山顶的人。 attain v.获得，达到（某个年纪、水平、条件）n.成就I finally attained my driving license!我终于拿到了驾照！ anxious adj.忧虑的，担心的，焦急的The boy is anxious about the exam.考试让小男孩很焦虑。 ashamed adj.感到羞愧的She felt ashamed of her bad grades.她为自己糟糕的成绩感到很羞愧。 bother v.麻烦，打扰n.烦恼，麻烦，打扰He plays music at night, which really bothers me!他总是在晚上玩音乐，真的打扰到我了！ legal adj.合法的，法定的，法律的In some areas of America,it’s legal to carry a gun.在美国一些地区，持枪合法。 numb adj.麻木的，失去知觉的vt.使麻木，使失去知觉My hand was so numb that I could hardly move it.我的手麻木了，几乎不能动。 appreciate v.为…表示感谢，增值Grandma appreciated the gift of flowers on her birthday.外婆很感激她生日上收到的鲜花礼物。 pepper n.胡椒粉，胡椒The cook used many different kinds of peppers in his recipe.这个厨师在他们的食谱里用了很多不同种类的胡椒。 predict v.预言，预告，预测The magician pretended to be able to predict the future through the crystal ball.这位魔术师假装能够通过水晶球预测未来。 accountant n.会计人员，会计师You need a good accountant to get the money for you.你需要你一个好会计来帮你把钱弄到手。 shortcoming n.短处，缺点His main shortcomings are laziness and greed.他的主要缺点是懒惰和贪婪。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习20190418
entry.content: 复习shy adj.怕羞的，害羞的，畏缩的The girl feels shy when the boy takes her hand.当男孩牵起女孩的手时，女孩感到很害羞。 justice n.公平，应得的赏罚Everyone can seek justice in court.每个人都可以在法庭上寻求公正。 amuse v.娱乐，消遣，使发笑Their talk show amused the audience.他们的脱口秀逗乐了观众。 supply n.供应（量），补给品，用品vt.供应，提供，补充Nowadays, natural resources are in short supply.现今的自然资源供不应求。 choke v.噎住，（使）窒息，阻塞n.窒息，噎住She was choking while drinking water.她喝水的时候呛着了。 capsule n.胶囊，航天舱，密封舱The medicine can be taken in capsule form.该药可以通过胶囊的形式服用。 ample adj.富足的，丰满的，宽敞的The kitchen and dining room are of ample size.这间房子的厨房和餐厅很宽敞。 cave n.洞穴v.塌落He went into the dark cave by himself.他独自一人走进了漆黑的山洞。 political adj.政治的，政治上的Political issues are very important for our future, so we should vote.政治问题对我们的未来很重要，所以我们应该投票。 block n.积木，块状物v.阻挡，妨碍，阻塞Kids love to play with blocks.孩子们喜欢玩积木。 sightseeing n.浏览，观光This photo was taken when I went sightseeing in Paris.这张照片是我去巴黎旅游的时候拍的。 eventually adv.终于，最后After weeks of hard study, he eventually got a satisfying result.经过几周的刻苦学习，他终于得到了令人满意的结果。 passage n.通道，走廊，（法案的）通过，段落，推移，旅程The passage is so long that I can’t even see the end.这条通道很长，以至于我看不见它的尽头。 cop n.【口语】警察v.抓住、发现（某人）在干坏事，获得，遭受，握住“You! Stop, immediately!” Shouted the cop.“你！站住！立刻！”警察喊道。 cheerful adj.高兴的After tasting the cake, the little boy shows a cheerful expression.在品尝蛋糕后，小男孩的脸上露出了开心的表情。 angle n.（数学）角The angle of each cormer is 60 degress.每个角都是60度。 lamp n.灯，台灯An oil lamp burned in darkness.一盏油灯在黑暗中发着光。 cigarette n.香烟，纸烟，卷烟Cigarettes are getting more expensive these days.最近，香烟越来越贵。 humour n.幽默感vt.使自己适应Women love men with a good sense of humour.女性喜欢有幽默感的男性。 hawk n.鹰The hawk files through the sky.老鹰在天空飞过。 dictation n.口授，口述，听写As he could not write, he needed someone help him with his dictation.因为他不能再写书了，所以他需要有人来记录他的口授。 president n.总统，院长Can you recognize all of the presidents here?你能认出这里所有的总统吗？ chief n.（部落）首领，长官adj.首席的The lion in the middle is the chief of the three.中间的那只狮子是它们当中的首领。 concentrate v.全神贯注于，集中于n.浓缩物He is concentrating on making his bread look perfect.他正专心做面包，使其看起来完美。 cube n.立方体，立方Who dropped all of these cubes?谁把这些方块丢下来了？ gradual adj.逐渐的，逐步的，平缓的The graph shows a gradual increase.图表显示出来逐步增长。 thriller n.恐怖片，惊险小说，使人毛骨悚然的东西The old couple went to see a thriller in the cinema.老夫妇去电影院看了一场恐怖片。 trial n.审判，审理，磨练，苦难adj.实验的，实验性的The trial has begun. What will be the outcome?审判开始了。结果会怎样呢？ cruel adj.残忍的，残酷的Don’t be so cruel to me! I’m just a watermelon!不要对我这么残忍，我只是一个西瓜！ squeeze v.用力挤压榨取n.压榨I’ll squeeze some oranges to make orange juice.我要榨这些橙子来做橙汁。 hibernate vi.冬眠，蛰居Bears can sleep for months when they hibernate during the winter.冬天熊会冬眠数月。 rent n.租金v.租用，出租We pay our rent to the house owner every month.每个月，我们都会给房东交房租。 feather n.羽毛This pen is made of a feather.这支笔是羽毛做的。 ward n.病房，受监护人The patients lie on the beds in the ward.病人躺在病房的床上。 literary adj.文学的，文学上的，以写作为职业的There were manuy famous literary books on her shelf.她的书架上有许多文学名著。 heap n.（一）堆v.堆积There is a heap of sand on the ground.地上有一堆沙。 caption n.（插图、照片等的）说明文字The kitty looks even funnier with the photo caption in the upper left.配合左上角的说明文字，猫咪显得更好笑了。 wise adj.聪明的，有智慧的，博学的，知情的v.知道，教导They are both extremely wise.他们都很富有智慧。 talent n.天赋，才能，天才，人才The girl has a talent for painting.这个女孩有绘画方面的天赋。 furniture n.家具，设备The furniture is very clean and tidy!这些家具非常干净整洁。 biology n.生物学，生命周期Biology is the study of life and living things.生物学是研究生命的学科。 novelist n.小说家This novelist wrote a series of famous books.这个小说家写了一系列著名的小说。 primitive adj.原始的，简陋的The primitive man made a fire in the cave.原始人在洞内生了一堆火。 conclude v.使结束，推断出，缔结，结束，总结，作决定，作协议They conclude the successful meeting with a high five.他们以击掌来结束这次会议。 flu n.流感I’ll have to stay home work today - I have the flu.我不得不请假在家，我得了流感。 thorough adj.彻底的，完全的，详尽的，细致深入的We gave my car a thorough clean.我们彻底地清洗了车子。 fare n.交通费v.（事情）进行得（好或坏）The fare for this ride is $99,999,999.9.这一趟的费用是99,999,999.9美元。 steal n.偷盗，行窃，悄悄地走n.便宜货The thief is trying to steal his wallet.小偷正试图偷他的钱包！ grill v.烤，拷问n.烤架She’s grilling the meat right now.她正在烤肉。 bunch n.束，串，群，伙v.使成一束（或一群等）This bunch of flowers is so beautiful.这束花真漂亮呀！ devotion n.奉献，献身于…，热爱，忠诚，投入Many people show great devotion to their professions, such as doctors, scientists, and soldiers.许多人展示了他们对职业的非凡投入，比如医生、科学家以及士兵。 tiresome adj.无聊的，使人疲倦的，烦人的，讨厌的Such a tiresome book made him really sleepy.如此无聊的一本书让他昏昏欲睡。 trade n.贸易，商业v.经商，交易International trade has become a major source of income for this company.国际贸易成为了这个公司主要的收入来源。 scream vi.发出歇斯底里的声音，尖叫vt.尖叫着说出The woman screamed when she found a mouse in her slipper.这个女人尖叫起来，当她发现拖鞋里的老鼠。 surplus adj.过剩的，多余的n.过剩，盈余，顺差He has some surplus cash every month.他每个月都可以存下一些闲钱。 garbage n.垃圾桶，垃圾Make sure to take out the garbage.记得倒垃圾。 unemployment n.失业，失业人数Unemployment is a big problem in many societies.在许多社会中，失业是一个严重的问题。 injure v.伤害I injured my knee playing soccer. Ouch!!踢足球的时候我把膝盖伤着了。哎呦！ dam n.水坝，母兽The dam keeps the river from flooding the town.大坝阻止河水淹没城镇。 dynamic adj.有活力的，有生气的n.活力，动力I run on the hills to keep myself dynamic.我通过在山上跑步来使自己保持活力。 butcher n.屠夫，肉贩子v.屠戮，残杀The butchers‘job is mainly cutting and selling meat.屠夫的工作主要是切肉和卖肉。 bitter adj.（有）苦（味）的，痛苦的，厉害的，严寒的v.使变苦Bitter melon can taste too bitter for some people.苦瓜对于一些人来说尝起来太苦。 porridge n.粥，麦片粥I ate a bowl of porridge for breakfast.我早餐吃了一碗粥。 steep adj.陡峭的n.陡坡v.沉浸于…This mountain is almost too steep to climb!这个山太陡峭了，几乎不能攀爬。 stocking n.长（筒）袜The girl in woolen stockings is relaxing with a cup of coffee.穿着羊毛长筒袜的女孩正在喝咖啡放松自己。 prove v.证实The ring proves that they’re married.戒指证明他们是夫妻。 holy adj.神圣的，圣洁的For the people of the tribe, the totem is a holy symbol.对于这个部落的人来说，这根图腾是一个神圣的象征。 bowl n.碗，保龄球戏I always use this bowl to eat soup.我总是用这个碗喝汤。 bachelor n.学士学位，单身汉After four years of hard work, I finally got my bachelor‘s degree!经过了四年的努力学习，我终于拿到了学士学位！ scare vt.惊吓，使害怕v.受惊吓，感到害怕n.惊恐，恐慌The one thing that scares me most are giant mice!最让我害怕的东西，就是巨大的老鼠！ independent adj.独立自主的，独自的，无偏见的She is independent despite her broken legs.尽管腿脚不便，但她依然非常独立。 pond n.池塘The duck dived into the pond.一只鸭子一头扎进了池塘。 stick v.粘贴，刺，戳，扎n.棍，棒，手杖Mum is sticking a note on the fridge for me to read later.妈妈正在冰箱门上贴一张纸条，让我之后看。 stout adj.矮胖的，结实的n.矮胖子，烈性啤酒The stout guy carries many persons on him.那个矮胖的人带着好多人在身上。 patient n.病人，患者adj.有耐心的，能忍耐的The doctor is talking to her patient about his illness.医生正在跟她的男患者讲解病情。 truly adv.真心的，真实的Thank you! I truly love the flowers you sent me.谢谢！我真心喜欢你送我的花。 vacant adj.闲置的We should rent the house while it is still vacant.我们应该在房子还闲置着的时候把它租下来。 sausage n.香肠I can eat several sausages at one time.我一次可以吃好几根香肠。 citizen n.市民All of these people are citizens of the city.所有这些人都是这座城市的市民。 beehive n.蜂箱She can get honey from the beehive.她可以从蜂箱中弄出蜂蜜。 sneeze v.打喷嚏n.喷嚏The poor man caught a cold so he can’t stop sneezing.这个可怜的男子感冒了，所以他不停地打喷嚏。 cellar n.酒窖，地下室The cellar is filled with wine barrels.酒窖里装满了酒桶。 hire v.雇佣，出租n.租金，雇佣，租用They hired an employee to do some typing work.他们雇了一个员工来打字。 settlement n.协议，解决The two sides shook hands on the settlement.双方握手言和。 hive n.蜂房，忙碌之地v.分开，隔开Many bees live in this hive.这个蜂巢里住了很多蜜蜂。 belly n.肚子，圆形或凸起部份Wow, look at your belly - are you having a baby?哇！瞧瞧你这肚子，你是怀孕了吗？ dash vi.猛冲，突进n.破折号The woman is dashing forward.这个女人朝前猛冲。 explicit adj.充分表达清楚的，明确的The map shows an explicit route to me.这张地图给我指出了明确的路线。 oral adj.口腔的，口头的，口语的My teeth feel great after an oral cleaning.口腔清洁后我的牙齿感觉超棒。 rope n.绳，索v.用绳捆（或扎等）The four girls are pulling on a piece of rope.这四个女孩正在拉一条绳子。 especially adv.特别，尤其The little girl loves drinking juice, especially orange juice.小女孩很爱喝果汁，尤其是橙汁。 stage n.舞台，阶段The children are playing music on the stage.孩子们在舞台上演奏音乐。 paragraph n.（文章的）段，节The writer mentioned me by name in this paragraph!作者在这一段落提到了我的名字！ erupt v.（火山、喷泉、蒸汽等）喷发，喷射出This volcano erupts three times a day.这座火山一天喷发三次。 steady adj.坚定的，扎实的，镇定的，稳定的，不变的v.（使）稳固，（使）稳定The stone house is quite steady under the extreme weather.石屋在极端天气中非常稳固。 fever n.发热，狂热The girl has a fever, so she needs to have a good rest.那个女孩发烧了，所以她需要好好休息。 swallow v.咽下，吞下n.燕子vi.做吞咽动作，咽口水I can’t believe that the actor can swallow a sword!我简直没法相信，那个演员居然能吞一把剑。 messy adj.脏乱的How can you live in such a messy home?你怎么能忍受住在这个脏乱差的屋子里？ parrot n.鹦鹉，盲目重复或模仿他人行为的人vt.学舌，盲目重复或模仿There are two parrots with red feathers on the branch.那根树枝上落着两只红色羽毛的鹦鹉。 blame n.责备，过失v.责备，把…归咎于I always get all the blame, but I never do anything wrong.我总是受到所有的责备，但我从没做错任何事。 tough adj.健壮的，棘手的Stay away from that man - he looks tough.离那个男的远一点，他看起来很健壮。 dare v.敢，胆敢n.激将He’s daring to accept the challenge.他敢于接受这个挑战。 royal adj.王室的，皇家的，第一流的，高贵的The king wears his royal clothes.国王穿着他的御用衣服。 arrangement n.布置，组合体The arrangement of tables looks so crowded.桌子布置得很挤。 wrestle v.摔跤，角斗，斗争，努力n.摔跤，角力，扭斗I loved to wrestle and fight in college.上大学时，我喜欢玩摔跤搏斗。 prairie n.大草原，（尤指）北美大草原Many cows eat grass on the prairie.许多奶牛在大草原上吃草。 attitude n.态度，看法A positive attitude is what you need to solve problems.你需要积极的态度来解决问题。 worn adj.用旧的，疲倦的Look at this pair of worn shoes, you need to buy a new pair.看看你这双旧鞋，你得买双新的了。 astronomy n.天文学I’ve always loved looking at the stars, so now I study astronomy.我一直都很喜欢看星星，所以现在我在研究天文学。 coast n.海岸，湖岸v.一帆风顺，沿海航行We are sailing in the boats off the coast.我们将驾船离开海岸。 theoretical adj.理论（上）的These books are too theoretical, I cannot read them.这些书理论性太强了，我都读不懂。 decoration n.装饰They’re putting decorations on the Christmas tree.他们在往圣诞树上放装饰品。 steak n.牛排The steak looks so delicious.这牛排看起来美味极了。 enthusiastic adj.狂热的，极感兴趣的，热情的He was very enthusiastic about his new video game.他非常热衷于新的电子游戏。 struggle v.奋斗，挣扎，抗争n.斗争She’s struggling to reach the top of the cliff.她为了自己登顶的目标而奋斗。 continent n.大陆，洲The world has seven continents.世界上有七大洲。 conservation n.保护，维持Conservation of our environment is very important.保护环境很重要。 harbour n.港湾，港口，安全处v.包庇，庇护The view of the harbour at night is amazing!这片港湾的夜景真是棒极了！ guidance n.引导，指导He is giving the old man guidance for exercise.他正给老人作健身指导。 thrill n.兴奋，激动，引起激动的事物v.（使）非常兴奋，（使）非常激动It gave me a real thrill to ride the rollercoaster!坐过山车真是太刺激啦！ hay n.干草Farmers always roll up hay so it’s easier to move around.农民总是把干草卷起来方面运输。 eggplant n.茄子，黑紫色The eggplant was cut into slices.茄子被切成粒片状。 apron n.围裙The girl looks good in that black apron.系着黑色围裙的她看起来很好看。 spit v.吐（唾沫）n.唾液，唾沫，叉子The boy is so rude that he spits towards the dog!这个小男孩真是太粗鲁了，他居然向狗狗吐口水！

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习20190417
entry.content: 复习competence n.能力，胜任，称职I hired both of them for their technical competence.鉴于他们的技术能力，他们两个我都雇佣了。 trap n.捕兽夹，圈套，诡计v.诱骗，困住There’s a small piece of cheese on the mouse trap.捕鼠夹上有一块奶酪。 convenient adj.方便的It’s so convenient! You can buy things here at any time.太方便啦！你随时可以在这儿买东西。 fault n.过失，过错，（地质学）断层v.责备，挑错It’s the boy’s fault that the window was broken.这个男生犯错打破了窗户。 faith n.信仰，信心He has deep faith in God.他深信上帝。 firmly adv.坚固地，稳固地，坚定地，坚决地He firmly squeezed the piece of paper.他牢牢攥紧那张纸。 elegant adj.优美的，文雅的，漂亮雅致的，陈设讲究的How elegant the ballet dancer is !芭蕾舞者真优雅！ gifted adj.有天赋的，有才华的This gifted child could be the next Einstein.这个天赋的小孩也许可以成为下一个爱因斯坦。 saucer n.茶碟，茶托，杯托，浅碟This delicate saucer is made of porcelain.这个漂亮的小碟子是瓷做的。 fright n.恐怖，惊吓The man shouted out in fright.那个男人吓得大叫。 intelligence n.智力，理解力Stephen Hawking is a man of great intelligence.史蒂芬霍金是一个智商很高的人。 gentle adj.温和的，轻柔的，文雅的He was very gentle and gave me his coat.他很绅士，把他的外套给我了。 pollute n.弄脏，污染，沾污Factory smoke can pollute the environment.工厂烟雾会污染环境。 organiser n.组织者The organiser planned a big event.组织者在计划着大事件。 kettle n.茶壶I boil water in my kettle to make tea.我把壶里的水烧开来泡茶。 rubber n.橡皮，橡胶，橡胶制品，胶鞋These rubber ducks are floating on the water.橡皮小鸭漂浮在水面上。 cloth n.布，衣料This cloth has a beautiful design.这匹布设计得很漂亮。 attend vt.出席vi.护理All the staff members attended the meeting.全体员工出席了这个会议。 accuse v.指责，把…归咎于They accused each other of being wrong.他们相互指责对方做错了。 determination n.决心，确定“I have determination to lose weight!” said the big girl.胖女孩说：”我有决心减肥。” distribute v.分发，分配，配送The presents were distributed to everyone at the party.礼物派发给力派对上的所有人。 dusk n.薄暮，黄昏I enjoy watching the sunset at dusk.我很享受在黄昏看日落。 approval n.赞同My boss showed his apporval by his hand gesture.老板用他的手势表达了他的赞同。 wrist n.腕部He holds his wrist by the hand.他用手握住了自己的手腕。 applaud v.鼓掌vt.向…鼓掌表示赞赏We start to applaud when she stands up to speak.当她站起来准备讲话的时候，我们开始鼓掌。 scratch n.抓痕，擦伤v.划破，擦伤，挠The cat leaves some scratches on the wall.这只猫在墙上留下了一些抓痕。 cheque n.支票She writes a cheque for her bills.她为账单开了张支票。 gymnastics n.体操，体育You must be flexible if you want to do gymnastics.如果你想练体操，你一定要有柔韧性。 motivation n.动机，动力，刺激，积极性Money is his motivation for boxing.金钱是他拳击的动力。 association n.联想，协会，联盟，社团What association do you have with the color green?绿色会使你联想到什么？ cottage n.村舍，小屋I often spend weekends in my cottage by the lake.我经常在我湖边的小木屋里度过周末。 equip v.装备，具备The soldier equipped himself with two guns.这位战士为自己配备了两把枪。 promote v.提升She worked hard and was soon promoted.她工作勤奋，不久就要得到提升了。 artificial adj.人造的，人工的，假的He got an artificial leg after the accident.事故之后他接了假肢。 plastic adj.塑料的n.塑料，塑料制品Plastic cups and bowls are safer for babies than glass ones.塑料的杯和碗对于宝宝来说比玻璃的更安全。 beneficial adj.有益的，有利的Eating nutritious food and exercising are beneficial to our health.吃有营养的食物和锻炼身体对我们的健康有益。 pension n.养老金，抚恤金，廉租房v.发给…养老金After they retired, my grandparents received a pension every month.退休之后，我爷爷奶奶每个月都能领到一笔养老金。 profit n.利润，盈利，益处v.得益，有益于The girl made a profit by selling the dress.这个女孩卖掉这件裙子，赚了一笔。 stare v.盯，凝视Don’t stare at my food, you little dog.不要盯着我的吃的看了，你这只小狗狗。 bonus n.奖金，额外津贴My boss gave me a bonus this month for doing extra work.我的老板这个月给我发了奖金，因为我做了额外的工作。 sponsor n.赞助人vt.做…的保人“Thanks to all the sponsors for the support!” said the host.“感谢所有赞助商的大力支持！”主持人说道。 comedy n.喜剧，有趣的事情This TV comedy show is quite interesting.这个喜剧节目十分有趣。 revision n.修改，修订本He made a lot of revisions in his novel.他对他的小说做了很多的修改。 convince v.使确信The footprints convinced the wife that the cat made the mess.地上的脚印使女主人确信是猫把房间弄乱的。 consult v.请教，咨询She is consulting the doctor about her illness.她正向医生咨询她的病情。 potential n.潜力，潜能adj.潜在的，可能的He has the potential to be very strong.他有变得非常强壮的潜力。 flame n.火焰，热情v.脸变红The house was in flames. We lost everything.房子烧毁了，我们失去了所有。 starvation n.饥饿I was suffering from starvation and exhaustion after heavy work.繁重的工作后，我又累又饿。 amusement n.娱乐，消遣This amusement park is still open at night.这座游乐园晚上也会开放。 ton n.吨，大量，许多Each of these containers weighs about thirty-two tons.这些集装箱每个都大约32吨重。 Catholic adj.（兴趣等）广泛的，（C大写）天主教的n.（C大写）天主教徒The new couple hold their wedding at a Catholic church.这对夫妇在天主教堂举办他们的婚礼。 decade n.十年，十年间People can change a lot after a decade.十年会给人带来很大的变化。 glare n.眩目的光v.怒目而视The sun’s glare made it hard to see.太阳强烈的光线让狗狗无法直视。 beard n.（下巴上的）胡须Santa is famous for his big white beard.圣诞老人因他的白色大胡子而出名。 fragrant adj.香的，芬芳的The air is fragrant with the scent of coffee.空气中弥漫着咖啡香。 appetite n.食欲，胃口Wow, what a huge appetite you have!天哪，你的胃口真大！ allowance n.零用钱，津贴，补贴He has an allowance of 3,000 dollars every month.他每月有3000刀零用钱。 adventure n.冒险，冒险活动The boy went on an adventure in the jungle.这个男孩到丛林里冒险了。 compromise n.妥协，折中v.使遭受危害The seller made a compromise and sold the dress at 50 yuan.商家做出了妥协，50元卖出了那条裙子。 conflict n.冲突，（意见）分歧，战斗，斗争v.冲突，抵触，争执We have a big conflict over who gets the shell.我们在谁该得到贝壳的问题上有很大的分歧。 vital adj.必不可少的，生命所必需的n.重要部分All human organs are vital to life.这些内脏器官对人们的生命来说是必不可少的。 insist v.坚持要求，坚持认为His mother insisted that he put on his warm trousers.男孩的妈妈坚持要他穿保暖裤。 shelter n.隐蔽处，躲避处v.遮蔽，掩护，庇护They build shelters from ice to keep themselves warm.他们用冰建造躲避处来抵御严寒。 spot n.斑点，污点v.发现，认出My son paints those blue spots on the wall.儿子在墙上画了这些蓝点。 folk adj.民间的，民俗的n.人们They are wearing traditional folk clothing.他们穿着传统的民间服饰。 troop n.部队v.群集，集合The troops are standing in the sun.部队站在烈日下。 advantage n.优势，利益，有利条件The rocket gives him an unfair advantage!火箭给了他不公平的优势。 rugby n.橄榄球Our rugby team has fantastic team spirit!我们的橄榄队有很棒的团队精神。 appoint v.委派，任命，约定，确定，指定My boss has appointed me to manage this project.我的老板任命我来管理这个项目。 porter n.行李员，搬运工人The porter carries customers’suitcases.行李员搬着客人们的行李箱。 stranger n.陌生人Kids, be careful of strangers offering candy!小朋友，小心拿糖给你吃的陌生人。 favour n.帮助，好感，赞成，偏爱v.偏爱，帮助，好感，赞成“Could you please do me a favour?” “Sure!”“你能帮我个忙吗？” “当然啦！” fasten v.扎牢，扣住We should all fasten our seat belts before I start the car.在开车之前，我们都应该系牢安全带。 routine n.常规，例行公事，一套固定舞步（或动作）adj.例行的，普通的，惯例的This is the girl’s daily routine.这是小女孩每天都要做的事。 band n.乐队，帮伙v.用带捆扎The band is playing music on the stage.乐队在舞台上演奏音乐。 conceited adj.自负的，自高自大的He’s so conceited! He always thinks he’s better than others.这个男人很自负，他总以为他自己比别人更好。 bridegroom n.新郎The bridegroom is gressed in a suit with a white rose.新郎穿着一件西装，胸口别着一朵玫瑰。 raw adj.生的，未煮过的，未加工的The beef on the wooden board is raw.木板上的牛肉是生的。 awesome adj.极好的，棒极了的，引起敬畏的，可怕的His surfing skills are truly awesome!他的冲浪技术实在是非常好。 volunteer v.自愿做，主动提供（信息），自愿加入n.义务工作者“Will anybody volunteer to clean the park up?” “I’ll do it!”“有没有人自愿打扫公园？” “我愿意。” arbitrary adj.随意的，任性的，随心所欲的It’s an arbitrary way to make decisions by coins.抛硬币做决定是一种随意的方式。 level n.水平面，水平，标准，等级vi.瞄准adj.等高的vt.对准目标The global warming rises the sea level.温室效应提升了水平面。 regret vt.懊悔，后悔n.后悔，遗憾I really regret not finishing school.我好后悔没有完成学业。 centigrade n.摄氏度adj.百分度的The flower grows well at 25 degrees centigrade.花在25摄氏度的环境下生长的很好。 chips n.炸土豆条Do you like chips with tomato sauce?你喜欢番茄酱配薯条吗？ accent n.口音，腔调，重音符号v.重读He has such a funny accent!他的口音太搞笑了！ seldom adv.很少，不常It seldom rains in the desert.沙漠里很少下雨。 purchase v.购买n.购买，所购之物The shirt is so cheap that I really want to purchase it!这件T恤太便宜了，我想买。 matter v.要紧，有关系n.问题，事件，物质Food, water and housing matter for survival.食物、水和房子对生存来说至关重要。 bent adj.弯曲的，决心的，不诚实的v.弯腰，弯曲These nails are bent - they’re useless!这些钉子弯了，它们没用了！ acute adj.（疼痛、妒忌等）剧烈的，严重的I have a very acute, sharp pain in my stomach.我的胃有一阵剧烈的疼痛。 adore v.很喜欢，极喜爱It’s obvious that one elephant adores the other.很明显，那头小象喜欢另一头小象。 mature adj.成熟的vi.成熟vt.使成熟She looks mature with heavy make-up.她化着浓妆，看起来很成熟。 vice n.恶习，罪行Sleeping late is a vice.睡懒觉是一种恶习。 generous adj.慷概的，肥沃的The generous man gives luchy money to us on November 11th.这个慷概的男人在11月11日给我们发红包。 merely adv.仅仅，只不过It’s not a serious injury. It’s merely a scratch.不是很严重的伤口，只是擦伤而已。 virtue n.美德，德行Helping the old is a traditional virtue of China.帮助老人是中华民族的传统美德。 court n.法院，法庭，球场v.招致危险No one is in the court today.法庭今天没人。 scholarship n.奖学金She studied hard and got a schoiarship.她努力学习，并获得了奖学金。 funeral n.葬礼，丧葬They will go to the man’s funeral in black.他们将着黑色服装出席男子的葬礼。 portable adj.轻便的，手提的，便携式的I prefer portable computers - they’re more convenient.我更喜欢手提电脑，它们更方便。 admire v.钦佩，崇拜The little boy admires the firemen and salutes them.小男孩很钦佩消防员叔叔们并向他们敬礼。 rude adj.粗鲁的，无礼貌的Your salesmen are very rude. They yelled at me today.你的销售员们非常粗鲁，他们今天对我大吼大叫！ courage n.勇气，胆量，胆识He jumped off with great courage.他勇敢地一跃而下。 approach v.靠近n.途径The turtle is slowly approaching the finish line.乌龟正缓缓爬向终点线。 silent adj.沉默的，寂静的n.无声电影We should keep silent in the library.我们在图书馆里应该保持安静。 prescription n.处方，药方，（医生开）的药The doctor passed the prescription to the patient.医生把处方递给了病人。 locust n.蝗虫Oh no! The locusts ate all our crops!哦不！蝗虫吃光了我们的作物！ innocent adj.天真的，单纯的The new born baby looks innocent when he smiles.这个新生儿笑的时候看起来好单纯。 mend v.修理，缝补The man is mending the car.这个人正在修汽车。 tension n.（精神上的）紧张，不安，紧张局面The writer is feeling great tension because of the coming deadline.截止日期就要到了，这位作家十分紧张。 fried adj.油炸的，油煎的All I wanted was a plate of delicious fried foods.我只是想要一盘美味的油炸食物。 helmet n.头盔，盔形物vt.给…戴头盔Wear a helmet to protect your head.戴上头盔来保护你的头部。 deaf adj.聋的，不愿听的The old man is almost deaf so please speak louder.老人几乎聋了，请说话大声一点。 spin v.（使）旋转n.旋转“Look, I can spin the basketball on my finger!” said the little girl.“看，我能让篮球在我的手指上转动！”小女孩说。 trend n.时尚，趋势v.转向，使趋向The new trend is for girls to wear very colorful cloting.女孩儿们现在流行穿多彩的服饰。 bare adj.赤裸的，空的，贫瘠的She walked on the beach in bare feet.她赤着脚走在沙滩上。 pour v.注入，倒入，下（雨）I’ll pour a glass of wine for you.我会为你倒一杯红酒。 bargain vi.讨价还价，讲价n.便宜货adj.（价格），低廉的vt.经讨价还价成交The old lady is trying to bargain with the seller.那位老太太试图和商家砍价。 doubt n.怀疑，疑虑v.怀疑She is having doubts about her husband’s loyalty.她怀疑她的丈夫出轨了。 fellow n.家伙，男人adj.处于相同情况的，同类的vt.使…与另一个对等，使…与另一个匹敌Those two fellows are celebrating their success.那两个家伙在庆祝他们的成功。 wisdom n.智慧，学问，明智，正确判断This book is full of the wisdom of Confucius.这本书里蕴含着孔子的智慧。 theft n.偷盗，失窃Theft is everywhere, even on the internet.盗窃无处不在，甚至网上也有。 garment n.服装We have all kinds of garments for you to wear.我们有各式各样的服装供你穿。 wander v.漫游，迷路n.闲逛The young couple is wandering in the park.这对年轻的夫妇正在公园里漫步。 manner n.态度，举止，风俗，习惯It’s bad manners to speak while you are eating.一边吃饭一边说话是不礼貌的举止。 mental adj.精神的He takes pills as candy out of his mental sickness.这个人精神出问题了，才会把药当作糖。

entry.title: 百词斩高中复习20190416
entry.content: 复习hydrogen n.氢，氢气The girl’s hydrogen balloon just flew away. Quick, catch it!女孩的氢气球飞走了。快，抓住它！ tin n.罐头These tins contain different colors of paint.这些罐子里装着不同颜色的颜料。 encourage v.鼓励，支持I encourage my girlfriend to do exercise.我鼓励女友做运动。 contribute v.捐献，捐助Many people contribute money to help people in need.很多人捐钱来帮助有需要的人们。 shut v.关上，闭上She shut the door after leaving the room.出门后她关上了门。 expense n.花费，费用Buying a car can be a great expense.买车是笔大费用。 visa n.签证I’ve got my visa in my passport, now let’s begin the journey!拿到签证了，现在我们去旅行吧！ unconditional adj.绝对的，无条件的Mothers have unconditional love for their children.妈妈对孩子的爱是无条件的。 brick n.砖块，砖Builders are using bricks to build the wall.建筑工人在用砖块砌墙。 confidential adj.机密的，表示信任的These confidential documents are top secret.这些秘密文件是绝对机密。 range n.射程，放牧场vi.排成一排vt.排列adj.牧场的The target is within range. I bet I can hit it!目标在射程内。我肯定能射中它！ silly adj.傻的，愚蠢的n.（通常指小孩子）淘气鬼，傻孩子He looks so silly with his head in his clothes.他把头缩进衣服里，看起来真傻。 obey v.服从，听从，遵从He always obeys his wife without question.他对他夫人唯命是从。 defeat v.打败n.击败，战胜Black defeated White.黑棋战胜了白旗。 leftover n.剩菜，残余物adj.残余的The leftovers were a feast for the hungry dog.对于饥肠辘辘的狗来说剩菜都是宴席。 acquire v.（尤指靠自己的努力或行动或经过一个过程）获得The little boy acquired knowledge of the universe from reading.小男孩通过阅读学到了很多关于宇宙的知识。 spaghetti n.意大利式细面条Spaghetti is a kind of Italian food.意面是一道意大利菜。 apporximately adv.近似地，大约Pi is approximately equal to 3.1416.圆周率大约等于3.1416. sew v.缝，缝纫vt.缝补She uses the machine to sew a new dress.她用机器缝制新裙子。 mushroom n.蘑菇vi.迅速发展“Give me back my hat” said the mushroom sadly.“把帽子还给我！”蘑菇难过地说道。 concern n.关心，担忧v.感兴趣，涉及，关心，（使）担忧She shows her concern by helping the old lady walk.通过帮助那位老太太走路，她表现出了她的关心。 fundamental adj.基本的，根本的，重要的n.基本原理In modem society, Wi-Fi is the most fundamental need.现代社会中，无线网络成为人们最基本的需求。 medium adj.中等的，适中的n.媒介I’d like a medium size television.我想要中等尺寸的电视。 shore n.岸，滨There is a big “2017” on the shore.在海岸上有一个大大的”2017”. subjective adj.主观（上）的，个人的The taste in art is a highly subjective matter.品味艺术是一件主观性很强的事。 present n.礼物，赠送物v.赠送，呈现adj.出席的，当前的A present for me? Thank you! You’re so sweet.给我的礼物？谢谢，你真好。 chopsticks n.筷子There are four pairs of chopsticks on the bamboo mat.竹垫上有四双筷子。 dignity n.威严，威风，尊严，高贵The policeman and the firefighter serve with dignity and honor.警察和消防队员怀着尊严和荣誉任职。 bureaucratic adj.官僚的，官僚政治的This company has many bureaucratic procedures you need to go through.这个公司有很多繁荣缛节。 ferry n.渡船，渡轮v.渡运（人、车或物等）We took the ferry down the river.我们乘坐了渡船顺流而下。 reserve n.储备，保护区v.预订It is always good to have some stock in reserve.储备些存货总没错。 facial adj.表面的，面部的n.面部按摩，美容His funny facial expressions always make me laugh.他面部表情太搞笑了，我简直笑到停不下来！ abundant adj.大量的This garden has an abundant amount of flowers.这个花园有大量的花朵。 tend v.照料，倾向They tend the tree with care.他们小心照料这棵树。 customs n.海关，关税You need a passport to pass through customs.你需要一本护照才能通过海关。 united adj.团结的，和睦的Let’s stay united through these difficult times.让我们在这困难时刻团结一致。 bid n.出价，努力争取v.出价The winning bid was just $5.中标价仅是5美元。 harmony n.和睦，和谐They live together in perfect harmony.他们和睦地住在一起。 literature n.文学，宣传册，文献These four books are the classics of Chinese literature.这四本书是中国的文学经典。 instruction n.说明She follows are instruction to take her medicine.她按照说明书的指示服药。 negotiate v.谈判，交涉，商议They’re negotiating a deal, but neither is willing to make a compromise.他们在协商一门生意，但双方都不愿意让步。 wound n.创伤，伤口v.伤，伤害She has a small wound on her knee.她膝盖上有一个小伤口。 generation n.一代，一代人My family includes three generations of people.我们家三代同堂。 owe v.把…归于，欠钱I owe my full mark to this phone app!我把我的满分归功于这个手机应用！ fantasy n.幻想，想象In his fantasy, he is a superhero!在他的幻想中，他是个超级英雄！ aggression n.攻击行为，（挑衅）行为，侵略This cat looks full of aggression.这只猫看起来充满了攻击性。 jungle n.丛林，密林，危险地带I love to explore deep into the jungle.我喜欢去丛林深处探险。 decline n.衰退v.【语】使发生词尾变化，使变格The world economy is on the decline.世界经济日趋低迷。 embarrass vt.使窘迫，使尴尬（尤指在社交场合），困窘，困扰He embarrassed himself by farting in front of a lady.当着女生的面放屁，他超级尴尬。 pedestrian n.步行者，行人adj.平庸无奇的，无聊的Many pedestrians are crossing the street.许多行人正在过马路。 offence n.犯罪，冒犯，攻击，过错，令人讨厌的事物He must be punished for this terrible offence.他必须因为这严重的犯罪行为而受到惩罚。 damp adj.潮湿的，有湿气的London is damp and wet.伦敦很潮湿。 picnic n.郊游，野餐The family enjoyed a nice picnic outside.一家人在室外享用了一顿很好的野餐。 amount n.数量，总额.等同，接近The amount of sugar in this product is 28g.这类食物中的糖总量是28克。 missile n.导弹，投射出的物体或武器Missiles are used to attack enemies from a long distance.导弹被用于远距离攻击敌人。 sympathy n.同情，同感He felt a lot of sympathy for the dog and gave it a bone.他很同情那条小狗并给了它一块骨头。 react v.起反应，有影响，对…做出反应Different people react differently when shown a horror movie.看恐怖电影时不同的人有不同的反应。 vocabulary n.词汇（量），词（汇）表This software will help increase your English vocabulary!这个软件会帮你增加你的英语词汇量。 secure adj.安全的，安心的v.使安全It’s secure to put money into the safe.将钱放进保险箱是非常安全的。 addicted adj.上了瘾的，入了迷的He is addicted to computer games.他对电脑游戏上瘾了。 partner n.伙伴，搭档，配偶，伴侣v.成为…的合伙人They are great dancing partners.他们是很好的舞伴。 circumstance n.条件，情况Success depends on many different circumstances.成功取决于许多不同的条件。 moral adj.道德（上）的，道义的n.道德，品行To return the money you found or not, it’s moral dilemma.捡到的钱要不要还回去，这是一个道德难题。 purpose n.目的，意图v.打算They ran the race together, but with a different purpose in mind.虽然他们都在跑步，但是他们各自目的不同。 ambiguous adj.含糊不清的，引起歧义的，模棱两可的Do you see a vase or two faces? It’s pretty ambiguous.你看到的是一个花瓶还是两张脸呢？这张图相当模棱两可。 leather n.皮革，皮制品The sofa and pillow are covered in real leather.沙发和枕头都是真皮做的。 effort n.努力，成就I made every effort to push the ball up.我用尽全力把球往上推。 expression n.表情，神情，表达，表述She took many pictures of different expressions.她照了很多不同表情的照片。 bakery n.面包房I went to the bakery to buy some bread.我去面包店买了一些面包。 thermos n.保温瓶，热水瓶She is pouring hot water from the thermos.她在用保温瓶倒水。 bend v.（使）弯曲，（使）改变（主意），使屈服n.弯曲，弯曲处，倾向，屈服She is bending her waist to do some exercise.她弯下她的腰，来做运动。 athlete n.运动员，体育家，强壮的人He was a great athlete who ran really fast.他以前是个优秀的运动员，跑的非常快。 mist n.薄雾，朦胧The forest is covered in mist.这片森林被薄雾覆盖。 riddle n.谜，谜语v.解谜，出谜题，满是弹孔What is the answer to the riddle?这个谜语的谜底到底是啥啊？ attractive adj.吸引人的，有魅力的，引起兴趣的I find orange food attractive.我觉得橙色哦食物很吸引人。 eagle n.鹰状标志The eagle is a national symbol of the United States.鹰是美国的象征。 freezing adv.冷冻一样的adj.冷冻用的The weather is freezing cold today.今天天气非常冷！ tissue n.面巾纸，（动植物的）组织，纱布The little girl uses a tissue when she sneezes.打喷嚏时，小女孩扯了张纸巾。 defence n.防御，防务，辩护The woman learns self defence.这个女人学习自卫。 reception n.前台，接待处，接收，欢迎，招待会The couple got their room key at the hotel reception.这对夫妇在酒店前台拿到了房间钥匙。 feast n.盛宴，节日v.尽情地吃We are having a big Thanksgiving feast.我们正在吃感恩节大餐。 majority n.多数，大多数，多数票The majority of the basketball fans support the L.A Lakers.大多篮球迷支持湖人队。 relevant adj.有关的，贴切的Before you write this essay you should read some books relevant to the subject.在写论文之前，你应该阅读一些和主题相关的书籍。 determine v.确定，决定The chubby dog is determined to lose weight.这只胖狗下定了决心要减肥。 metal n.金属，合金，金属制品vt.（以金属）覆盖，装配Wow, these roses are made of metal.哇，这些玫瑰花是金属做的。 sick adj.有病的，恶心的n.病人v.呕吐All this cold has made me sick, and now I can’t stop sneezing!这大冷天把我冻生病了，我现在一直打喷嚏！ civilization n.文明，开花，教养The Egyptian civilization lasted for thousands of years.埃及文明延续了上千年。 contribution n.贡献，投稿稿件，捐献物Thanks to all of you for making a contribution to our organization.感谢各位给我们慈善团体的捐献。 appearance n.外貌，外表，公开露面Her appearance will become more beautiful after make-up.她的外表在化妆之后变得更漂亮了。 ancient adj.远古的，古代的，古老的These ancient statues are over 2,000 years old.这些古代雕像有2000多年的历史。 ancestor n.祖宗It was said that the ancestors of mankind looked like apes.据说人类的祖宗看起来像猿猴。 phenomenon n.现象The green northern lights are a natural electrical phenomenon.绿色极光是一种自然电学现象。 bury v.埋葬，隐藏，埋藏When people are dead, we bury them here.人死后被埋葬在这儿。 suck v.吸入，吸收，使卷入n.吸允，吸力Little kids like to suck their own thumbs.小孩子喜欢吸允自己的拇指。 mineral adj.矿物的n.矿物，矿物质It’s good for our health to drink mineral water.多喝矿物质水对我们的健康有好处。 boil v.烧开，沸腾You can drink hot water when the water starts to boil.水开了你就能喝热水了。 pub n.酒吧，酒馆Let’s go down to the pub to get some drinks!我们去酒吧里喝点酒吧！ antique n.古董adj.古董的These coins are antiques.这些钱币是古董。 passive adj.被动的，消极的n.被动语态He played a passive role in the marriage.他在婚姻中扮演了一个被动的角色。 voluntary adj.自愿的，无偿的n.即兴曲Giving blood is 100% voluntary, nobody will force you to do it.献血是百分之百自愿的，没人会强迫你去做。 prepare v.准备，预备She spent a long time to prepare a warm hat for the emperor.她花了很长时间为皇上准备一顶暖和的帽子。 stomachache n.胃痛，腹痛I have a bad stomachache - probably something I ate…我感觉到严重的胃痛-很可能是因为吃坏了什么… quality n.质量adj.优质的The quality of this spoon is terrible!这勺子的质量真是太差了！ dentist n.牙医The dentist cleaned my teeth.牙医清洁了我的牙齿。 practical adj.心灵手巧的；注重实际的，务实的，实际的，实用的，实践的，切合实际的My daughter’s very practical - she’s helping to build our house.我女儿心灵手巧，她在帮助我们建造房子。 arch n.拱门，拱起v.做成拱形These grand arches create such a beautiful structure.这些壮丽的拱门造型组成了漂亮的结构。 examine v.检查，细查，对…进行考试The vet is examining my dog.兽医在给我家的狗狗做检查。 brave adj.勇敢的The brave man fought with the dragon.那个勇敢的男人与恶龙战斗。 purse n.钱包，小钱袋，手袋This purse can hold many coins.这个钱包可以装很多硬币。 contradict v.与…发生矛盾，与…抵触，与…对立The signs contradict each other. Which way should we go?这些标志互相矛盾，我们应该走哪条路呢？ slip v.滑倒，跌落，溜走，疏忽n.溜走He slipped on the wet floor and fell.他在地板上滑倒了。 silver n.银，银子，银币adj.银色的vt.度银于，使…成银色I got a silver medal, meaning that I came in second place.我得了一枚银牌，这意味着我拿了第二名。

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190415
entry.content: 复习wire n.电缆，电线，金属线Look, many birds are sitting on the wires!看，有很多鸟站在电线上呢！ tense adj.（神经）紧张的v.使拉紧，拉紧n.时态I feel really tense about the coming exam.我真的很担心即将来临的考试。 astronaut n.宇航员I would love to be an astronaut and go to space.我想成为一名宇航员并进入太空。 grocery n.食品杂货店Every day she goes shopping in the grocery store.她每天都去食品杂货店购物。 apologise vi.道歉，认错I should apologise to my friend for yelling at him.我应该向我朋友道歉，因为我对他大声吼叫了。 suspension n.悬浮，暂停In outer space, things are in a state of suspension.在外太空，东西处于悬浮状态。 conscience n.良心，良知My conscience always tells me to do something right.我的良心经常告诉我要做对的事情。 cast v.投，掷，放钓n.演员表，演员阵容He’s going to cast that rock by the seaside.他在海边准备把石块投掷出去。 helicopter n.直升机We took a helicopter ride over the sea.我们搭乘直升机飞过大海。 abortion n.堕胎，流产She wants an abortion because she doesn’t want the baby.她想堕胎，因为她不想要宝宝。 monument n.纪念碑，遗迹，遗址The Washington Monument stands in the center of Washington DC.华盛顿纪念碑矗立在华盛顿市中心。 starve v.（使）饿死，挨饿The bear is starving, it doesn’t have enough food to eat.这只熊快饿死了，它没有食物吃。 tick v.用勾作为记号，发出嘀嗒声n.勾号，（钟表）嘀嗒声，一刹那I tick the boxes one by one.我挨个在勾选框打了勾。 splendid adj.壮观的，辉煌的，华丽的Look at this splendid sunset! I love this place.看这落日多美啊！我真喜欢这里。 servant n.仆人This is my servant with the drinks.这是我送饮料的仆人。 mess n.凌乱状态，混乱状态v.浪费时间，瞎闹My dog made a mess in the room.我的狗狗把房间里弄得乱七八糟的。 architecture n.（总称）建筑物，建筑学，建筑体系，结构The bright colors is one feature of ancient Chinese architecture.艳丽的色彩是中国古建筑的特点之一。 retire v.退休，退役The retired couple are traveling together.这对已经退休的夫妻正在一起旅行。 demand v.强烈要求，需要n.要求（坚决的），需求The bad guy demanded $1,000,000, or he would kill the boy.坏人要求100万赎金，否则他就要撕票。 currency n.货币，流通In different countries, we must use a different currency to buy things.在不同的国家，我们得用不同的货币来买东西。 punctuate v.加标点于，强调Which one do I use to punctuate my sentence?这个句子里我该用哪个标点呢？ balcony n.阳台，剧院楼厅I like to stand on my apartment’s balcony.我喜欢站在公寓的阳台上。 assess v.评估How do you assess the risk level of this investment? Low, medium or hight?你对这次投资的风险评估是怎样的？低，中等，还是高风险？ petrol n.（英）汽油“Please fill my car up with petrol!” the driver said.司机说：”麻烦加满油！” glory n.光荣，荣誉Winning the first prize brings him much glory.得了第一名他感到非常光荣。 sculpture n.雕刻，雕塑The lion sculpture is made of stone.狮子雕塑是用石头刻的。 新的学习cautious adj.（of）小心的，谨慎的The maid is very cautious not to make a mistake in front of the empress.这个丫鬟在皇后面前非常谨慎，不敢犯任何错误。 blanket n.毯子，覆盖层adj.不加区别的vt.用毯子盖The baby is covered with a blanket to keep it warm.为了保暖，宝宝盖上毛毯。 liquid n.液体adj.液体的Water is a kind of liquid without color.水是一种没有颜色的液体。 flour n.面粉，粉状物质There is a bag of flour.这里有一包面粉。 enquiry n.询问，问讯处I make enquiries at the information desk.我在咨询台咨询了一些事情。 budget n.预算v.预算，安排adj.廉价的I don’t have much money for the budget.我的钱不够预算。 drill v.钻孔，在…上钻孔n.钻头The worker drills into the wall.工人在墙上钻孔。 sacred adj.神圣的，宗教（性）的In India, the elephant is a sacred animal.在印度，大象被视为神圣的动物。 allergic adj.过敏的，对…讨厌的Look at his face! The poor guy was allergic to seafood.看他的脸，这个可怜的家伙对海鲜过敏。 muddy adj.泥泞的，浑浊的v.显得扑朔迷离It’ll take hours to drive down this muddy road.驶过这段泥泞小路要花好几个小时。 athletic adj.运动的，体育的，强壮的The athletic man runs for long distances without needing to rest.这个运动员可以跑很长的距离，并且不用休息。 equipment n.设备High-tech equipment is used in the factory.工厂运用高科技设备。 neat adj.整洁的，不掺水的The folded clothes look very neat in the drawer.抽屉里折叠起来的衣服看起来很整洁。 giraffe n.长颈鹿I wish I was tall and thin like a giraffe!我喜欢自己像长颈鹿一样又高又瘦。 sorrow n.悲伤，苦恼，伤心v.感到悲伤，为…悲痛Her tears are full of sorrow.她的眼泪充满悲伤。 assessment n.评估The reson for the audit is to make an assessment about the data.审计的职责是分析数据并作出评估。 iron n.熨斗adj.刚强的v.烫（衣），熨Use an iron to straighten clothing.用熨斗把衣服熨平。 ash n.灰，灰烬The ashtray is full of ash.这个烟灰缸里满是烟灰。 advertisement n.广告，登广告This advertisement is to promote a new product.这则广告的目的是推广新产品。 settle v.安顿，调停They are getting settled in their new house.他们在新房子里安顿下来。 symptom n.症状Flu symptoms include a headache, sore throat and a fever.流感的症状包括头痛、嗓子痛和发烧。 inn n.客栈，小旅馆This traditional inn is surrounded by trees.这个传统的小旅店被绿树环绕。 nervous adj.紧张的，焦虑不安的The father is nervous about his baby’s birth.这个父亲因为宝宝的出生很紧张。 bungalow n.平房，小屋I live in a little bungalow by the beach.我住在沙滩边的小屋里。 barbecue v.烧烤，红烧n.烤肉架My favorite food is barbecued meat.我最喜欢的食物是烤肉。

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190414
entry.content: 复习experiment n.实验v.(on)进行实验The scientist is doing an experiment.科学家在做一项实验。 recognize v.辨别，认出I can recognize you, though you are dressed like a sheep.虽然你扮成羊，我还是认得出你。 accumulate vt.积攒，积累vi.聚积，堆积He accumulates money for future use.他攒了些钱，以供将来使用。 pyramid n.金字塔I will travel to Egypt to look at the pyramids.我想去埃及旅行看看金字塔。 memorial n.纪念像，纪念物，纪念碑，纪念仪式adj.纪念的The gravestones are decorated with flags on National Memorial Day.在国家公祭日，墓碑都用国旗装饰了起来。 sigh v.叹气，叹息n.叹气，叹息She sighed and said, “I’m old and ugly now”.她叹一声气，说道，”我真是老了，不漂亮了”。 spray n.喷雾，浪花vi.飞溅，喷vt.向…扫射We can use this spray to make the house smell better.我们可以用这个喷雾让室内更好闻。 fibre n.纤维（物质），性格，质地We use optical fibre to channel information effectively.我们运用光线来有效传输信息。 wrinkle n.皱纹，褶皱，转折，改变v.（使）起褶皱There are some wrinkles around the old lady’s eyes.老妇人眼睛周围上长了一些皱纹。 undivided adj.（注意力）专一的，(国家)没分开的He gives undivided attention to his work and doesn’t hear the phone ringing.他专心致志地工作，并没有听到手机铃声。 laundry n.洗衣，送洗的衣物Doing laundry is part of my housework.我的家务之一是洗衣服。 commercial adj.商业性的，贸易的n.商业广告This is the busiest commercial street in the city.这是这个城市最繁华的商业街了。 tendency n.趋向，趋势，倾向There’s a good tendency for our company’s business.我们公司的业务有一个良好的趋势。 apology n.道歉，（表达）歉意The man put his hands together to show his apology.他双手合十表达歉意。 quantity n.数量，数目I eat a large quantity of food every day.我每天都吃大量的食物。 various adj.各种各样的We saw various types of fish during our dive.在潜水时，我们看到了各种各样的鱼。 museum n.博物馆，展览馆There are many pieces of art in the museum.博物馆里有很多艺术作品。 awkward adj.尴尬的，不方便的He felt a bit awkward when receiving a bunch of crops.收到一束大麦，他有点尴尬。 新的学习wire n.电缆，电线，金属线Look, many birds are sitting on the wires!看，有很多鸟站在电线上呢！ tense adj.（神经）紧张的v.使拉紧，拉紧n.时态I feel really tense about the coming exam.我真的担心即将来临的考试。 astronaut n.宇航员I would love to be an astronaut and go to space.我想成为一名宇航员并进入太空。 grocery n.食品杂货店Every day she goes shopping in the grocery store.她每天都去食品杂货店购物。 suspension n.悬浮，暂停In outer space, things are in a state of suspension.在外太空，东西处于悬浮状态。 conscience n.良心，良知My conscience always tells me to do something right.我的良心经常告诉我要做对的事情。 cast v.投，掷，放钓n.演员表、演员阵容He’s going to cast that rock by the seaside.他在海边准备把石块投掷出去。 helicopter n.直升机We took a helicopter ride over the sea.我们搭乘直升机飞过大河。 abortion n.堕胎，流产She wants an abortion because she doesn’t want the baby.她想堕胎，因为她不想要宝宝。 starve v.（使）饿死，挨饿The bear is starving, it doesn’t have enouth food to eat.这只熊快饿死了，它没有食物吃。 splendid adj.壮观的，辉煌的，华丽的Look at this splendid sunset! I love this place.看这落日多美啊！我真喜欢这里。 servant n.仆人This is my servant with the drinks.这是我送饮料的仆人。 architecture n.（总称）建筑物，建筑学，建筑体系，结构The bright colors is one feature of ancient Chinese architecture.艳丽的色彩是中国古建筑的特点之一。 rooster n.公鸡，自负的男人The rooster woke me up this morning - cock-a-doodle-doo!这只公鸡今天早上叫醒了我，咯咯咯！ civilian n.平民，百姓adj.平民的，百姓的，民用的The soldiers guarantee the safety of civilians.士兵们保证了平民的安全。 punctuate v.加标点于，强调Which one do I use to punctuate my sentence?这个句子里我该用哪个标点呢？ balcony n.阳台，剧院楼厅I like to stand on my apartment’s balcony.我喜欢站在公寓的阳台上。

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190413
entry.content: 复习solid adj.固体的，结实的n.固体Ice is the solid state of water.冰是水的固体状态。 lounge n.候机室，休息室，酒吧间，懒散的步子v.（懒散地）倚，躺People sit in the lounge waiting for boarding.人们坐在候机室里等待登机。 dip v.浸，蘸n.倾斜，下降I like to dip the cookie into the milk.我喜欢把饼干蘸牛奶吃。 considerate adj.体贴的，考虑周到的He is a considerate husband reminded his wife to take an umbrella.他是一位体贴的丈夫，会提醒妻子带伞。 tube n.管子，管道These tubes are made of steel.这些管子都是钢做的。 pest n.害虫，讨厌的人（或东西）Pests are annoying and harmful bugs.害虫是讨厌又有害的昆虫。 heaven n.天堂，极乐世界The angels opened the door to heaven.天使打开了天堂的门。 sleeve n.袖子One sleeve is too long while the other is fine.这只袖子太长了点，但另一只还好。 seaweed n.海草，海藻Seaweed grows in deep areas of the ocean.这种海藻生长在深海中。 stainless adj.不生锈的，不锈钢的These spoons and forks are made of stainless steel.勺子和叉子是由不锈钢制成的。 frequent adj.时常的，频繁的Her frequent online shopping costs her a lot of money.频繁地网上购物花了她很多钱。 anecdote n.轶事，趣闻The anecdote is about the mysterious creature in the ancient times.这桩轶事是关于古代的神兽的。 dimension n.维度，方面These shapes have three dimensions.这些图形有三个维度。 aid n.救护，援助v.帮助，援助，有助于The first aid kit is provided by the Red Cross.这个急救箱是红十字会提供的。 aware adj.意识到的，知道的He suddenly became aware of how to figure out the problem.他突然知道该怎么解决这道难题了。 disaster n.灾难，天灾Many houses were damaged in the disaster. What a pity!很多房屋在那场灾难中损坏了，真是不幸！ pray v.祈祷，祈求，请求，恳求The woman closed her eyes and began to pray.那个女人闭上眼睛开始祈祷。 expert n.专家adj.熟练的，专业的He is an expert at fixing the computer.他是修电脑的专家。 squirrel n.松树v.储存That squirrel looks so cute in snow.那只松树在雪地里看起来真可爱。 acquisition n.获得，掌握，获得物，取得物Reading is essential to the acquisition of knowledge.阅读对于获取知识来说是必要的。 plenty n.丰富，大量We have plenty of fruit and vegetables.我们有充足的水果和蔬菜。 compensate v.补偿，赔偿，给…报酬He must compensate for his mistakes.他必须弥补他的过失。 constitution n.组成，结构，宪法，章程The chemical constitution of vitamin B6 seems quite complex.维他命b6的化学构造看起来很复杂。 shabby adj.破烂的，卑鄙的，衣衫褴褛的Our plan was to buy and fix the shabby old house.我们的计划是买下并整修这个破旧的老房子。 professor n.教授The actor plays the role of a professor in that TV series.那个演员在那部电视剧中扮演一位教授。 cathedral n.大教堂adj.有权威的We visited a magnificent cathedral.我们参观了一座宏伟的教堂。 theatre n.戏院，剧院Let’s go to the theatre and watch a play!我们去剧院看戏吧！ navy n.海军I joined the navy to be at sea.我加入海军是为了出海。 chest n.胸膛We can see his strong chest under his shirt.我们可以看到他衬衫下强壮的胸膛。 training n.训练，培养You should be prepared before training.训练前你得准备好。 sniff v.嗅，吸气n.嗅，吸气（声）You might see dogs at the airport sniffing for illegal drugs.你可能会在机场看见狗在嗅毒品的味道。 accelerate v.加速，增长，使增速，促进The car accelerated from 60km/h to 100km/h.汽车从60km/h加速到来100km/h。 新的学习satisfy v.（使）满意，满足，符合…的标准The delicious pizza satisfied that boy.这个好吃的披萨满足了那个小朋友。 composition n.（文章或音乐的）创作Beethoven’s orchestral compositions are regarded as masterpieces by most people.贝多芬的作品被大多数人认为是世界上最伟大的。 mat n.垫子，草席The dog is sitting on the “welcome” mat.狗狗坐在印有”欢迎”的垫子上。 experiment n.实验v.(on)进行实验The scientist is doing an experiment.科学家在做一项实验。 withdraw v.取款，撤退，收回，撤离I’d like to withdraw $500 from the machine.我想从这台机器里取500美元。 recognize v.辨别，认出I can recognize you, though you are dressed like a sheep.虽然你扮成羊，我还是认得出你。 narrow adj.狭窄的v.使变窄，缩小n.海峡I will meet you on the other side of the narrow alley.我在窄巷子那头等你。 accumulate vt.积聚，积累vi.聚积，堆积He accumulates money for future use.他攒了些钱，以供将来使用。 memorial n.纪念像，纪念物，纪念碑，纪念仪式adj.纪念的The gravestones are decorated with flags on National Memorial Day.在国家公祭日，墓碑都用国旗装饰了起来。 spray n.喷雾，浪花vi.飞溅，喷vt.向…扫射We can use this spray to make the houes smell better.我们可以用这个喷雾让室内更好闻。 fibre n.纤维（物质），性格，质地We use optical fibre to channel information effectively.我们用光纤来有效传输信息。 lorry n.卡车，运货汽车All the stuff was carried in the lorry.所有货物都搬上卡车了。 undivided adj.（注意力）专一的，（国家）没分开的He gives undivided attention to his work and doesn’t hear the phone ringing.他专心致志地工作，并没有听到手机铃声。 laundry n.洗衣，送洗的衣服Doing laundry is part of my housework.我的家务之一是洗衣服。 razor n.剃刀，刮胡刀He shaved his face with a razor.他正在刮胡刀刮胡子。 commercial adj.商业性的，贸易的n.商业广告This is the busiest commercial street in the city.这是这个城市最繁华的商业街了。 waist n.腰The man put the measuring tape around his waist.这个人在腰上围了一条软尺。 tendency n.趋向，趋势，倾向There’s a good tendency for our company’s business.我们公司的业务有一个良好的趋势。 coal n.煤，煤块Coal is a very popular form of energy.煤是种很常见的能源。 apology n.道歉，（表达）歉意The man put his hands together to show his apology.他双手合十表达歉意。

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190412
entry.content: 复习absurd adj.可笑的，荒唐的n.荒唐It’s absurd for a grown man to ride such a small bike.成年人骑这么小的自行车是很可笑的。 skeptical adj.表示怀疑的He told me he can fly, but of course I’m skeptical.他告诉我他可以飞，不过当然我表示怀疑。 bless v.保佑，祝福，赐福，有幸具有She prayed that Buddha would bless her.她祈求佛祖保佑她。 diverse adj.不同的，差异的，多种多样的I can see diverse colors on their hands.在他们手上我能看到各种各样的颜色。 comb v.梳理n.梳理The mother is combing her daughter’s hair.妈妈正在帮她的女儿梳头发。 resonable adj.合理的，通情达理的The snacks are sold at a resonable price.这些零食售价十分合理。 fold v.折叠n.折叠She is good at folding paper into animals.她很擅长折纸。 culture n.文化，栽培v.使有教养It’s part of my family culture to pray before meals.饭前祷告是我们家庭文化的一部分。 oval adj.椭圆形的n.椭圆形The mirror is in oval shape.这镜子是椭圆形的。 entire adj.全部的，完整的，整个的From the airplane, I could see the entire city.在飞机上，我可以看到整个城市。 squid n.鱿鱼，枪乌贼Squids are my favorite seafood.鱿鱼是我最爱的海鲜。 abnormal adj.反常的It’s very abnormal for a sheep to be pink!粉红色的羊太反常了！ vague adj.含糊的，模糊的，不明确的，茫然的He didn’t understand her vague words.他没有理解女孩含糊的话语。 attempt vt.试图，尝试，努力去做n.尝试The cat attempts to catch that fish!那个喵星人试图抓到那条鱼！ correspond v.通信，相符，一致We correspond by email to stay in touch.我们靠电子邮件来保持联系。 chimney n.烟囱The chimney spits out smoke every day.烟囱每天都往外喷烟。 leak v.漏，泄漏n.漏洞Water is leaking through the ceiling! Poor guy!他家房顶正漏水呢！真可怜！ grain n.谷物种子，谷物，少量v.使成粒状Grains like wheat are used to make bread.像小麦这样的谷物是用来做面包的。 parallel adv.并行地，平行地adj.相似的n.相似物v.与…相似These trackes run parallel to each other.这些铁轨相互平行。 theory n.理论，原理That student is interested in all kinds of science theories.那孩子对各种科学理论都感兴趣。 urban adj.城市的，城镇的，都市的I like urban environments, especially landscape at night.我喜欢都市的氛围，尤其是夜晚的景象。 telescope n.望远镜vi.缩短adj.套筒的，伸缩式的vt.使套入You can see many distant stars through the telescope.通过望远镜，你可以看到许多遥远的星星。 achieve v.完成，达到，获得，实现I finally achieved my goal of winning the race.我赢了跑步比赛，终于达成了我的目标。 lack n.欠缺v.缺乏，不足Bacause of a lack of water, few plants can grow here.因为缺乏水，植物很难在这儿存活下来。 burden n.负担，重担v.使负担，装载，烦扰Our burden is too heavy, because we have too much homework.我们的负担太重了，因为每天都有很多作业。 dynasty n.王朝，朝代Egyptian history had many dynasties.埃及历史上有很多王朝。 relate v.相关，有联系，讲述The family tree shows everyone I’m related to.这个家谱显示了和我有关联的所有人。 irrigation n.灌溉The farmers have a new irrigation system to water the fields.农民们有了新的灌溉系统来浇灌农田。 sauce n.酱，调味汁Wow! The tomato sauce in the bowl looks so delicious.哇！碗里的番茄酱看起来很好吃的样子。 desperate adj.绝望的，孤注一掷的The unemployed man looks so desperate.那个失业的男人看上如此的绝望。 bound adj.受约束的，有义务的v.束缚，跳跃着前行n.跳跃These ropes are bound to the ring.这些绳子和铁环绑在了一起。 buffet n.自助餐，（火车内）餐室，冷餐桌v.反复敲打，打击，重击You can eat as much as you like at the buffet.吃自助餐的时候，你可以想吃多少就吃多少。 physician n.内科医生My physician told me to eat more fruits and vegetables.我的内科医生告诉我要多吃水果和蔬菜。 racial adj.种族的Racial orgin has nothing to do with making friends.种族背景毫不影响结交朋友。 deposit v.存款，存放n.存款，定金I deposit money in my piggy bank when I can.当我有钱我会往我的存钱罐里存钱。 新的学习solid adj.固体的，结实的n.固体Ice is the solid state of water.冰是水的固体状态。 lounge n.候机室，休息室，酒吧间，懒散的步子v.（懒散地）倚，躺People sit in the lounge waiting for boarding.人们坐在候机室里等待登机。 dip v.浸，蘸n.倾斜，下降I like to dip the cookie into the milk.我喜欢把饼干蘸牛奶吃。 considerate adj.体贴的，考虑周到的He is a considerate husband reminded his wife to take an umbrella.他是一位体贴的丈夫，会提醒妻子带伞。 tube n.管子，管道These tubes are made of steel.这些管子都是钢做的。 goodness n.善良，精髓Taking care of injured kittens shows her goodness.照顾受伤的小猫体现了她的善良。 pest n.害虫，讨厌的人（或东西）Pests are annoying and harmful bugs.害虫是讨厌又害怕的昆虫。 disappointment n.沮丧His disappointment at not getting the job showed in his face.他位得到工作，沮丧就写在脸上。 heaven n.天堂，极乐世界The angels opened the door to heaven.天使开了天堂的门。 sleeve n.袖子One sleeve is too long while the other is fine.这只袖子太长了点，但另一只还好。 seaweed n.海草，海藻Seaweed grows in deep areas of the ocean.这种海藻生长在深海中。 stainless adj.不生锈的，不锈钢的These spoons and forks are made of stainless steel.勺子和叉子是由不锈钢制成的。 frequent adj.时常的，频繁的Her frequent online shopping costs her a lot of money.频繁地网上购物花了很多钱。 anecdote n.趣闻，轶事The anecdote is about the mysterious creature in the ancient times.这桩轶事是关于古代神兽的。 explanation n.解释，说明My professor always answears my questions with long explanations.我的教授总是用很长的解释来回答我的疑问。 dimension n.维度，方面These shapes have three dimensions.这些图形有三个维度。 affect v.影响，感动，作用Second hand smoking may affect other people’s health.二手烟会影响其他人的健康。 aid n.救护，援助v.帮助，援助，帮助，有助于The first aid kit is provided by the Red Cross.这个急救箱是红十字会提供的。 aware adj.意识到，知道的He suddenly became aware of how to figure out the problem.他突然知道怎么解决这道难题了。 educate v.教育，培养，训练My children were all educated in public schools.我的孩子们都在公立学校接受教育。 disaster n.灾难，天灾Many houses were damaged in the disaster. What a pity!很多房屋在那场灾难中损坏了，真是不幸！ courtyard n.庭院，院子The dog is having fun in the courtyard.狗狗在院子里愉快地玩耍。 pray v.祈祷，祈求，请求，恳求The woman closed her eyes and bagan to pray.那个女人闭上眼睛开始祈祷。 expert n.专家adj.熟练的，专业的He is an expert at fixing the computer.他是修电脑的专家。 squirrel n.松树v.储存That squirrel looks so cute in snow.那只松树在雪地里看起来真可爱。 acquisition n.获得，掌握，获得物，取得物Reading is essential to the acquisition of knowledge.阅读对于获取知识来说是必要的。 compensate v.补偿，赔偿，给…报酬He must compensate for his mistakes.他必须弥补他的过失。 constitution n.组成，结构，宪法，章程The chemical constitution of vitamin B6 seems uite complex.维他命b6的化学构造看起来很复杂。 shabby adj.破烂的，卑鄙的，衣衫褴褛的Our plan was to buy and fix the shabby old house.我们的计划是买下并整修这个破旧的老房子。 pool n.水塘，集中起来的一批人v.挖掘，集中资源（或材料）There is a big swimming pool in the park.公园里有个超大的游泳池。 valid adj.有效的，正式认可的，合理的，有根据的The offical stamp showed that the document was valid.政府的印章表明我的文件是有效的。 fry v.油炸，油煎Fry the potatoes until they turn golden yellow.把薯条炸到金黄色为止。 professor n.教授The actor plays the role of a professor in that TV series.那个演员在那部电视剧中扮演一位教授。 simple-minded adj.愚蠢的，头脑简单的，纯朴的Obviously, this girl is a little simple-minded.显然，这个小女孩有点蠢。 cathedral n.大教堂adj.有权威的We visited a magnificent cathedral.我们参观了一座宏伟的教堂。

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190411
entry.content: 复习boring adj.无聊的，令人厌烦的I am tired of watching this boring TV show.这无聊的电视节目看得我好累。 arrange v.整理，达成协议I arrange my toys so that they can fit in a box.我把玩具排列好，这样它们就能都放在一个盒子里。 pace n.步，步伐v.踱步The ducks follow their mother’s pace to cross the road.小鸭子们跟着妈妈的步伐过马路。 social adj.社会的，交际的，社交的Humans are social animals who need the support of others.人类是社会性动物，需要他人的帮助。 advocate v.提倡，为…辩护n.提倡者The man is advocating that we should save water.他正在提倡大家节约用水。 powder n.粉，火药v.抹粉Flour is a kind of white powder.面粉是一种白色的粉末。 friction n.摩擦，摩擦力The friction heats up the wood and starts a fire.摩擦力使得火柴着了起来。 joy n.欢乐，喜悦，乐事The old man is sitting on the stairs with a look of joy.这个老人面带喜悦地坐在阶梯上。 gym n.体育馆，健身房Many people are exercising at the gym.许多人正在健身房里锻炼身体。 deserve v.值得，应得，应受She deserves such a high ranking because of her popularity.以她的高人气，她应该得到这样的名次。 force v.强迫，推动n.武力v.凭借武力前进The girl forced the boy to kiss her.这个女孩强迫男孩去亲她。 dessert n.甜点Do you want to have some ice cream for dessert?你想来一些冰激凌当甜点吗？ welfare n.福利The organization aims to improve the welfare of animals.这个组织旨在提升动物福利。 tailor n.裁缝v.修改，使合适，调整使合适vt.裁制A tailor can turn the cloth into fashionable clothing.裁缝能把布料做成时髦的衣服。 contrary adj.相反的，对立的，矛盾的，叛逆的The lady and the man hold contrary views.这位女士和男士持有相反的意见。 prejudice n.偏见，损害vt.使抱偏见Some people had a prejudice against black people in the past.过去人们对黑人有偏见。 ache n.疼痛v.觉得疼痛Mark had an ache in his back.马克背部疼痛。 rectangle n.长方形，矩形The rectangle has two long and two short sides.长方形有两条长边、两条短边。 cushion n.坐垫v.减轻，缓和There are several cushions on the bed. It’s comfortable.床上有几个垫子，很舒服呢。 destination n.目的地，终点The destination of their journey is the west.他们的目的地是西天。 silence n.沉默v.使沉默It is better to maintain silence when you do not know what to say.不知道该说什么的时候最好保持沉默就好。 grand adj.壮丽的，宏伟的，重大的n.一千美元，大钢琴This grand building has always been an attraction for tourists.这座宏伟的建筑一直吸引着游客前来参观。 inspire v.激发，激励，使生灵感His speech inspired so many people to fight for equality.他的演讲激励了很多人为平等为奋斗。 swell n.（使）膨胀，（使）鼓起n.增大，膨胀，肿胀，汹涌The fish’s body swelled to protect itself.这条鱼把身体膨胀起来保护自己。 disappointed adj.失望的He has disappointed that his favorite football team lost.他很失望，因为他最喜欢的足球队输了。 grammar n.语法，语法书The English teacher is teaching grammar now.英语老师现在正在教语法。 proper adj.得体的，正确的，完全的At a cocktail party, you should wear a proper outfit.在酒会上，你应该穿得体的衣服。 poisonous
