entry.content: 歌词 I could be your sea of sand我愿成为你沙漠中的一片海I could be your warmth of desire我愿成为你渴望中的温暖I could be your prayer of hope我愿成为你希望的祷文I could be your gift to everyday我愿成为你每天的礼物I could be your tide of heaven我愿成为你天堂的潮汐I could be a hint of what’s to come我愿成为你未来的预兆I could be ordinary我很平凡I could be the one但我愿成为你的唯一I could be your blue eyed angel我愿成为你的蓝眸天使I could be the storm before the calm我愿成为平静前的风暴I could be your secret pleasure我愿成为你秘密的小确幸I could be your well wishing well我愿成为你的许愿池I could be your breath of life我愿成为你生命中的每一次呼吸I could be your European dream我愿成为你的欧洲梦I could be ordinary我很平凡I could be the one但我愿成为你的唯一Now I would lie here in the darkness此刻我隐匿于这片黑暗中Now I would lie here for all time此刻我在这儿无尽地守候着你Now I would lie here watching over you此刻我注视着你Comfort you安慰你Sing to you轻声唱歌给你听I could be your worry partner我愿成为你制造麻烦的伴侣I could be your socialite我愿也成为你的社交名流I could be your green eyed monster我愿成为只为你吃醋的嫉妒鬼I could be your force of light我愿成为你的光明力量I could be your temple garden我愿成为你的圣殿花园I could be your tender hearted child我愿成为心系于你的温柔孩子I could be ordinary我很平凡I could be the one但我愿成为你生命中的唯一Now I would lie here in the darkness此刻我隐匿于这片黑暗中Now I would lie here for all time此刻我在这儿无尽地守候着你Now I would lie here watching over you此刻我注视着你Comfort you安慰你Sing to you轻声唱歌给你听Will I ever change the journey我将影响你的人生轨迹吗Will the hushed tones disappear这温柔的声音消失了吗Oh little Ritaoh 亲爱的Let me hold you让我拥抱你Oh little Ritaoh 亲爱的Let me love you让我拥抱你I could be your leafy island我愿成为你的茂盛的岛屿I could be your thunder in the clouds我愿成为划破你的乌云的闪电I could be your dark enclosure我愿为你阻挡一切黑暗I could be your romantic soul我愿成为你的浪漫灵魂I could be your small beginning我愿成为你渺小的开始I could be your suit in universe我愿成为你在宇宙披荆斩棘的战服I could be ordinary我很平凡I could be the one但我愿成为你的唯一I could be ordinary我很平凡I could be the one但我愿成为你的唯一I could be ordinary我很平凡I could be the one但我愿成为你的唯一

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190315
entry.content: 复习statesman n.政治家Statesmen always capture the attention of media.政治家总是受到媒体的关注。 relate v.相关，有联系，讲述The family tree shows everyone I’m related to.这个家谱显示了和我有关联的所有人。 irrigation n.灌溉The farmers have a new irrigation system to water the fields.农民们有了新的灌溉系统来灌溉农田。 sauce n.酱，调味汁Wow!The tomato sauce in the bowl looks so delicious.哇！碗里的番茄酱看起来很好吃的样子。 disease n.疾病The man has a heart disease.Get him to the hospital!这个男人有心脏病，快送他去医院！ desperate adj.绝望的，孤注一掷的The unemployed man looks so desperate.那个失业的男人看上去如此的绝望。 bound adj.受约束的，有义务的v.束缚，跳跃着前行n.跳跃These ropes are bound to the ring.这些绳子和铁环绑在一起。 buffet n.自助餐，（火车内）餐室，冷餐桌v.反复敲打，打击，重击You can eat as much as you like at the buffet.吃自助餐的时候，你可以想吃多少就吃多少。 physician n.内科医生My physician told me to eat more fruits and vegetables.我的内科医生告诉我要多吃水果和蔬菜。 racial adj.种族的Racial origin has nothing to do with making friends.种族背景毫不影响结交朋友。 deposit v.存款，存放n.存款，定金I deposit money in my piggy bank when I can.当我有钱我会往我的存钱罐里存钱。 sail v.航行n.帆，航行The big boat sails off into the sunset.这艘大船朝着落日航行。 pronounce v.发音，发表，宣布Open your mouth wide when you pronounce this sound.发这个音时，嘴巴要张大。 theatre n.戏院，剧院Let’s go to the theatre and watch a play!我们去剧院看戏吧！ chest n.胸膛We can see his strong chest under his shirt.我们可以看到他衬衫下强壮的胸膛。 training n.训练，培养You shoulc be prepared before training.训练前你得准备好。 sniff v.嗅，吸气n.嗅，吸气（声）You might see dogs at the airport sniffing for illegal drugs.你可能会在机场看见狗在嗅毒品的味道。 accelerate v.加速，增长，使增速，促进The car accelerated from 60km/h to 100km/h.汽车从60km/h加速到了100km/h。 quantity n.数量，数目I eat a large quantity of food every day.我每天都吃大量食物。 punctuation n.标点，全部标点符号The meaning of a sentence often depends on its punctuation.一句话的意思经常取决于标点符号。 various adj.各种各样的We saw various types of fish during our dive.在潜水时，我们看到了各种各样的鱼。 pile n.一堆v.堆积，累积What a tall pile of books!多么高的一摞书！ museum n.博物馆，展览馆There are many pieces of art in the museum.博物馆里有很多艺术作品。 Greece n.希腊Greece is a beautiful country with a long history.希腊是个有着悠久历史的美丽国度。 awkward adj.尴尬的，不方便的He felt a bit awkward when receiving a bunch of crops.收到一束大麦，他有点尴尬。 probable adj.可能的，大概的n.很有希望被选中的人It’s probable for a lucky man to win in gambling.在赌博中运气好的人是有可能赢的。 petrol n.（英）汽油“please fill my car up with petrol!”the driver said.司机说：”麻烦加满油！” glory n.光荣，荣誉Winning the first prize brings him much glory.得了第一名他感到非常光荣。 sculpture n.雕刻，雕塑The lion sculpture is made of stone.狮子雕塑是用石头刻的。 relay n.接力赛跑v.转播In a 400-meter relay,a runner passes the baton to the next person.在400米接力比赛中，运动员将接力棒传给下一个人。 cage n.笼，鸟笼v.关进（笼子）Get me out of this cage!Where’s the key?!把我从这笼子里面放出去！钥匙在哪儿？！ garlic n.大蒜Garlic makes any meal taste better.大蒜让所有菜肴更好吃了。 sentence n.句子v.判决，宣判Note the importance of this sentence.注意这个句子的重要性。 pilot n.飞行员adj.实验性的v.给…领航，驾驶Wow!The pilots in the movie look so cool!哇塞！这部电影里的飞行员啊好酷好帅啊！ mustard n.芥末adj.芥末色的I like to add some mustard on my sushi.我喜欢往寿司上加点芥末。 agriculture n.农业We depend on agriculture to give us food.我们依靠农业给我们提供食物。 新的学习hydrogen n.氢，氢气The girl’s hydrogen balloon just flew away.Quick,catch it!女孩的氢气球飞走了。快，抓住它！ tin n.罐头These tins contain different colors of paint.这些罐子里装着不同颜色的颜料。 encourage v.鼓励，支持I encourage my girlfriend to do exercise.我鼓励女友做运动。 contribute v.捐献，捐助Many people contribute money to help people in need.很多人捐钱来帮助有需要的人们。 festival n.节日，欢宴，庆祝Traditionally people spend time with their families during the Chinese Spring Festival.人们历来在春节期间与家人共享时光。 expense n.花费，费用Buying a car can be a great expense.买车是笔大费用。 unconditional adj.绝对的，无条件的Mothers have unconditional love for their children.妈妈对孩子的爱是无条件的。 physicist n.物理学者，物理学家Einstein was a great physicist.爱因斯坦是个伟大的物理学家。 nature n.大自然We all like to enjoy the beauty of nature.我们都喜欢享受自然之美。 brick n.砖块，砖Builders are using bricks to build the wall.建筑工人在用砖块砌墙。 confidential adj.机密的，表示信任的These confidential documents are top secret.这些秘密文件是绝对机密的。 silly adj.傻的，愚蠢的n.（通常指小孩子）淘气鬼，傻孩子He looks so silly with his head in his clothes.他把头缩进衣服里，看起来很傻。 bathtub n.浴盆，浴缸I left my red towel hanging on the edge of the bathtub.我把一条红毛巾忘在浴缸沿上了。 obey v.服从，听从，遵从He always obeys his wife without question.他对他夫人唯命是从。 workmate n.同事，工友I enjoy working with my beautiful workmates.我喜欢与我漂亮的同事们一起工作。 defeat v.打败n.击败，战胜Black defeated White.黑棋战胜了白旗。 leftover n.剩菜，残余物adj.残余的The leftovers were a feast for the hungry dog.对于饥肠辘辘的狗来说剩菜都是宴席。 Oceania n.大洋洲I would love to travel to one of the islands in Oceania.我想去大洋洲的某个小岛旅行。 ground n.地面，土壤，场地，原因The color of the ground is green from grass.地面的颜色是草绿色。 bake v.烤，烘培I learnt how to bake pizza from my mum.我从妈妈那里学到了如何烤披萨。 acquire v.获得The little boy acquired knowledge of the universe from reading.小男孩通过阅读学到了很多关于宇宙的知识。 approximately adv.近似地，大约Pi is approximately equal to 3.1416.圆周率大约等于3.1416. sew v.缝，缝纫vt.缝补She uses the machine to sew a new dress.她用机器缝制新裙子。 mushroom n.蘑菇vi.迅速发展“Give me back my hat” said the mushroom sadly.“把帽子还给我！”蘑菇难过地说道。 concern n.关心，担忧v.感兴趣，涉及，关心，（使）担忧She shows her concern by helping the old lady walk.通过帮助那位老太太走路，她表现出来她的关心。 fundamental adj.基本的，根本的，重要的n.基本原理In modern society,Wi-Fi is the most fundamental need.现代社会中，无线网络成了人们最基本的需求。 subjective adj.主观（上）的，个人的The taste in art is a highly subjective matter.品味艺术是一件主观性很强的事。 jewel n.宝石，宝石饰物This necklace is made of beautiful jewels.这个项链是由漂亮的宝石做的。 present n.礼物，赠送物v.赠送，呈现adj.出席的，当前的A present for me? Thank you! You’re so sweet.给我的礼物？谢谢，你真好！ chopsticks n.筷子These are four pairs of chopsticks on the bamboo mat.竹垫上有四双筷子。 Buddhism n.佛教The man sitting there believes in Buddhism.坐在那里的人信奉佛教。 carpet n.地毯My dream is to have a flying carpet.我的梦想是拥有一张飞毯。

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190314
entry.content: 复习willingness n.自愿He had a great willingness to help people in need.他非常乐意帮助别人，总是雪中送炭。 accessible adj.可进入的，可使用的The building is only accessible if you have a card.有卡才能进入这栋大楼。 temporary adj.暂时的，临时的She looks happy with her new temporary tattoo.她对这个临时的新纹身很满意。 outstanding adj.杰出的，突出的，显著的His outstanding ability allowed him to win the contest.他杰出的能力使他赢得了竞赛。 absorb vt.吸取，汲取Sponges can absorb a lot of water.海绵可以吸收很多水。 tentative adj.试探性的，犹豫不决的When walking in darkness,every step you take is tentative.在黑暗中行走，你走的每一步都是试探性的。 lid n.盖，盖子The waiter is taking the lid off the plate.服务员正把盘子上的盖子揭开。 quarrel n.争吵，口角v.争吵，争论I had a terrible quarrel with my wife.我跟我的妻子大吵了一架。 resist v.抵抗，抵制The overweight girl managed to resist the temptation of hamburgers.这个胖女孩抵制住了汉堡的诱惑。 evident adj.显然的，明显的，明白的It is evident who the real murderer is.真正的凶手是谁很明显。 biscuit n.饼干，软饼I love to eat biscuit when I drink coffee.我喝咖啡时喜欢吃点饼干。 embassy n.大使馆，大使馆全体人员The US embassy in the U.K. is located in London.美国驻英大使馆位于伦敦。 beneath prep.在…下方adv.在下方Most of the iceberg is beneath the surface.冰上的大部分在海面之下。 policician n.政治家，政客The female politician is giving an election speech.女政治家正为竞选做演讲。 variety n.品种，种类，变化，多样性，多样化There is a wide variety of fruits on the table.桌子上有各种各样的水果。 drum n.鼓，圆桶v.击鼓The little guy played that song on the drums.这个小家伙用鼓演奏出那首曲子。 vehicle n.交通工具，机动车The vehicle drives off while carrying a container.那辆车载着一个集装箱开走了。 excellent adj.优秀的，极好的He’s an excellent student who always gets excellent scores.他是个优秀的学生，总是得高分。 curriculum n.课程，（学校或专业的）全部课程The curriculum includes math,science and English.这些课程包含数学、科学和英语。 evidence n.证据，证明v.证明They are gathering evidence to solve the case.为了侦破案件，他们正在收集证据。 recipe n.食谱She follows the recipe to cook.她照着食谱来做饭。 tap n.塞子，水龙头v.监听，窃听（电话）Water flows from the tap.水从水龙头流出来。 extreme adj.极端的n.极端The roller coaster is an extreme test of courage.过山车是对勇气的极端考研。 yummy adj.美味的，好吃的That pizza looks so yummy,give me a slice!这个披萨看起来太美味了，给我一片吧！ headache n.头痛，头痛的事Her headache looks so painful!她看起来头疼得很厉害。 disability n.残疾，残疾状态His disability didn’t stop him from running.残疾并没有阻挡他奔跑的脚步。 silk n.丝，丝绸Silk is a kind of smooth and soft material.丝绸是一种光滑柔软的材料。 rectangle n.长方形，矩形The rectangle has two long and two short sides.长方形有两条长边、两条短边。 cushion n.坐垫v.减轻，缓和There are several cushions on the bed.It’s comfortable.床上有几个垫子，很舒服呢。 destination n.目的地，终点The destination of their journey is the west.他们的目的地是西天。 silence n.沉默v.使沉默It is better to maintain silence when you do not know what to say.不知道该说什么的时候保持沉默就好。 grand adj.壮丽的，宏伟的，重大的n.一千美元，大钢琴This grand building has always been an attraction for tourists.这座宏伟的建筑一直吸引着游客前来参观。 inspire v.激发，激励，使生灵感His speech inspired so many people to fight for equality.他的演讲激励了很多人为平等为奋斗。 swell v.（使）膨胀，（使）鼓起n.增大，膨胀，肿胀，汹涌The fish’s body swelled to protect itself.这条鱼把身体膨胀起来保护自己。 disappointed adj.失望的He was disappointed that his favorite football team lost.他很失望，因为他最喜欢的足球队输了。 grammar n.语法，语法书The English teacher is teaching grammar now.英语老师现在正在教语法。 proper adj.得体的，正确的，完全的At a cocktail party,you should wear a proper outfit.在酒会上，你应该穿的得体的衣服。 poisonous adj.有毒的One bite from a poisonous snake could kill you.被毒蛇咬一口就能要你的命。 fur n.毛皮，毛皮外套，人造毛A fur coat is very warm,but very expensive!皮毛外套很温暖，但也很昂贵。 jet n.喷气式飞机v.乘坐喷气式飞机Nowadays most long-distance travel is by jet plane.现在，大多数长途旅行都使用喷气式飞机。 baterium n.细菌This kind of bacterium can cause a very dangerous disease.这种细菌能引发非常危险的疾病。 religious adj.虔诚的He is a religious believer,he goes to church every week.他是个虔诚的教徒，每周都会去教堂。 seminar n.研讨会A teacher and some students are attending a math seminar.一名老师和学生们在宅开数学研讨会。 salute v.向…行举手礼，赞扬，赞颂n.致敬，欢迎The policeman salutes me as I walk by.当我走过时，这位警察向我行礼。 material n.材料，原料，资料adj.物质的，实体的Many different materials are needed for construction work.建筑工程需要很多种不同的建筑材料。 vacation n.休假，假期v.休假，度假The girl took a vacation on the beach.这个女孩在海边度假。 新的学习statesman n.政治家Statesmen always capture the attention of media.政治家总是受到媒体的关注。 relate v.相关，有联系，讲述The family tree shows everyone I’m related to.这个家谱显示了和我有关联的所有人。 irrigation n.灌溉The farmers have a new irrigation system to water the fields.农民们有了新的灌溉系统来浇灌农田。 sauce n.酱，调味汁Wow!The tomato sauce in the bowl looks so delicious.哇！碗里的番茄酱看起来很好吃的样子。 disease n.疾病The man has a heart disease.Get him to the hospital!这个男人有心脏病，快送他去医院！ desperate adj.绝望的，孤注一掷的The unemployed man looks so desperate.那个失业的男人看上去如此绝望。 bound adj.受约束的，有义务的v.束缚，跳跃着前行n.跳跃These ropes are bound to the ring.这些绳子和铁环绑在了一起。 buffet n.自助餐，（火车内）餐室，冷餐桌v.反复敲打，打击，重击You can eat as much as you like at the buffet.吃自助餐的时候，你可以想吃多少就吃多少。 reflect v.倒映，反省The mountains are relfected in the water.远处的群山倒映在水里。 physician n.内科医生My physician told me to eat more fruits and vegetables.我的内科医生告诉我要多吃水果和蔬菜。 racial adj.种族的Racial origin has nothing to do with making friends.种族背景毫不影响结交朋友。 deposit v.存款，存放n.存款，定金I deposit money in my piggy bank when I can.当我有钱我会往我的存钱罐里存钱。 strawberry n.草莓I want to buy one box of strawberries.我想买一盒草莓。 sail v.航行n.帆，航行The big boat sails off into the sunset.这艘大船朝着落日航行。 pronounce v.发言，发表，宣布Open your mouth wide when you pronounce this sound.发这个音时，嘴巴要长大。 theatre n.戏院，剧院Let’s go to the theatre and watch a play!我们去剧院看戏吧！ navy n.海军I joined the navy to be at sea.我加入海军是为了出海。 chest n.胸膛We can see his strong chest under his shirt.我们可以看到他衬衫下强壮的胸膛。 Lrish adj.爱尔兰的，爱尔兰人的，爱尔兰语的The Lrish people are known for their beer and dancing.爱尔兰人以他们的啤酒和舞蹈而出名。 training n.训练，培养You should be prepared before training.训练前你得准备好。 sunburnt adj.晒黑的，晒伤的She was sunburnt after doing some sunbathing.日光浴后她晒伤了。 sniff v.嗅，吸气n.嗅，吸气（声）You might see dogs at the aiirport sniffing for illegal drugs.你可能会在机场看见狗在嗅毒品的味道。 accelerate v.加速，增长，使增速，促进The car accelerated from 60km/h to 100km/h.汽车从60km/h加速到100km/h. directory n.人名地址录，（电话）号码簿，目录He looked through the directory to find her number.他翻阅电话号码簿，找寻她的号码。 quantity n.数量，数目I eat a large quantity of food every day.我每天都吃大量的食物。 punctuation n.标点，全部标点符号The meaning of a sentence often depends on its punctuation.一句话的意思经常取决于标点符号。 pancake n.烙饼，薄饼In the west,they like to eat pancakes for breakfast.在西方，人们早餐喜欢吃薄烤饼。 pile n.一堆v.堆积，累积What a tall pile of books.多么高的一摞书！ due adj.到期的，预期的，适当的n.应有的权利，应得到的东西adv.直接地，确切地The holiday is due on tomorrow so the student is busy.放假截止到明天，因此这位学生很忙碌。 museum n.博物馆，展览馆There are many pieces of art in the museum.博物馆里有很多艺术作品。 backwards adv.向后，退步，每况愈下When we both bend backwards,we almost make a complete circle当我们都向后仰的时候，我们几乎组成了一个完整的圆。 Greece n.希腊Greece is a beautiful country with a long history.希腊是个有着悠久历史的美丽国度。 rail n.铁轨v.咒骂Trains run on steel rails.火车行驶在钢轨上。 awkward adj.尴尬的，不方便的He felt a bit awkward when receiving a bunch of crops.收到一束大卖，他有点尴尬。 probable adj.可能的，大概的n.很有希望被选中的人It’s probable for a lucky man to win in gambling.在赌博中运气好的人是有可能赢的。 petrol n.（英）汽油“Please fill my car up with petrol!”the driver said.司机说：”麻烦加满油！” hillside n.山坡The couple sat on the hillside to have a picnic.这对夫妻坐在上坡上享用野餐。 complex adj.复杂的，难解的n.建筑群，情结Modern road system can be very complex.现代道路系统十分复杂。 glory n.光荣，荣誉Winning the first prize brings him much glory.得了第一名他感到非常光荣。 sculpture n.雕刻，雕塑The lion sculpture is made of stone.狮子雕像是用石头刻的。

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190313
entry.content: 复习slavery n.奴隶制，奴隶身份Lincoln announced the slavery should be abolished.林肯宣布奴隶制应该被废除。 celebrate v.庆祝，赞美We are celebrating the coming New Year!我们正为新年的到来而庆祝！ rough adj.粗糙的The hands of the farmer are rough.这个农民的手很粗糙。 fancy adj.华丽装饰的，别致的，引人注目的n.喜爱，幻想，想象力vt.想象，幻想This fancy gold tableware must have been so expensive!这套华丽的金色餐具肯定很贵！ immediate adj.立即的，立刻的This letter demands my immediate response.这封信需要我立即回复。 walnut n.核桃，胡桃Look,this walnut has a heart-shaped core.看，这个核桃仁是心形的。 organize v.整理，组织Please organize the cards by number.请按编号整理好卡片。 warehouse n.仓库The warehouse is full of boxes.仓库里堆满了货箱。 litter n.垃圾v.乱丢Lots of litter was left on the beach by tourists.沙滩上有很多游客留下的垃圾。 liberate v.解放，释放She felt her heart liberated together with the birds.她感到自己的心随着鸟儿一起被解放了。 possess v.拥有，占有，缠住，迷住Take the key and now you possess a house.把钥匙拿去。现在你已经拥有一套房子了。 national adj.国家的，民族的n.国民Baseball is the national game of the U.S.棒球是美国的国民运动。 humorous adj.幽默的，搞笑的，诙谐的This guy was so humorous and made everyone laugh.这个家伙很幽默，把大家都逗笑了。 instant adj.即食的n.瞬间Making a cup of instant coffee is a simple process.制作一杯速溶咖啡的过程很简单。 hatch v.孵出，孵n.船舱盖Look,the eggs are hatching!看啊，小鸡出壳了！ thunder n.雷，雷声，轰隆声v.大声抱怨，吼叫Thunder and lightning scare me so much!打雷和闪电吓坏我了！ convenience n.方便Sometimes I eat pre-cooked meals for convenience.有时为了方便，我会吃事先做好的饭菜。 anchor n.锚，担任（广播电视新闻节目）的支持人The ship dropped the anchor and hit the shark on head.船抛出锚，打到了一只鲨鱼。 wedding n.婚礼，婚宴The couple kissed each other at their wedding.新婚夫妻在婚礼上亲吻对方。 dilemma n.进退两难的窘境I am in a dilemma.Both ways are so dangerous!我处在进退两难的困境里，两条路都好危险啊！ institution n.机构The United Nations is an international institution.联合国是一家国际机构。 violence n.暴力The two boys used wiolence to end the quarrel.这两个男孩动用武力结束了争吵。 offshore adj.近海的，海岸的adv.离岸的，近海的Offshore oil extraction is the best way to get oil.近海原油开采是得到石油的最好方式。 Atlantic adj.大西洋的n.大西洋The northern part of Atlantic Ocean lies between Europe and North America.北大西洋位于欧洲和北美洲之间。 refreshments n.点心，茶点Help yourself to the refreshments on the table.请自取桌上的茶点。 unconscious adj.不省人事的，未察觉的We found him unconscious on the floor.我们发现他倒在地上，不省人事。 devote vt.奉献The woman devotes her entire life to her religion.这个女人把一辈子都奉献给了宗教信仰。 donate v.捐赠We donated a sum of money to the charity.我们向慈善机构捐了一笔钱。 comrade n.战友My comrade and I are good friends.我和我的战友是好朋友。 gradually adv.逐步地The full moon gradually changes to a new moon.圆月会逐渐变成新月。 expect v.期待She’s expecting her baby to be born soon.她期待着宝宝的到来。 sheet n.纸张，被单Please write your name on this sheet of paper.请在这张纸上写下你的名字。 alphabet n.字母表The English alphabet has 26 letters.英语字母表有26个字母。 guarantee v.保证，担保n.保证金I guarantee that you will have our best service.我保证你会得到我们最优质的服务。 indeed adv.的确，真正地，事实上My coworkers told me that I did a good job indeed.我的同事告诉我真的干的不错！ due to prep.由于，取决于She cannot hear things clearly due to her old age.由于年岁过高，她的耳朵听不清。 rapid adj.迅速的，急促的The rabbit ran at a rapid speed.那只兔子飞快的跑了。 cure v.治愈，治疗These pills will cure your sickness.这些药片能治好你的病。 humor n.幽默，诙谐The show is full of humor,hahaha!这个界面太幽默了，哈哈哈！ ridiculous adj.可笑的，荒谬的She looks ridiculous wearing this dress when walking in the street.她穿着这件衣服上街，看上去太可笑了。 fluency n.流利，流畅He speaks with perfect fluency.他说话极其流畅。 yawn v.打哈欠n.乏味或枯燥的事物v.打着哈欠说The cat yawned lying on the grass.So cute!猫咪躺在草地上打哈欠。太可爱了！ boyfott n.抵制vt.抵制The office workers are putting up a boycott.员工们在举行抗议活动。 hug v.拥抱，紧抱n.拥抱The happy couple hug in front of their new home.这对开心的夫妇相拥在他们的新房子前。 pardon v.原谅，宽恕excl.请再说一遍n.原谅，饶恕，赦免The king pardoned the prisoner.君主赦免了那名囚犯。 新的学习willingness n.自愿He had a great willingness to help people in need.他非常乐意帮助别人，总是雪中送炭。 island adj.内陆的，国内的adv.在内陆地Switzerland is an inland country.瑞士是一个内陆国家。 accessible adj.可进入的，可使用的The building is only accessible if you have a card.有卡才能进入这栋大楼。 temporary adj.暂时的，临时的She looks happy with her new temporary tattoo.她对这个临时的新纹身很满意。 outstanding adj.杰出的，突出的，显著的His outstanding ability allowed him to win the contest.他杰出的能力使他赢得了竞赛。 absorb vt.吸收，汲取Sponges can absorb a lot of water.海绵可以吸取很多水。 tentative adj.试探性的，犹豫不决的When walking in darkness,every step you take is tentative.在黑暗中行走时，你走的每一步都是试探性的。 thunderstorm n.雷暴雨，大雷雨The loud thunderstorm kept me awake all night.雷暴雨的巨响让我整晚没睡。 lid n.盖，盖子The waiter is taking the lid off the plate.服务员正把盘子上的盖子揭开。 quarrel n.争吵，口角v.争吵，争论I had a terrible quarrel with my wife.我跟我的妻子大吵了一架。 resist v.抵抗，抵制The overweight girl managed to resist the temptation of hamburgers.这个胖女孩抵制住了汉堡的诱惑。 suitcase n.小提箱，手提箱My suitcase looks too old.我的手提箱看上去太旧了。 foolish adj.愚蠢的，傻乎乎的His expression is really foolish.他的表情看起来很傻。 Tibet n.西藏Let’s go to Tibet for vacation.我们去西藏度假吧。 evident adj.显然的，明显的，明白的It is evident who the real murderer is.真正的凶手是谁很明显。 biscuit n.饼干，软饼I love to eat biscuits when I drink coffee.我喝咖啡时喜欢吃点饼干。 plug n.插头vi.插入（插头）vt.塞He wants to pull out the plug.他想把插头拔出来。 beach n.海滩，河滩We spent a wonderful day at the beach.我们在海滩边度过了美妙的一天。 embassy n.大使馆，大使馆全体人员The US embassy in the U.K. is located in London.美国驻英大使馆位于伦敦。 nose n.鼻子，前部，嗅觉The girl has such a cute little nose.小女孩有一个如此可爱的小鼻子。 beneath prep.在…下方adv.在下方Most of the iceberg is beneath the surface.冰上的大部分在海面之下。 politician n.政治家，政客The female politician is giving an election speech.女政治家正为精选做演讲。 variety n.品种，种类，变化，多样性，多样化There is a wide variety of fruits on the table.桌子上有各种各样的水果。 drum n.鼓，圆桶v.击鼓The little guy played that song on the drums.这个小家伙用鼓演奏出那首曲子。 excellent adj.优秀的，极好的He’s an excellent student who always gets excellent scores.他是个优秀的学生，总是得高分。 mop n.拖把（俗称地拖）v.用拖把拖洗，擦，抹Use this mop to clean the floor.用这个拖把来清洁地板。 curriculum n.课程，（学校或专业的）全部课程The curriculum includes math,science and English.这些课程包含数学、科学和英语。 hurricane n.飓风Run!The hurricane is coming!快跑！飓风来了！ evidence n.证据，证明v.证明They are gathering evidence to solve the case.为了侦破案件，他们正在收集证据。 recipe n.食谱She follows the recipe to cook.她照着食谱来做饭。 tap n.塞子，水龙头v.监听，窃听（电话）Water flows from the tap.水从水龙头流出来。 extreme adj.极端的n.极端The roller coaster is an extreme test of courage.过山车是对勇气的极端考验。 yummy adj.美味的，好吃的That pizza looks so yummy,give me a slice!这个披萨看起来太美味了，给我一片吧！ headache n.头痛，头痛的事Her headache looks so painful!她看起来头疼的很厉害。 disability n.残疾，残疾状态His disability didn’t stop him from running.残疾并没有阻止他奔跑的脚步。 silk n.丝，丝绸Silk is a kind of smooth and soft material.丝绸是一种光滑柔软的材料。 seal n.火漆印There is a red seal on the envelope.信封上有一个红色的印章。 possession n.财产，所有物，拥有My house is my most expensive possession.我的房子是我最贵重的财产。 poem n.诗，韵文，诗体文This poem is written by Li Bai.这首诗是李白写的。 relief n.解脱Ahh,it’s such a relief to finally finish my work.啊，完成工作真是放松啊。 rectangle n.长方形，矩形The rectangle has two long and two short sides.长方形有两条长边、两条短边。 cushion n.坐垫v.减轻，缓和There are several cushions on the bed.It’s comfortable.床上有几个垫子，很舒服呢。 destination n.目的地，终点The destination of their journey is the west.他们的目的地是西天。 silence n.沉默v.使沉默It is better to maintain silence when you do not know what to say.不知道该说什么的时候保持沉默就好。 grand adj.壮丽的，宏伟的，重大的n.一千美元，大钢琴This grand building has always been an attraction for tourists.这座宏伟的建筑遗址吸引着游客前来参观。 inspire v.激发，激励，使生灵感His speech inspired so many people to fight for equality.他的演讲激励了很多人为平等为奋斗。 swell v.（使）膨胀，（使）鼓起n.增大，膨胀，肿胀，汹涌The fish’s body swelled to protect itself.这条鱼把身体膨胀起来保护自己。 motor n.发动机，马达That motorcycle has a big motor.那辆摩托车有一个很大的发动机。 disappointed adj.失望的He was disappointed that his favorite football team lost.他很失望，因为他最喜欢的足球队输了。 proper adj.得体的，正确的，完全的At a cocktail party,you should wear a proper outfit.在酒会上，你应该穿得体的衣服。 poisonous adj.有毒的One bite from a poisonous snake could kill you.被毒蛇咬一口就能要你的命。

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190312
entry.content: 复习visual adj.看的，视觉的The color of this dress is just a visual trick.这条裙子颜色只是一个视觉游戏罢了。 gravity n.重力，引力An apple fell on his head because of gravity.苹果因为重力砸到了他的头上。 tear v.撕裂，撕碎n.眼泪The hands tear the wall wide open.一双手撕裂了这面墙。 glue n.胶水v.用胶粘Glue is very useful for sticking things together!要把东西粘在一起，胶水会十分有用。 aluminium n.铝This can is made of aluminium.这个罐子是铝做的。 unfortunately adv.遗憾的是，可惜的是，不幸的是My mom bought me an ice cream,but unfortunately I dropped it.我妈给我买了个冰激淋，不幸的是，我把它掉地上了。 delight n.高兴，愉快，高兴事v.使高兴“I finally got this bag!” she yelled with delight.“我终于买到这个包包了！”她高兴地尖叫着。 arithmetic n.算术，计算The boy is doing arithmetic homework.It’s easy for him.那个小男孩在写算术作业。这对他来说很容易。 period n.时期Each class period is one hour.每节课的时间是一小时。 reservation n.（住处、席位的）预订The couple had a reservation,so the table was saved for them.这对夫妇已经有预订了，所以饭桌被保留了。 resemble v.像，想像，相似My dog resembles a brown mop.我的狗像一根棕色的拖把。 betray v.背叛，（非故意地）暴露My girlfriend betrayed me.She fell in love with someone else.我的女朋友背叛了我，她跟别人好上了。 abuse v.虐待，辱骂Stop abusing her,you evil old lady!不要再虐待她了，你这个坏嬷嬷！ brake v.刹车n.刹车，制动器，闸Not again – I hate having to brake my car for cows.不要吧，又来，我讨厌为牛刹车。 purple adj.紫色的n.紫色The flower is purple.这朵花是紫色的。 supper n.晚餐They are having their last supper together.他们正在吃着最后的晚餐。 conservative adj.保守的，保守党的n.保守主义的The man has such a conservative attitude he even despises the couple holding hands.他保守得连情侣牵手都看不惯。 widespread adj.分布广的，普遍的，广泛的My love story quickly became widespread through the Internet.通过网络，我的爱情故事很快传播开了。 attraction n.吸引，魅力，吸引力There is a strong attraction between the lovers.这对恋人之间有强烈的吸引力。 immigration n.移民，移民入境Immigration to Germany has risen in recent times.如今，向德国的移民越来越多了。 popcorn n.爆米花I like eating popcorn when I watch a movie.我喜欢在看电影时吃爆米花。 spy n.间谍，密探v.当间谍，暗中监视（或侦察）The spy is passing messages to our enemy.那个间谍正在给我们的敌人传递情报。 effect n.效果，所有物v.使发生，引起I like the light effects on the stage.我喜欢舞台上的灯光效果。 afterwards adv.然后They had a romantic dinner and decided to watch a movie afterwards.他们吃了一顿浪漫的晚餐，然后决定去看电影。 violin n.小提琴She can play the violin well.她小提琴拉的很好。 attach v.贴，系，附上The card player has several pieces of paper attached to his face.这个打牌的人脸上被贴了好多纸条。 anniversary n.周年纪念日adj.周年的，（有关）周年纪念的He gave his wife a diamond ring on their tenth anniversary.在结婚十周年之际，他送了老婆一枚钻戒。 apparent adj.显然的，明白的，清晰可见的，表面上的，貌似（真实）的It’s apparent that the boy is taller than the girl.很明显，那个男孩比女孩高。 benefit n.好处，益处v.受益，有助于，使受益Jogging has a lot of benefits of people’s health.慢跑对人体健康有诸多好处。 kind adj.善良的，仁慈的，亲切的，和蔼的n.种类He’s a kind young man who always helps others.他是个善良的年轻人，总是帮助别人。 statue n.雕像There stands a huge statue in New York city.一座巨大的雕像坐落在纽约市。 adolescence n.青春期，青春He began to shave after hitting adolescence.进入青春期后，他开始刮胡子了。 grape n.葡萄，葡萄藤There are a lot of grapes in the garden.果园里有很多葡萄。 receipt n.收据，收条，收入You will get a receipt when you buy things in a store.当你在店里买东西时，会得到一个收据。 biochemistry n.生物化学Biochemistry is a difficult area of science to study.生化是科学中很难学习的领域。 unbreakable adj.牢不可破的，不易损坏的This iron door seems to be unbreakable.这扇铁门看起来牢不可破。 washroom n.盥洗室May I know where the washroom is?卫生间在哪里？ indicate vt.表明，表示，显示Can you guess what the graph indicates?你能猜到这个图表表明着什么吗？ shock v.（使）震惊，（使）震动n.震动，震惊，冲击，休克She was shocked to see how much her stock value had fallen.看到股票跌了这么多，她真是惊呆了。 cosy adj.温暖而舒适的，安逸的The cat seems so cosy sleeping in the soft blanket.小猫睡在那个柔软的毯子里面，看起来真是舒服极了。 eager adj.热切的，渴望的，急不可耐的The kids are eager to eat the cake on the table.孩子们急不可耐想要吃掉桌上的蛋糕。 federal adj.联邦制的，联邦政府的The USA is a federal republic.美国是一个联邦共和国。 entertainment n.娱乐，招待，款待We go to the movies for entertainment.我们看电影是为了娱乐。 stubborn adj.顽固的，难对付的Both of them are stubborn and don’t want to say sorry first.他俩都很顽固，不愿意第一个道歉。 organ n.器官Every organ plays an important role in our body.每一个器官在我们身体中都扮演着重要的角色。 ceremony n.典礼，仪式The student was awarded his certificate during the graduation ceremony.毕业生在毕业典礼上接受了他的毕业证书。 patience n.耐心，忍耐Fishing demands a great deal of patience.钓鱼需要极大的耐心。 merchant n.商人，批发商The merchant checks the quality of his produce.商人在检查农产品质量。 新的学习handsome adj.英俊的，帅气的，漂亮的，大方的The handsome man posed for pictures.这位英俊的男子摆好姿势准备照相。 slavery n.奴隶制，奴隶身份Lincoln announced the slavery should be abolished.林肯宣布奴隶制度应被废除。 celebrate v.庆祝，赞美We are celebrating the coming New Year!我们正为新年的到来而庆祝！ rough adj.粗燥的The hands of the marmer are rough.这个农民的手指很粗糙。 fancy adj.华丽装饰的，别致的，引人注目的n.喜爱，幻想，想像力vt.想像，幻想This fancy gold tableware must have been so expensive!这套华丽的金色餐具肯定很贵！ immediate adj.立即的，立刻的This letter demands my immediate response.这封信需要我立即回复。 walnut n.核桃，胡桃Look,this walnut has a heart-shaped core.看，这个核桃仁是心性的。 organize v.整理，组织Please organize the cards by number.请按编号整理好卡片。 skipping rope n.（跳绳用）绳My skipping rope keeps me fit!跳绳帮助我保持身材。 warehouse n.仓库The warehouse is full of boxes.仓库里堆满了货箱。 litter n.垃圾v.乱丢Lots of litter was left on the beach by tourists.沙滩上有很多游客留下的垃圾。 liberate v.解放，释放She felt her hear liberated together with the birds.她感到自己的心随着鸟儿一起被解放了。 national adj.国家的，民族的n.国民Baseball is the national game of the U.S.棒球是美国的国民运动。 humorous adj.幽默的，搞笑的，诙谐的This guy was so humorous and made everyone laugh.这个男人很幽默，把大家都逗笑了。 instant adj.即食的n.瞬间Making a cup of instant coffee is a simple process.制作一杯速溶咖啡的过程很简单。 hatch v.孵出，孵n.船舱盖Look,the eggs are hatching!看啊，小鸡出壳了！ thunder n.雷，雷声，轰隆声v.大声抱怨，吼叫Thunder and lightning scare me so much!打雷和闪电吓坏我了！ convenience n.方便Sometimes I eat pre-cooked meals for convenience.有时为了方便，我会吃事先做好的饭菜。 container n.集装箱There are a lot of containers at the port.港口有很多集装箱。 anchor n.锚，担任（广播电视新闻节目）的主持人The ship dropped the anchor and hit the shark on head.船抛出锚，打到了一只鲨鱼。 wedding n.婚礼，婚宴The couple kissed each other at their wedding.新婚夫妇在婚礼上亲吻对方。 dilemma n.进退两难的窘境I am in a dilemma.Both ways are so dangerous!我处在进退两难的困境里，两条路都好危险啊！ institution n.机构The United Nations is an international institution.联合国是一家国际机构。 violence n.暴力The two boys used violence to end the quarrel.这两个男孩动用武力结束了争吵。 offshore adj.近海的，海岸的adv.离岸地，近海地Offshore oil extraction is the best way to get oil.近海原油开采是得到石油的最好方式。 Atlantic adj.大西洋的n.大西洋The northern part of Atlantic Ocean lies between Europe and North America.北大西洋位于欧洲合和北美洲之间。 specialist n.专家，专科医生adj.专家的He is a specialist in robot.他是个机器人专家。 refreshments n.点心，茶点Help yourself to the refreshments on the table.请自取桌上的茶点。 unconscious adj.不省人事的，未察觉的We found him unconscious on the floor.我们发现他倒在地上，不省人事。 devote vt.奉献The woman devotes her entire life to her religion.这个女人把一辈子都献给了宗教信仰。 donate v.捐赠We donated a sum of money to the charity.我们向慈善机构捐了一笔钱。 comrade n.战友My comrade and I are good friends.我和我的战友是最好的朋友。 gradually adv.逐步地The full moon gradually changes to a new moon.圆月会逐渐变成新月。 expect v.期待She’s expecting her baby to be born soon.她期待着宝宝的到来。 ballpoint n.圆珠笔Ballpoint pens are cheap and easy to write with.圆珠笔便宜又好用。 sheet n.纸张，被单Please write your name on this sheet of paper.请在这张纸上写下你的名字。 alphabet n.字母表The English alphabet has 26 letters.英语字母表有26个字母。 guarantee v.保证，担保n.保证金I guarantee that you will have our best service.我保证你会得到我们最优质的服务。 indeed adv.的确，真正地，事实上My coworkers told me that I did a good job indeed.我的同事告诉我真的干的不错！ achievement n.成绩，成就，实现，完成He is known for his great achievements in the sport of tennis.他在网球运动上的成就令人瞩目。 quite adv.相当，十分My hair is quite soft and smooth.我的头发很柔顺。 transparent adj.透明的，清澈的，明净的The bear didn’t see the transparent glass,so he hit it.小熊没看见这块透明的玻璃，然后就撞上了。 due to prep.由于，取决于She cannot hear things clearly due to her old age.由于年岁过高，她的耳朵听不太清。

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190311
entry.content: 复习omelet n.煎蛋卷I cooked myself a big omelet for breakfast.我给自己做了一个大大的煎蛋卷当早餐。 journalist n.记者，新闻工作者The journalist is talking to that man.记者正在和那个让你交谈。 thus adv.因此，这样，如此She studied hard,thus she got high marks.她用功读书，因此获得高分。 amaze v.使惊奇，使惊诧This news really amazes me!这条消息真的让我感到吃惊！ mourn v.哀悼，哀伤They are mourning the death of their friend.他们在哀悼死去的朋友。 rat n.老鼠，耗子Look!The three rats are waving to us.看，这三只老鼠在跟我们挥手。 heroine n.女英雄Every mother is a great heroine!每位母亲都是伟大的英雄。 swear v.发誓，郑重地说，咒骂I swear I’m telling the truth.我发誓我讲的是实话。 significance n.重要性The necklace is of great significance to her.这条项链对她有着重要意义。 desert n.沙漠v.离开I finally found water in the desert.我终于在沙漠里找到水了。 perfume n.香水v.使充满芳香This perfume smells like flowers.这个香水闻起来像花一样。 whisper vt.低声低语地讲，瞧瞧地说v.耳语，密谈n.私语，谣传My friiend whispered a secret in my ear.我的朋友在我耳边悄悄地告诉了我一个秘密。 uniform n.制服，军服adj.相同的，一致的，统一的The nurses wear white uniforms when they work.护士门工作的时候，穿着白色的制服。 fireplace n.壁炉We need to put more wood in the fireplace.我们需要往壁炉里多加些木头。 virus n.病毒，病毒性疾病This virus is really dangerous.这种病毒很危险。 distinction n.优秀，卓越，杰出，差别，区分Receiving a medal is a sign of distinction.获得奖牌是优秀的象征。 quarter n.四分之一A quarter is one of four same parts that make it whole.四分之一是四个完整相等且凑成整体的部分。 consultant n.顾问，会诊医生，顾问医生The consultant will explain how we should run our business.顾问将会解释我们应该如何经营我们的事业。 occur vi.发生Car accidents can occur very quickly.车祸会发生在一瞬间。 trainer n.教练My personal trainer makes sure that I exercise scientifically.我的私人教练确保我科学地锻炼。 condition n.环境，形势，条件The hotel room is in poor condition.这家宾馆的条件挺差。 foresee v.预知，预料，预测He foresaw that the stock market would rise.他预测到了股市行情。 anxiety n.焦虑It is difficult to disguise her great anxiety.很难掩饰她严重的焦虑。 orbit v.环绕…的轨道运行n.环境vi.环绕…的轨道运行All of our planets orbit the sun.所有行星环绕太阳运行。 honest adj.诚实的“Wow,the emperor is naked!”,shouted an honest boy.“哇哦，这个皇帝没穿衣服！”一个诚实的小男孩大叫到。 aim v.瞄准n.目标The man aimed at the center of the mark.这个男士瞄准了靶子的中心。 botanical adj.植物（学）的I went to the botanical gardens to see the beautiful plants.我们去了植物园欣赏那些美丽的植物。 insect n.昆虫There’re many kinds of insects.昆虫有很多不同的种类。 drug n.药物，麻醉品，毒品v.下麻药This drug will lower your blood pressure.这个药会降低你的血压。 cough v.咳嗽n.咳嗽It’s polite to cover your mouth when you cough.咳嗽的时候挡着嘴是种礼貌。 sidewalk n.人行道We walked down the sidewalk and enjoyed the nice summer day.我们走在人行道上，享受着美好的夏日。 tremble v.发抖，摇动n.震颤That movie made him tremble with fear.这部电影让他害怕得发抖。 league n.社团，联盟v.使…结盟，与…联合This is a group photo of our football league.这是我们足球社团的一张合影。 founding n.成立，建立We celebrate the founding of the People’s Republic of China on every 1st October.我们在每年十月一号都会庆祝中华人民共和国的成立。 crowd n.人群，一群，朋友v.挤满There was a large crowd of people at the concert.音乐会上有很多人。 cotton n.棉花，棉线，棉布Cotton feels soft and can be used to make clothes.棉花摸起来很柔软，可以用来制作衣服。 challenge v.挑战n.挑战He likes to climb and challenge himself.他喜欢攀岩和挑战自我。 digest v.消化n.摘要The food he ate was hard to digest.他吃的食物很难消化。 necklace n.项链She likes to wear many necklaces.她喜欢戴很多项链。 lavatory n.厕所The lavatory in the middle is for the disabled.中间的厕所是我残疾人用的。 drawer n.抽屉Remember to keep all your files in the drawer.记得把你所有文件的都放在抽屉里。 forehead n.前额，前部She cares so much about her forehead.她非常在意她的前额。 botany n.植物学Botany is the study of plants.植物学是研究植物的学科。 savage n.野蛮人，粗鲁的人adj.凶猛的，猛烈的v.（狗等）乱咬Their wordy conversation made me feel like a total savage!他们文邹邹的对话让我觉得自己完全就像个野人！ actual adj.实际的，真实的The actual fact is that crocodiles walk underwater instead of swimming.事实上，鳄鱼在水下是靠走而不是游泳。 新的学习bomb n.炸弹v.投弹于，轰炸Run!The bomb will go off in three seconds!快跑！炸弹三秒钟后就会爆炸！ visual adj.看的，视觉的The color of this dress is just a visual trick.这条裙子颜色只是一个视觉游戏罢了。 gravity n.重力，引力An apple fell on his head because of gravity.苹果因为重力砸到了他的头上。 tear v.撕裂，撕碎n.眼泪The hands tear the wall wide open.一双手撕裂了这面墙。 glue n.胶水v.用胶粘Glue is very useful for sticking things together!要把东西粘一起，胶水会十分有用。 aluminium n.铝This can is made of aluminium.这个罐子是铝做的。 unfortunately adv.遗憾的是，可惜的是，不幸的是My mom bought me an ice cream,but unfortunately I dropped it.我妈给我买了个冰激淋，不幸的是，我把它掉地上了。 delight n.高兴，愉快，高兴事v.使高兴“I finally got this bag!she yelled with delight.“我终于买到这个包包了！”她高兴地尖叫着。 arithmetic n.算术，计算The boy is doing arithmetic homework.It’s easy for him.那个小男孩在写算术作业，这对他来说很容易。 period n.时期Each class period is one hour.每节课的时间是一小时。 electric adj.电的，电动的，带电的My wet hand caused me to get an electric shock.我用湿手触碰了开关，然后就触电了。 reservation n.（住处、席位的）预订The couple had a reservation,so the table was saved for them.这对夫妻已经有预订了，所以饭桌被保留了。 resemble v.像，想像，相似My dog resembles a brown mop.我的狗像一根棕色的拖把。 betray v.背叛，（非故意地）暴露My girlfriend betrayed me.She fell in love with someone else.我的女朋友背叛了我，她跟别人好上了。 abuse v.虐待，辱骂，（对麻醉毒品、兴奋剂等的）非法服用Stop abusing her,you evil old lady!!不要再虐待她了，你这个坏嬷嬷！！ brake v.刹车n.刹车，制动器，闸Not again - I hate having to brake my car for cows.不要吧，又来？我讨厌为了牛刹车！ purple adj.紫色的n.紫色The flower is purple.这朵花是紫色的。 supper n.晚餐They are having their last supper together.他们正在吃最后的晚餐。 fill in phr.填充Please fill in the form if you want to join our club.如果你想加入我们俱乐部，请先填写这张表格。 conservative adj.保守的，保守党的n.保守主义者The man has such a conservative attitude he even despises the couple holding hands.他保守得连情侣牵手都看不惯。 widespread adj.分布广的，普遍的，广泛的My love story quickly became widespread through the Internet.通过网络，我的爱情故事很快传播开了。 attraction n.吸引，魅力，吸引力There is a strong attraction between the lovers.这对恋人之间有着强烈的吸引力。 immigration n.移民，移居入境Immigration to Germany has risen in recent times.如今，向德国的移民越来越多了。 popcorn n.爆米花I like eating popcorn when I watch a movie.我喜欢在看电影时吃爆米花。 spy n.间谍，密探v.当间谍，暗中监视（或侦查）The spy is passing messages to our enemy.那个间谍正在给我们的敌人传递情报。 effect n.效果，所有物v.使发生，引起I like the light effects on the stage.我喜欢舞台上的灯光效果。 afterwards adv.然后They had a romantic dinner and decided to watch a movie afterwards.他们吃了一顿浪漫的晚餐，然后决定去看电影。 violin n.小提琴She can play the violin well.她小提琴拉的很好。 attach v.贴，系，附上The card player has several pieces of paper attached to his face.这个打牌的人脸上被贴了好多纸条啊。 anniversary n.周年纪念日adj.周年的，（有关）周年纪念的He gave his wife a diamond ring on their tenth anniversary.在结婚十周年之际，他送了老婆一枚钻戒。 apparent adj.显然的，明白的，清晰可见的，表面上的,貌似（真实）的It’s apparent that the boy is taller than the girl.很明显，那个男孩比女孩高。 benefit n.好处，益处v.受益，有助于，使受益Jogging has a lot of benefits for people’s health.慢跑对人体健康有诸多好处。 kind adj.善良的，仁慈的，亲切的，和蔼的n.种类He’s a kind young man who always helps others.他是个善良的年轻人，总是帮助别人。 statue n.雕像There stands a huge status in New York city.一座巨大的雕像坐落在纽约市。 adolescence n.青春期，青春He began to shave after hitting adolescence.进入青春期后，他开始刮胡子了。 grape n.葡萄，葡萄藤There are a lot of grapes in the garden.果园里有很多葡萄。 receipt n.收据，收条，收入You will get a receipt when you buy things in a store.当你在店里买东西时，会得到一个收据。 biochemistry n.生物化学Biochemistry is a difficult area of science to study.生化是科学中最难学习的领域。 tax free adj.免税的Many people go to Hong Kong for tax free goods.许多人去香港买免税商品。 taste v.品尝，尝起来，品鉴n.鉴赏力This ice cream bar tastes so good!这个雪糕真好吃！ unbreakable adj.牢不可破的，不易损坏的This iron door seems to be unbreakable.这扇铁门看起来牢不可破。 washroom n.盥洗室May I know where the washroom is?卫生间在哪里？ education n.教育，培养Education is important for kids.教育对孩子十分重要。 choir n.（教会的）歌唱队，唱诗班A penguin choir sings Christmas songs.一个企鹅唱诗班唱着圣诞歌。 rewind v.倒回（磁带等），倒带Rewind the song,I want to hear it again.回放这首歌，我想再听一遍。 sow v.播种n.母猪The first stage to growing crops is to first sow the seeds.培育庄稼的第一步是播种。 indicate vt.表明，表示，显示Can you guess what the graph indicates?你能猜到这个图表表明着什么吗？ shock v.（使）震惊，（使）震动n.震动，震惊，冲击，休克She was shocked to see how much her stock value had fallen.看到股票跌了这么多，她真是惊呆了！ cosy adj.温暖而舒适的，安逸的The cat seems so cosy sleeping in the soft blanket.小猫睡在那个柔软的毯子里面，看起来舒适极了。 eager adj.热切的，渴望的，急不可耐的The kids are eager to eat the cake on the table.孩子们急不可耐想要吃掉桌上的蛋糕。 federal adj.联邦制的，联邦政府的The USA is a federal republic.美国是一个联邦共和国。 entertainment n.娱乐，招待，款待We go to the movies for entertainment.我们看电影是为了娱乐。 stubborn adj.顽固的，难对付的Both of them are stubborn and don’t want to say sorry first.他俩都很顽固，不愿意第一个道歉。

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190310
entry.content: 复习comprehension n.理解力，测试These guys must have a high level of comprehension to understand this.这俩人肯定有非常好的理解力才能看懂这幅画。 exploit v.剥削，利用，开发，开拓n.辉煌功绩The greedy employer exploits his workers for his own profits.这个贪婪的老板为了自己的利益剥削工人。 grasp v.抓住，领会n.紧握I grasp the money in my right hand.我把钱紧紧地抓在右手里。 breast n.胸膛，乳房，胸脯肉She held her baby to her breast to give some milk.她把宝宝放在胸前喂母乳。 spiritual adj.精神（上）的，宗教（上）的Living a simple life,she devoted herself to the pursuit of spiritual world.她过着简朴的生活，致力于追求自己的精神世界。 assumption n.假定，设想Having a baby is just their assumption.有个宝宝只是他们的设想而已。 strait n.海峡，窘迫It may take 2 hours to swim across the strait.游过这湾海峡可能得花2小时。 situation n.形势，局面，处境，状况It’s hard to choose which way to go in this situation.这种情形下很难选择出路。 algebra n.代数I don’t know how to solve this algebra problem.我不知道怎么解这个代数题。 hobby n.业余爱好，癖好People have different hobbies,some like reading books and some like playing football.人们有不同的业余爱好，有人喜欢读书，有人喜欢踢球。 coincidence n.巧合，巧事They’re wearing the same dresss today,what a coincidence!她们今天穿了一样的衣服，真是太巧了！ liter n.升，公升This bottle can be filled with 2 liter of coke.这个瓶子可以装两升可乐。 righten v.使惊恐，使害怕My brother jumped out of the closet and frightened me.我弟弟从衣柜里跳出来，吓到我了。 ruin v.毁灭，毁坏，（使）破产n.毁灭，废墟These buildings were ruined by a powerful earthquake.一场大地震摧毁了这些建筑。 excite v.使激动，使兴奋She was excited when she received email from the interviewer.收到面试官的邮件时她很激动。 direction n.方向，方位，指令，说明The road goes in many directions.道路四通八达。 delighted adj.欣喜的，快乐的She was very delighted that she got full marks in the final exam.期末考试得了一百分，她开心得不得了！ adopt v.收养The family decided to adopt this dog at the shelter.这家人决定收养收容所的这只狗。 liberation n.解脱，解放The slave got his liberation at last.这个奴隶最终得以解放。 foggy adj.有雾的，模糊的We got lost in the foggy forest.我们在迷雾森林中迷路了。 wage n.薪水，报酬v.开展，进行（战争、运动）The worker was so happy when she got her wages.这个工人拿到工资的时候，很开心。 bandage n.绷带v.用绷带绑扎I hurt my hand,so I wrapped it in a bandage.我把手弄伤了，所以包了绷带。 distant adj.遥远的The destination is still distant,we will not get there for a while.目的地还很远，我们一时半会儿到不了。 bond n.联系，束缚物，联结物vi.团结一致Everyone has a bond with another person in this web.在这张网络中，每个人都与其他人有关系。 basin n.水池，流域，盐The basin in our bathroom was very clean.我们浴室的水池很干净。 condemn v.谴责，责备We all condemned him for his bad behavior.我们都指责他的坏行为。 superior adj.较高级的，上层的，出众的n.上级，高手The boy’s five-stripe badge shows that he is superior to the other boy.他肩上的五道杠表明他比另一个人级别高。 deed n.行为Superman did many good deeds for people.超人为人们做了很多好事。 vivid adj.（颜色）鲜艳的，强烈的（颜色，光），生动的，清晰的（记忆、描述）She is dressed in vivid colors.她穿的很鲜艳。 awful adj.糟糕的，讨厌的，可怕的，极坏的This fish smells awful.Take it away!这条鱼的气味太糟糕了，快把它拿走！ prevent v.预防，阻止The mother prevented her child from eating sweets.妈妈不让她的小孩吃糖。 instrument n.乐器，工具Which is your favorite musical instrument?你最喜欢的乐器是哪一种？ circulate v.（使）循环Use the fan to circulate the air in the room.开风扇让空气在房间里循环起来。 entrance n.入口，通道，大门口The entrance is over there.Follow the red carpet.入口在那边，顺着红毯过去吧。 roof n.屋顶，顶部The cats climbed on the roof of the house.猫咪爬上了屋顶。 telegram n.电报They used to use telegrams for messages.他们曾经用电报发送信息。 fortnight n.两星期，十四日She can keep the book for a fortnight, which means two weeks.她的借书期限是两周。 drawback n.缺点，障碍，不利条件His short arms are his biggest drawback,he’s struggling to reach the toilet paper!他的小短手是他最大的确定，他很努力地去拿厕纸。 component n.零件adj.组成的These are the components of a car.这些是一辆车的零部件。 permanent adj.永久的，持久的Her eyebrows are being made perrmanent.这位女士正在做永久纹眉。 smog n.烟雾There is too much smog in this big city.这个大城市里烟雾缭绕。 geometry n.几何学，几何形状Geometry is the study dealing with different kinds of shapes.几何学是研究各种不同图形的学科。 adequate adj.充足的，充分的，足够的，尚可的，过得去的I have prepared an adequate amount of food for 5 people.我为五个人准备了充足的食物。 delicate adj.易碎的，易坏的，脆弱的Porcelain cups are very delicate,do not drop them!瓷杯易碎，小心掉落！ beast n.野兽The beast dances with the beauty.野兽与美女共舞。 pulse n.脉搏v.（使）跳动，搏动，震动，（感情等）洋溢，充满The doctor felt the patient’s pulse.医生给病人把了脉。 新的学习omelet n.煎蛋卷I cooked myself a big omelet for breakfast.我给自己做了一个大大的煎蛋卷当早餐。 endless adj.没完没了的This road seems endless.When can we get there?这条路看起来没有尽头。我们什么时候才可以到? journalist n.记者，新闻工作者The journalist is talking to that man.记者正在和那个人交谈。 thus adv.因此，这样，如此She studied hard.thus she got high marks.她用功读书，因此获得高分。 amaze v.使惊奇，使惊诧This news really amazes me!这条消息真的让我感到很吃惊！ mourn v.哀悼，哀伤They are mourning the death of their friend.他们在哀悼死去的朋友。 rat n.老鼠，耗子Look!The three rats are waving to us.看，这三只老鼠在跟我们挥手。 heroine n.女英雄Every mother is a great heroine!每位母亲都是伟大的英雄！ swear v.发誓，郑重地说，咒骂I swear I’m telling the truth.我发誓我讲的是实话。 significance n.重要性The necklace is of great significance to her.这条项链对她有很重要意义。 desert n.沙漠v.离开I finally found water in the desert.我终于在沙漠里找到水了。 prize n.奖品，或赏adj.作为奖品的，获奖的v.珍视，宝贵The winner of the tournament will be given this prize.联赛的冠军会被授予这个奖杯。 perfume n.香水v.使充满芳香This perfume smells like flowers.这个香水闻起来像花一样。 whisper vt.低声低语地讲，悄悄地说v.耳语，密谈n.私语，谣传My friend whispered a secret in my ear.我的朋友在我耳边悄悄地告诉了我一个秘密。 uniform n.制服，军服adj.相同的，一致的，统一的The nurses wear white uniforms when they work.护士门工作的时候，穿着白色的制服。 fireplace n.壁炉We need to put more wood in the fireplace.我们需要往壁炉里多加些木头。 virus n.病毒，病毒性疾病This virus is really dangerous.这种病毒很危险。 distinction n.优秀，卓越，杰出，差别，区分Receiving a medal is a sign of distinction.获得奖牌是优秀的象征。 quarter n.四分之一A quarter is one of four same parts that make it whole.四分之一是四个完整相等且凑成整体的部分。 consultant n.顾问，会诊医师，顾问医生The consultant will explain how we should run our business.顾问将会解释我们应该如何经营我们的事业。 occur vi.发生Car accidents can occur very quickly.车祸会发生在一瞬间。 trainer n.教练My personal trainer makes sure that I exercise scientifically.我的私人教练确保我科学地锻炼。 condition n.环境，形势，条件The hotel room is in poor condition.这家宾馆的条件挺差。 foresee v.预知，预料，预测He foresaw that the stock market would rise.他预测到了股市行情。 anxiety n.焦虑It is difficult to disguise her great anxiety.很难掩饰她的严重的焦虑。 orbit v.环绕…的轨道运行n.轨道vi.环绕…的轨道运行All of our planets orbit the sun.所有行星环绕太阳运行。 honest adj.诚实的“Wow,the emperor is naked!”shouted an honest boy.“哇哦，这个皇帝没穿衣服！”一个诚实的小男孩大叫道。 aim v.瞄准n.目标The man aimed at the center of the mark.这个男人瞄准了靶子的中心。 botanical adj.植物（学）的I went to the botanical gardens to see the beautiful plants.我们去了植物园欣赏那些美丽的植物。 insect n.昆虫There’re many kinds of insects.昆虫很很多不同的种类。 drug n.药物，麻醉品，毒品v.下麻药This drug will lower your blood pressure.这个药会降低你的血压。 pineapple n.凤梨，菠萝Pineapple are my favorite fruit in the summer.菠萝是我在夏天最喜欢吃的水果。 cough v.咳嗽n.咳嗽It’s polite to cover your mouth when you cough.咳嗽的时候挡着嘴是种礼貌。 sidewalk n.人行道We walked down the sidewalk and enjoyed the nice summer day.我们走在人行道上，享受着美好的夏日。 tremble v.发抖，摇动n.震颤That movie made him tremble with fear.这部电影让他害怕的发抖。 league n.社团，联盟v.使…结盟，与…联合This is a group photo of our football league.这是我们足球社团的一张合影。 crowd n.人群，一群，朋友v.挤满There was a large crowd of people at the concert.音乐会上有很多人。 cotton n.棉花，棉线，棉布Cotton feels soft and can be used to make clothes.棉花摸起来很柔软，可以用来制作衣服。 digest v.消化n.摘要The food he ate was hard to digest.他吃的食物很难消化。 necklace n.项链She like to wear many necklaces.她喜欢戴很多项链。 lavatory n.厕所The lavatory in the middle is for the disabled.中间的厕所是给残疾人用的。 drawer n.抽屉Remember to keep all your files in the drawer.记得把你所有文件的都放在抽屉里。 forehead n.前额，前部She cares so much about her forehead.她非常在意她的前额。 heavily adv.重重地，沉重地，沉闷地，猛烈的The truck was heavily loaded with goods.这辆车转载了很重要的货物。 botany n.植物学Botany is the study of plants.植物学是研究植物的学科。

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190309
entry.content: 复习badminton n.羽毛球，羽毛球运动Playint badminton on the grass makes the little boy so happy.在草地上打羽毛球让小男孩特别开心。 bench n.长凳，条凳，长形工作台The boy is sitting on the bench with his mother.小男孩正和他的妈妈坐在长凳上。 diamond n.钻石Diamond rings are very popular among young couples.钻戒在年轻夫妻中十分流行。 bucket n.水桶，（机器上的）桶装物，大量The cute cat is hiding in a bucket.那只可爱的小猫躲在一个桶子里。 Antarctic n.南极区adj.南极的The Antarctic is a cold place - only penguins can survive there.南极是一个寒冷的地方，只有企鹅能在那里生存。 graduation n.毕业，毕业典礼Throwing hats is a tradition during graduation.抛帽子是毕业时的一项传统。 punishment n.惩罚，处罚The student was given punishment for doing something wrong.这个学生因为做错事受到了惩罚。 disgusting adj.令人厌恶的，令人无法接受的He finds the smell of the sock disgusting.袜子的味道在让他恶心。 apartment n.（美）公寓，一套房间This apartment is so bright with these windows.这套公寓窗户多，很明亮。 aparrow n.麻雀Look!The little aparrow is resting on the tree branch.快看这只小麻雀，在树枝上休息呢。 mud n.泥On no!I think our car s stuck in the mud!哦不！我想我们的吃卡泥里了！ colleague n.同事，同行I really learned a lot by discussing with my colleagues.通过和同事们讨论，我真的学到了很多。 associate v.联想，联合，联系，交往n.伙伴，同事adj.副的I associate this picture with a star.这图片让我联想到了星星。 senior adj.年长的，资格老的，地位较高的n.（大学或高中）毕业生Senior citizens should be respected.老年人应该被尊重。 parcel n.包裹The person has a lot of parcels to send on November 11th.这个人在双十一有很多包裹要送。 suspect n.嫌疑犯，可疑分子v.怀疑，猜疑，推测adj.可疑的The suspect was body-searched by a policeman.警察对嫌疑犯进行了搜身。 ladder n.梯子，阶梯The man is standing on a ladder.这个男人正站在梯子上。 weakness n.（性格、系统）弱点，虚弱Vampires’weakness is that they are afraid of sunshine.吸血鬼的弱点是害怕阳光。 forgive v.原谅，饶恕，宽恕“Please forgive me,my dear” the man said to his girlfriend.“原谅我吧，亲爱的”这个男人向他女朋友说。 decision n.决定I’ve made my decision,I find the defendant guilty!我已做出决定，我认为被告罪名成立！ rid v.使摆脱Thank god!Finally I have gotten rid of all my debts.谢天谢地！我终于摆脱了全部债务！ amateur adj.业余爱好，业余（身份）的n.业余爱好者，外行This office worker is also an amateur soccer player.这个上班族也是一名业余球员。 marble n.大理石，（游戏用的）玻璃弹子The table is made of marble.这张桌子是有大理石做的。 tortoise n.龟The tortoise is slowly crossing the field.乌龟慢慢地在地上爬。 radiation n.辐射物，放射物Don’t get closer to radiation if you are not in protective suit.没有穿防辐射服就不要靠近。 constant adj.持续不断的，不变的，始终如一的n.常数，恒量The constant noise from the construction site makes me crazy.建筑工地持续不断的噪音让我快疯啦！ carpenter n.木匠，木工The carpenter works on the house.木匠从事房屋建造工作。 abolish v.彻底废除The black slavery of America was abolished by the persident in 1865.这位总统于1865年废除了美国的奴隶制度。 glance v.看一下n.一瞥，扫视She glanced at his computer screen to see what he was watching.她扫了一眼他的电脑想知道他在看什么。 beyond prep.超过，在能力、理解力之外，除…之外adv.更远处，更多，以后I couldn’t hit him as he was beyond my reach.我大不了他，因为我更不够不着他。 pregnant adj.怀孕的The pregnant woman is drinking water.这个怀孕的女人正在喝水。 新的学习call on phr.拜访，呼吁，请求The family called on their neighbor on Christmas Day.这贱人在圣诞节拜访了他们的邻居。 dawn n.黎明v.破晓The rooster standing on the field crows at dawn.田野里的公鸡在黎明时分打鸣。 zip v.拉拉链，飕飕飞过，注入活力n.拉链，活力，飞射声I zip up my jeans pocket to keep my money safe.我拉上牛仔裤兜的拉链来确保钱的安全。 comprehension n.理解力，测试These guys must have a high level of comprehension to understand this.这两人肯定有非常好的理解力才能看懂这幅画。 exploit v.剥削，利用，开发，开拓n.辉煌功绩The greedy employer exploits his workers for his own profits.这个贪婪的老板为了自己的利益剥削工人。 grasp v.抓紧，领会n.紧握I grasp the money in my right hand.我把钱紧紧地抓在右手里。 breast n.胸膛，乳房，胸脯肉She held her baby to her breast to give some milk.她把宝宝放在胸前喂母乳。 unfair adj.不公平的，不公正的It’s unfair!Her food is much more than mine!这不公平！她的食物比我多那么多！ spiritual adj.精神（上）的，宗教（上）的Living a simple life,she devoted herself to the pursuit of spiritual world.她过着简朴的生活，致力于追求自己的精神世界。 assumption n.假定，设想Having a baby is just their assumption.有个宝宝只是他们的设想而已。 strait n.海峡，窘迫It may take 2 hours to swim across the strait.有过这湾海峡可能得花两个小时。 situation n.形势，局面，处境，状况It’s hard to choose which way to go in this situation.这种情形下很难选择出路。 algebra n.代数I don’t know how to solve this algebra porblem.我不知道怎么解决这个代数题。 hobby n.业余爱好，癖好People have different hobbies,some like reading books and some like playing football.人们有不同的业余爱好，有人喜欢读书，有人喜欢踢球。 tired adj.疲劳的She is so tired after running.她跑完步很累。 Switzerland n.瑞士There are many snowy mountains in Switzerland.It’s so cold!瑞士有很多雪山，非常冷。 port n.港，港口The city has a port where you can dock your boat.这个城市有一个能让你的船靠岸的港口。 coincidence n.巧合，巧事They’re wearing the same dress today.what a coincidence!她们今天穿了一样的衣服，真是太巧了！ liter n.升，公升This bottle can be filled with 2 liters of coke.这个瓶子可以装两升可乐。 frighten My brother jumped out of the closet and frightened me.我的弟弟从衣柜里跳出来，吓到我了。 ink n.墨水，油墨Spilled ink is hard to clean.洒出来的墨水很难清理。 ruin v.毁灭，毁掉，（使）破产n.毁灭，废墟These buildings were ruined by a powerful earthquake.一场大地震摧毁了这些建筑。 excite v.使激动，使兴奋She was excited when she received email from the interviewer.收到面试官的邮件时她很激动。 direction n.方向，方位，指令，说明The road goes in many directions.道路四通八达。 delighted adj.欣喜的，快乐的She was very delighted that she got full marks in the final exam.期末考试得了一百分，她开心得不得了。 adopt v.收养The family decided to adopt this dog at the shelter.这家人决定收养收容所这条狗。 liberation n.解脱，解放The slave got his liberation at last.这个奴隶最终得以解放。 foggy adj.有雾的，模糊的We got lost in the foggy forest.我们在迷雾森里中迷路了。 republic n.共和国，共和政体The United States is a republic.美国是一个共和国。 wage n.薪水，报酬v.开展，进行（战争、运动）The worker was so happy when she got her wages.这个工人拿到工资的时候很开心。 bandage n.绷带v.用绷带绑扎I hurt my hand,so I wrapped it in a bandage.我把手弄伤了，所以包了绷带。 distant adj.遥远的The destination is still distant,we will not get there for a while.目的地还很远，我们一时半会到不了。 bond n.联系，束缚物，联结物vi.团结一致Everyone has a bond with another person in this web.在这张网络中，每个人都与其他人有关系。 basin n.水池，流域，盆The basin in our bathroom was very clean.我们浴室的水池很干净。 condemn v.谴责，责备We all condemned him for his bad behavior.我们都指责他的坏行为。 superior adj.较高级的，上层的，出众的n.上级，高手The boy’s five-stripe badge shows that he is superior to the other boy.他肩上的五道杠表明他比另一个人级别高。 deed n.行为Superman did many good deeds for people.超人为人们做了很多好事。 vivid adj.（颜色）鲜艳的，强烈的（颜色，光），生动的，清晰的（记忆、描述）She is dressed in vivid colors.她穿的很鲜艳。 ownership n.所有权He was excited about his ownership of a new car.拥有一辆新车真让他感到兴奋。 useless adj.无用的，无价值的，无效的The black computer is useless.这台黑色电脑没用了。 existence n.存在，生活方式Do you believe in the existence of dragons?你相信龙的存在吗？ awful adj.糟糕的，讨厌的，可怕的，极坏的This fish smells awful.Take it away!这条鱼的气味太糟糕了，快把它拿走！ prevent v.预防，阻止The mother prevented her child from eating sweets.妈妈不让她的小孩吃糖。 instrument n.乐器，工具Which is your favorite musical instrument?你喜欢的乐器是哪一种？ circulate v.（使）循环Use the fan to circulate the air in the room.开风扇让空气在房间里循环起来。 entrance n.入口，通道，大门口The entrance is over there.Follow the red carpet.入口在哪边，顺着红毯过去吧。 roof n.屋顶，顶部The cats climbed on the roof of the house.猫咪爬上了屋顶。 telegram n.电报They used to use telegrams for messages.他们曾经用电报发信息。 fortnight n.两星期，十四日She can keep the book for a fortnight,which means two weeks.她借书期限是两周。 drawback n.缺点，障碍，不利条件His short arms are his biggest drawback,he’s struggling to reach the toilet paper!他的小短手是他最大的缺点，他很努力地去拿厕纸。

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190308
entry.content: 复习cage n.笼，鸟笼v.关进（笼子）Get me out of this cage!Where’s the key?!把我从这笼子里面放出去！钥匙在哪里？！ garlic n.大蒜Garlic makes any meal taste better.大蒜让所有菜肴更好吃了。 sentence n.句子v.判决，宣判Note the importance of this sentence.注意这个句子的重要性。 pilot n.飞行员adj.实验性的v.给…领航，驾驶Wow!The pilots in the movie look so cool!哇塞！这部电影里的飞行员啊好酷好帅啊！ mustard n.芥末adj.芥末色的I like to add some mustard on my sushi.我喜欢往寿司上加点芥末。 agriculture n.农业We depend on agriculture to give us food.我们依靠农业给我们提供食物。 against prep.反对，对（着），逆Only one person stood actively against him.只有一个人站在那主动反对他。 cap n.帽子The policeman wears a blue cap.这个警察戴着蓝帽子。 lib n.嘴唇，唇状物Her lips are the most beautiful part of her face.她的嘴唇是她脸上最漂亮的部分。 weed n.杂草，野草The worker is cutting the weeds.工人正在除草。 extraordinary adj.非同寻常的The teacher said my daughter has extraordinary musical talent.老师说我女儿在音乐方面天赋异禀。 barber n.理发师，理发店I asked my barber to give me a new style this time.这一次我让我的理发师给我理一个新发型。 veal n.小牛肉My favorite meat is veal.我爱吃的肉是小牛肉。 yoghurt n.酸奶Yoghurt tastes very delicious with cookies.酸奶和饼干一起吃很美味哟！ wounded adj.受伤的The wounded soldier goes to the doctor every day.这位负伤的士兵每天都去看医生。 pill n.药丸The woman took some pills when she was ill.这个女人生病了，就吃了一些药。 goal n.（进球）得分，目标，球门They finally cracked the defence and scored a goal.他们终于突破了防守，射进一球。 pure adj.纯净的，纯粹的，纯洁的The water seems so pure and clean.水看起来真纯净。 regulation n.法规，条例，规章The traffic police is introducing traffic rules and regulations to us.交警在向我们介绍交通法规。 liberty n.自由The bird flew from the cage and got liberty.这只鸟飞出了鸟笼得到了自由。 irrigate v.灌溉，冲洗This machine can irrigate the field.这台机器可以灌溉田地。 accompany v.陪伴，为…伴奏（或伴唱）I always accompany my children to their school.我总是陪着我的小孩们去学校。 typist n.（尤指专职）打字员The typist is finishing her documents.打字员正在完成她的文件。 barrier n.障碍The road was closed by a barrier.这条路被一个路障封锁了。 abroad adv.到国外，在国外The happy couple traveled abroad and took photos together.这对幸福的夫妻出国旅游，并拍了照片。 biography n.传记文学，传记He likes reading the biography of famous people.他喜欢读名人传记。 voyage n.航行，航海v.航海The ship is on a voyage now.这艘船正在航行中。 besides prep.除…之外adv.而且，还有As the winner,I received lots of money besides the cup.作为胜利者，我除了得到了奖杯外，还获得了一大笔钱。 fiber n.纤维（物质）We can see the fibers of the rope under a magnifying glass.在放大镜下，我们能看见编成这条绳子的纤维。 roller n.滚柱，滚筒，滚轴Use the roller to paint the walls.用滚筒来刷墙。 chew v.咀，咀嚼n.嚼碎，咀嚼The boy is chewing the rice.他在咀嚼米饭。 conventional adj.依照惯例的，依照传统的Although we can now pay online,some people still prefer the conventional method of cash.尽管我们现在可以线上支付了，部分人仍然喜欢传统的现金支付手段。 sweet adj.甜的，可爱的，美好的，芳香的n.糖果，甜食Most kids love sweet food such as candy.大多数小孩都喜欢吃甜食，比如说糖。 vast adj.辽阔的This vast desert looks impossible to pass.这片辽阔的沙漠看上去不可能穿越。 mass n.众多，群众v.聚集A mass of people are waiting.一大堆人在等待。 serious adj.认真的，严肃的He is always very serious while working.他工作时总是很认真。 emergency n.禁忌情况It’s an emergency.Get her to the hospital now!情况紧急，即刻送她去医院。 absolute adj.完全的，绝对的Motion is absolute,while stillness is relative.运动是绝对的，静止是相对的。 tongue n.舌头vi.吹管乐器The boy sticks out his tongue to make a face to me.男孩伸出了舌头来对我做鬼脸。 instruct v.指导，通知My mom instructs me how to play golf.我妈妈教我怎么打高尔夫。 nylon n.尼龙，尼龙长袜The strings are made of nylon.这线是尼龙做的。 strange adj.奇怪的，陌生的I met a guy wearing strange clothes on the subway.我在地铁上遇到了一个衣着奇怪的男人。 bacon n.熏猪肉，培根I like to have bacon and eggs for my breakfast.早餐我想吃培根和蛋。 outspoken adj.直言的，坦率的Her outspoken remarks always reveal facts.她直言不讳地言语总是戳中现实。 dormitory n.宿舍，学生宿舍，宿舍楼【英国英语】Look!This dormitory is so dirty!快看呀！这间宿舍好脏！ sideways adj.向侧面的adv.斜着的Please turn to the side – we want a sideways view.请往侧面转一下身，我们想要一个侧面照。 greedy adj.贪婪的，贪心的，贪吃的The greedy woman wanted more food from the pot before she’d even finished her bow!贪婪的她吃着碗里的，想着锅里的。 新的学习go by phr.（时间）流逝，走过，过去Don’t waste your time as it goes by quickly.不要浪费时间因为时光飞逝。 badminton n.羽毛球，羽毛球运动Playing badminton on the grass makes the little boy so happy.在草地上打羽毛球让小男孩特别开心。 bench n.长凳，条凳，长形工作台The boy is sitting on the bench with his mother.小男孩正在和他的妈妈坐在长凳上。 seaman n.水手，海员He looks really happy in the seaman uniform.他穿着水手服看起来很开心。 bookshelf n.书架The bookshelf was filled with all sorts of books.书架上装满了各种各样的书。 dismond n.钻石Diamond rings are very popular among young couples.钻戒在年轻夫妻中十分流行。 bucket n.水桶，（机器上的）桶装物,大量The cute cat is hiding in a bucket.那只可爱的小猫躲在一个桶子里。 Antarctic n.南极区adj.南极的The Antarcitc is a cold place - only penguins can survive there.南极是一个寒冷的地方，只有企鹅能在那里生存。 graduation n.毕业，毕业典礼Throwing hats is a tradition during graduation.抛帽子是毕业时的一项传统。 soil n.泥土，土壤v.污损He held some soil in his hand.他手里捧着一些泥土。 punishment n.惩罚，处罚The student was given punishment for doing something wrong.这个学生因为做错事受到了惩罚。 interrupt n.打扰，插嘴Do not interrupt me.I am listening to the music.不要打扰我，我在听音乐呢。 disgusting adj.令人厌恶的，令人无法接受的He finds the smell of the sock disgusting.袜子的味道实在让他恶心。 non-violent adj.非暴力的Every conflict has a non-violent solution.每个争端都有非暴力的解决方式。 apartment n.（美）公寓，一套房间This apartment is so bright with these windows.这套公寓窗户多，很明亮。 sparrow n.麻雀Look!The little sparrow is resting on the tree branch.快看这只小麻雀，在树枝上休息呢。 mud n.泥On no! I think our car is stuck in the mud!哦不！我想我们的车卡泥里了。 colleague n.同事，同行I really learned a lot by discussing with my colleagues.通过和同事讨论，我真的学到了很多。 arrow n.箭I shoot three arrows at the center.我往靶心射了三支箭。 associate v.联想，联合，联系，交往n.伙伴，同事adj.副的I associate this picture with a star.这图片让我联想到了星星。 easy-going adj.随和的My friend and I are easy-going.我和朋友都很随和。 slice v.把…切成片，大幅度削减，切开n.薄片The chef is slicing the bread.大厨正在把面包切成片。 senior adj.年长的，资格老的，地位较高的n.（大学或高中）毕业生Senior citizens should be respected.老年人应该被尊重。 parcel n.包裹The person has a lot of parcels to send on November 11th.这个人在双十一有很多包裹要送。 suspect n.嫌疑犯，可疑分子v.怀疑，猜疑，推测adj.可疑的The suspect was body-searched by a policeman.警察对嫌疑犯进行了搜身。 hand in phr.上交，递交He’s handing in his homework to the teacher.他正在把自己的作业上交给老师。 ladder n.梯子，阶梯The man is standing on a ladder.这个男人正站在梯子上。 weakness n.（性格、系统）弱点，虚弱Vampires’weakness is that they are afraid of sunshine.吸血鬼的弱点是害怕阳光。 French adj.法国的，法国人的n.法语The Eiffel tower is a French landmark.埃菲尔铁塔是法国的地标。 million The businessman embraces one million dollars in his arms.这个商人怀里抱着一百万美元。 minibus n.小型公共汽车，小型巴士Let’s take the minibus on a trip!我们坐小巴去旅游吧！ point v.指向，指出n.点，尖端They are pointing at each other.他们互相指着对方。 department store n.百货商场There’re a lot of people in the department store.百货商店里好多人呀。 forgive v.原谅，饶恕，宽恕“Please forgive me,my dear.” the man said to his girlfriend.“原谅我吧，亲爱的。”这个男人向他女朋友说。 brotherhood n.手足情谊，兄弟关系The brotherhood between the boys will keep them close forever.这些男孩之间的兄弟情谊让他们永远彼此亲近。 statistics n.统计数字，数据I use facts and statistics to prove my point.我用事实和统计数字来证明我的观点。 decision n.决定I’ve made my decision,I find the defendant guilty!我已做出决定，我认为被告罪名成立！ typhoon n.台风，强热带风暴The typhoon destroyed many houses last year.台风去年毁坏了许多房屋。 rid v.摆脱Thank god!Finally I have gotten rid of all my debts.谢天谢地！我终于摆脱了全部债务！ topic n.话题，题目，主题He wrote down a topic for us to discuss.他写下一个主题以供讨论。 zebra n.斑马The zebras are running across the river.这群斑马正在横渡河流。 amateur adj.业余爱好的，业余（身份）的n.业余爱好者，外行This office worker is also an amateur soccer player.这个上班族也是一名业余球员。 marble n.大理石，（游戏用的）玻璃弹子The table is made of marble.这张桌子是由大理石做的。 tortoise n.龟The tortoise is slowly crossing the field.乌龟慢慢地在地上爬。 radiation n.辐射物，放射物Don’t get closer to radiation if you are not in protective suit.没有穿防辐射服就不要靠近。 anyhow adv.不用用何种方法，无论如何Someone has to wash the dishes anyhow,so I’ll do them.反正得有人洗碗，那就我洗吧。 constant adj.持续不断的，不变的，始终如一的n.常数，恒量The constant noise from the construction site makes me crazy.建筑工地持续不断的噪音让我快疯了。 carpenter n.木匠，木工The carpenter works on the house.木匠从事房屋建造工作。 abolish v.彻底废除The black slavery of Ameria was abolished by the president in 1865.这位总统位于1865年废除了美国的奴隶制度。 glance v.看一下n.一瞥，扫视She glanced at his computer screen to see what he was watching.她扫了一眼他的电脑想知道他在看什么。

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190307
entry.content: 复习savage n.野蛮人，粗鲁的人adj.凶猛的，猛烈的v.（狗等）乱咬Their wordy conversation made me feel like a total savage!他们文邹邹的对话让我感觉得自己完全就像个野蛮人！ glad adj.高兴的I am very glad to hear from my mother.我很高兴收到母亲的来信。 represent v.代表，阐明This hand gesture represents love.这个手势代表了爱。 modest adj.谦虚的，谦逊的These two businessmen may be rich,but they’re still very modest!这两位企业家也许非常富有，但他们仍然很谦虚。 conductor n.指挥，售票员The conductor is the leader of the band.指挥是乐队的老大。 rescue v.营救，援救n.营救，救援The fireman rescued the little boy from the fire.消防员把小男孩从火中救了出来。 fee n.费用，酬金He was shocked by the huge amount of hidden fees behind such a haircut.他被这个发型背后的巨额隐性费用惊呆了。 autonomous adj.自动驾驶的，自治的，独立自主的The man is relaxing,reading a book in his automomous car.这个男人正在他的自动驾驶汽车中悠闲的读书。 accomplish v.完成，做到，实现I have accomplished my tasks on schedule.我已经完成了计划上的任务。 neighbourhood n.社区I live in a friendly neighbourhood where everyone knows each other.我住在一个友好的社区里，那里每个人都相互认识。 organ n.器官Every organ plays an important role in our body.每一个器官在我们身体中都扮演着重要的角色。 ceremony n.典礼，仪式The student was awarded his certificate during the graduation ceremony.毕业生在毕业典礼上接受了他的毕业证书。 inventor n.发明家Thanks to the inventor of the telephone,we can talk anytime anywhere.对亏了电话的发明者，我们才能随时随地地聊天。 draft n.草稿v.起草This is just the draft design of a building.这只是建筑的草图设计。 patience n.耐心，忍耐Fishing demands a great deal of patience.钓鱼需要极大的耐心。 candidate n.（官职、获奖资格等的）候选人The candidates ar presenting the speeches for the election.候选人正在为选举发表演说。 disturb v.打扰，妨碍，使烦恼His snoring really disturbs me at night!晚上，他的呼噜声真的很打扰我！ merchant n.商人，批发商The merchant checks the quality of his produce.商人在检查农产品质量。 construct v.建造，构筑The workers are constructing a tall building.工人们正在建造一座高楼。 dismiss v.开除，解散，摒除，不再考虑The boss was angry and dismiss the staff.老板很生气，并且开除了那个职员。 rapid adj.迅速的，急促的The rabbit ran at a rapid speed.那只兔子飞快的跑了。 humor n.幽默，诙谐The show is full of humor,hahaha!这个节目太幽默了，哈哈哈！ ridiculous adj.可笑的，荒谬的She looks ridiculous wearing this dress when walking in the street.她穿着这件衣服上街，看上去太可笑了。 rare adj.稀有的，难得的，罕见的Pandas are hard to find because they’re so rare.熊猫很难被找到，因为它们太稀有了。 fluency n.流畅，流利He speaks with perfect fluency.他说话极其流利。 yawn v.打哈欠n.乏味或枯燥的事物v.打着哈欠说The cat yawned lying on the grass.So cute!猫咪躺在草地上打哈欠。太可爱了！ boycott n.抵制vt.抵制The office workers are putting up a boycott.员工们在举行抗议活动。 certificate n.合格证书，文凭，证明，证明书I got my graduation certificate after finishing colege.在完成大学教育后，我获得了毕业证书。 hug v.拥抱，紧抱n.拥抱The happy couple hug in front of their new home.这对开心的夫妇相拥在他们的新房子前。 pardon v.原谅，宽恕excl.请再说一遍n.原谅，饶恕，赦免The king pardoned the prisoner.君主赦免了那名囚犯。 fur n.皮毛，皮毛外套，人造毛A fur coat is very warm,but very expensive!皮毛外套很温暖，但也很昂贵。 jet n.喷气式飞机v.乘坐喷气式飞机Nowadays most long-distance travel is by jet plane.现在，大多数长途旅行都使用喷气式飞机。 bacterium n.细菌This kind of bacterium can cause a very dangerous disease.这种细菌能引发非常危险的疾病。 shoulder n.肩膀，肩部vt.肩负，承当The old man has pain in his shoulder.这位老年人肩膀疼。 polite adj.有礼貌的，客气的，文雅的The student is very polite to his teacher.那个学生对老师很有礼貌。 religious adj.虔诚的He is a religious believer,he goes to church every week.他是个虔诚的教徒，每周都会去教堂。 pupil n.小学生The pupils are walking to school.小学生们正在走路去学校。 seminar n.研讨会A teacher and some students are attending a math seminar.一名老师和学生们正在开教学研讨会。 sour adj.酸的The lemon has such a sour taste!柠檬真酸啊！ salute v.向…行举手礼，赞扬，赞颂n.致敬，欢迎The policeman salutes me as I walk by.当我走过时，这位警察向我行礼。 material n.材料，原料，资料adj.物质的，实体的Many different materials are needed for construction work.建造工程需要很多种不同的建筑材料。 pine n.松树v.（因死亡、离别等）难过，悲伤The pine tree on Huangshan is very famous.黄山的迎客松非常有名。 give up phr.放弃The girl has given up doing her homework on the laptop.那个女生放弃用电脑做作业了。 vacation n.休假，假期v.休假，度假The girl took a vacation on the beach.这个女孩在海边度假。 新的学习relay n.接力赛跑v.转播In a 400-meter relay,a runner passes the baton to the next person.在400米的接力比赛中，运动员将接力棒传给下一个人。 bean curd n.豆腐Bean curd is healthy and tasty.豆腐机既健康又美味。 editor n.编辑My editor always corrects my writing mistakes.我的编辑一直在改正我的拼写错误。 jam n.果酱v.（使）阻塞，使塞满I like eating the bread with sweet jam.我喜欢吃除了甜果酱的面包。 greet v.问候，招待This gentleman takes his hat off to greet people.这位绅士摘下他的帽子，向人们问好。 former adj.前任的，前者的，以前的n.创造者The first photograph is our former headmaster.第一张照片是我们前任校长。 cage n.笼，鸟笼v.关进（笼子）Get me out of this cage!Where’s the key?!把我从这笼子里面放出去！钥匙在哪儿？！ garlic n.大蒜Garlic makes any meal taste better.大蒜让所有菜肴更好吃了。 sentence n.句子v.判决，宣判Note the importance of this sentence.注意这个句子的重要性。 pilot n.飞行员adj.实验性的v.给…领航，驾驶Wow!The pilots in the movie look so cool!哇塞！这部电影里的飞行员好酷好帅啊！ mustard n.芥末adj.芥末色的I like to add some mustard on my sushi.我喜欢往寿司上加点芥末。 agriculture n.农业We depend on agriculture to give us food.我们依靠农业给我们提供食物。 against prep.反对，对（着），逆Only one person stood actively against him.只有一个人站在那主动地反对他。 cap n.帽子The policeman wears a blue cap.这个警察戴着蓝帽子。 plate n.盘子，板，片v.电镀I can put much food on this big plate.我可以放很多食物在这个大盘子里。 discovery n.发现，被发现的事物She makes a discovery in the field of flowers.她在研究花的领域里有了新的发现。 outline n.大纲，概要v.描绘，画出…的轮廓This outline of my invention should give you some idea of what I want.这张关于我的发明的大纲图应该会让你知道我想要什么。 zip code n.邮政编码You must write a zip code on the envelope before mailing a letter.寄信钱，你必须在信封上写上邮政编码。 lip n.嘴唇，唇状物Her lips are the most beautiful part of her face.她的嘴唇是她脸上最漂亮的部分。 weed n.杂草，野草The worker is cutting the weeds.工人正在除草。 vertical adj.垂直的n.垂直线，垂直面The boy found the only vertical tree in the woods.这个男孩找到了树林里唯一一颗垂直的树。 extraordinary adj.非同寻常的The teacher said my daughter has extraoidinary musical talent.老师说我女儿在音乐方面天赋异禀。 death n.死，死亡，灭亡The death of her father broke her heart.她父亲的死让她心碎。 tip n.小费v.给小费I paid $5 to the waiter for tip.我给了那个服务员5美元作为小费。 barber n.理发师，理发店I asked my barber to give me a new style this time.这一次我让我的理发师给我理一个新发型。 veal n.小牛肉My favorite meat is veal.我最爱吃的肉是小牛肉。 yoghurt n.酸奶Yoghurt tastes very delicious with cookies.酸奶和饼干一起吃很美味哟！ wounded adj.受伤的The wounded soldier goes to the doctor every day.这位负伤的士兵每天都去看医生。 pill n.药丸The woman took some pills when she was ill.这个女人生病了，就吃了一些药。 goal n.（进球）得分，目标，球门They finally cracked the defence and scored a goal.他们终于突破了防守，射进一球。 pure adj.纯净的，纯粹的，纯洁的The water seems so pure and clean.水看起来真纯净。 regulation n.法规，条例，规章The traffic police is introducing traffic rules and regulations to us.交警在向我们介绍交通法规。 Africa n.非洲Africa is home to some of the world’s oldest cultures.非洲是世界上一些最古老文明的故乡。 motherland n.祖国Everyone has their own motherland.每个人都有自己的祖国。 liberty n.自由The bird flew from the cage and got liberty.这只鸟飞出了鸟笼得到了自由。 irrigate v.灌溉，冲洗This machine can irrigate the field.这台机器可以灌溉田地。 accompany v.陪伴，为…伴奏（或伴唱）I always accompany my children to their school.我总是陪着我的小孩们去学校。 typist n.（尤指专职）打字员The typist is finishing her documents.打字员正在完成她的文件。 barrier n.障碍The road was closed by a barrier.这条路被一个路障封锁了。 abroad adv.到国外，在国外The happy couple traveled abroad and took photos together.这对幸福的夫妻出国旅游，并拍了照片。 biography n.传记文学，传记He likes reading the biography of famous people.他喜欢读名人传记。 voyage n.航海，航行v.航海The ship is on a voyage now.这艘船正在航行中。 besides prep.除…之外adv.而且，还有As the winner,I received lots of money besides the cup.作为胜利者，我除了得到了奖杯外，还获得了一大笔钱。 fiber n.纤维（物质）We can see the fibers of the rope under a magnifying glass.在放大镜下，我们能看见编成这条绳子的纤维。 roller n.滚柱，滚筒，滚轴Use the roller to paint the walls.用来滚筒来刷墙。 chew v.嚼，咀嚼n.嚼碎，咀嚼The boy is chewing the rice.他在咀嚼米饭。 headmistress n.女校长Our headmistress is giving us a speech.我们的女校长正在给我们演讲。 conventional adj.依照惯例的，依照传统的Although we can now pay online,some people still prefer the conventional method of cash.尽管我们现在可以线上支付了，部分人仍然喜欢传统的现金支付手段。 sweet adj.甜的，可爱的，美好的，芳香的n.糖果，甜食Most kids love sweet food such as candy,大多数小孩都喜欢吃甜食，比如说糖。 yourselves pron.你们自己，你们本人Help yourselves to some food.大家随便吃。 vast adj.辽阔的This vast desert looks impossible to pass.这片辽阔的沙漠看上去不可能穿过。 toast n.敬酒v.为…祝酒He held his glass and made a toast.他举杯祝酒。 cyclist n.骑脚踏车的人The cyclist was determined to win the race.这名车手决心赢得这场胜利。 department n.部门，部，系Our company consists of financial department, sales department,and technical department.我们的公司由财务部、销售部和技术部组成。 mass n.众多，群众v.聚集A mass of people are waiting.一大堆人在等待。 serious adj.认真的，严肃的He is always very serious while working.他工作时总是很认真。 emergency n.紧急情况It’s an emergency.Get her to the hospital now!情况紧急，即刻送她去医院！ absolute adj.完全的，绝对的Motion is absolute,while stillness is relative.运动是绝对的，静止是相对的。 tongue n.舌头vi.吹管音乐The boy sticks out his tongue to make a face to me.男孩伸出了舌头来对我做鬼脸。 instruct v.指导，通知My mom instructs me how to play golf.我妈妈教我怎么打高尔夫。 nylon n.尼龙，尼龙长袜The strings are made of nylon.这线是尼龙做的。 strange adj.奇怪的，陌生的I met a guy wearing strange clothes on the subway.我在地铁上遇到了一个衣着奇怪的男人。

entry.title: Better In Time
entry.content: 歌词 Yeah耶I know sometimes我知道有时候Things may make sense to you right now事情并不能如你所愿But hey, what’daddy always tell you但是嘿，,爸爸怎么跟你说来的？Straighten up little soldier挺起身来，小战士。Stiffen up that upper lip坚强些！What you crying about你哭什么？You got me听懂我说什么了吗？Hailie ,i know u miss you mom海莉(女儿名字），我知道你想你妈妈And i know u miss you dad when i’m gone也知道我离开的时候你想念爸爸But i tryin’to give you the life that i never had但是我正在努力给你一个我从来没有享受过的生活I can see your sad我看到你的悲伤Even when you smile even when you laught就算你微笑时，就算你大笑时I can see it in your eyes我可以从你眼里看到Deep inside you wanna cry你心里很想哭Cuz you’are scared因为你害怕I ain’there ?Daddy’s with you in your prayers可是我不是在这儿吗？只要你希望，爸爸就和你在一起No more cryin’ wipe them tears dadyy’ here不要再哭了，擦掉眼泪No more nightmares不再有噩梦We gonna pull together through it,we gon’do it我们一起度过长夜,我们可以做到Lainie’uncle’s crazy ain’t he,yeah叔叔挺疯狂的吧，嗯But he loves you girl and you better know it但是你要知道，他很爱你们。We’re all we got in this word我们都会明白一些道理When it spins when it swirls当世界旋转的时候，快速的旋转When it whirls when it thirls飞快的旋转，急速的旋转two little beautiful girls两个漂亮的小女孩Lookin’ puzzled,in a daze看得眼花缭乱I know it’s confusing you我知道这让你们很迷惑Dadyy’s always on the move爸爸总是不在家Mama’s always on the news妈妈总是出现在新闻上I try to keep you sheltered from it我一直试图遮掩不让你接触到But somehow it seems但是有时候The harder that i try to do that我越努力这么做，The more it做那么多Backfies on me就越事与愿违All the rhings,growin’up成长时遇到的一切As dadyy,dadyy had to see我是爸爸，爸爸必须去面对Dadyy don’t want you to see爸爸不想让你了解这些But you see just as much as he did但是你却知道得跟我一样多We did not plan it to be this way我们都不希望这样You mother and me你妈妈和我But things have got so bad between us有些事情已经使我们之间的感情恶化I don’t see us ever being togeher ever again我再也不会看到我们在一起Like we used to be like when we was teenagers就像我们年轻时候的那样But then of course但是当然Everything always happen for a reason总是事出有因I guess it was never meant to be我从没想过我们会变成现在这样But it’s just something然而这就是就是那些We have no control over我们没办法控制的东西And that’s what destiny is而这就是命运But no more worries但是，不用担心Rest your head and go to sleep躺下，睡觉吧Maybe one day we’ll wake up或许某天醒来And this will all just be a dream我们发现这一切只是一个梦Leona lewis那段：I couldn’t turn on the tv我不能打开电视Without something there to remind me不需要什么东西来提醒我As it all that easy一切都很简单?To just put aside your feelings就是将”我们”排除在你的感情之外If i’m dreaming如果我是在做梦Don’t wanna laugh我不想让它（hurt my feelings）（伤害我的感情）But that’s the path但它已经是过去（i believe it）（我相信它）And i know that time will heal it而且我知道, 时间会使它痊愈 You didn’t notice如果你没注意过Boy you mean everything你意味着一切（quickly i’m learning）（我很快认识到）Oooh to love again再爱一次（all i know is）（我都知道）I’m gon’ be ok我会过得很好Thought i couldn’t live without you只是不能没有你It’s gonna hurt when it heals too痊愈的同时也会痛Oooh yeah哦（it’ll all get better in time）（一切都会好起来）And even though i really love you尽管我是真的爱你I’m gonna smile cause i deserve too ooh我会微笑， 因为我值得（it’ll all get better in time）（一切都会好起来）pour out some liquor and i reminsce倒些酒，我开始回忆Cause through the drama喝一杯我仍可以继续I can always depend on my mama哦，我的妈妈And when it seems that i’m hopeless每当我看起来失望无助You say the words that你说些话Can get me back in focus来让我重燃希望When i was sick as a little kid当我病了，像个小孩To keep me happy there’s no limit to为了让我高兴起来，似乎被限制的所有事情The things you did你都做到And all my childhood memories所有那些童年岁月的回忆Are full of all the sweet things you did for me填满你给的甜蜜And even though i act craaazy甚至当我发狂I gotta thank the lord that you made me我都要感谢你让我找回自尊There are no words已经找不到词语，That can express how i feel可以表达我的感受You never kept a secret你从不掩饰Always stayed real你总是保持真实And i appreciate, how you raised me我感激你如此将我带大And all the extra love that you gave me这所有额外的你给我的爱I wish i could take the pain away我希望用它们将痛苦驱赶If you can make it through the night如果你可以这样出现在我人生的黑夜There’s a brighter day那将是个明亮的白昼Everything will be alright if ya hold on所有的一切都会好起来的，只要你坚持下去It’s a struggle everyday, gotta roll on每天都在挣扎，我们要继续And there’s no way i can pay you back而我没有任何的方式来回报你But my plan is to show you that i understand但是我的行动告诉你我知道了 You are appreciated你是如此的伟大 It’ll all get better in time在以后的时光里会越来越好

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190306
entry.content: 复习clap v.拍（手），鼓（掌）n.轻拍（以示热情招呼），拍手（喝彩），鼓掌（欢迎），善意的拍打In a show of support,they all began to clap their hands.为了表示支持，他们开始鼓掌。 evolution n.进化，演变This picture shows the evolution of humans over millions of years.这张图展示了百万年来人类的进化。 bounce vt.使弹起vi.弹起，蹦跳n.弹跳，弹力，活力You have to bounce the ball in basketball.打篮球得让球弹起来。 independence n.（国家的）独立，（人的）自立，独立America gained its independence from Britain in 1776!1776年，美国脱离英国取得独立。 yell v.叫喊I’ve never seen someone yelling so loud on the phone before!我从没见过谁对着电话那样咆哮。 fear v.害怕，担心n.顾虑，胆怯The little girl fears the injection.这个小女孩害怕打针。 undertake v.承担，承包I want everyone to know that you undertake this fishpond!我要让所有人都知道，这个鱼塘被你承包了！ stadium n.（周围有看台的）体育场，露天大型运动场This is one of the biggest football stadiums in the world.这是世界上最大的足球场之一。 straw n.吸管，稻草，麦秆Why do you need two straws for one drink?你一杯饮料要两根吸管来干嘛？ beg v.乞求，恳求，乞讨The homeless man was begging for some food and money on the street.这个无家可归的男人在大街上乞讨一些食物和钱。 occupy v.占领，占据，侵占，担任（职务），任职The little dog has occupied her heart.这只小狗占据了她的心。 bacon n.熏猪肉，培根I like to have bacon and eggs for my breakfast.早餐我想吃培根和蛋。 outspoken adj.直言的，坦率的Her outspoken remarks always reveal facts.她直言不讳的言语总是戳中现实。 struggle against phr.同…作斗争To get across the park,I had to struggle against the bad weather.为了穿过公园，我必须与恶劣的天气作斗争。 break off phr.折断，掰掉，突然停止，暂停，中断Let me break off a small piece of chocolate for you.让我掰一小块巧克力给你。 dormitory n.宿舍，学生宿舍，宿舍楼【美国英语】Look!This dormitory is so dirty!快看呀！这间宿舍好脏！ sideways adj.向侧面的adv.斜着地Please turn to the side – we want a sideways view.请往侧面转一下身，我们想要一个侧面照。 greedy adj.贪婪的，贪心的，贪吃的The greedy woman wanted more food from the pot before she’d even finished her bow!贪婪的她吃着碗里的，想着锅里的。 tourism n.旅游，旅游业Nowadays,the tourism industry is booming all around the world.现如今，世界各地的旅游业都在蓬勃发展。 dioxide n.二氧化碳Carbon dioxide is making our planet warmer.二氧化碳正在使地球升温。 beyond prep.超过，在能力、理解力之外，除…之外adv.更远处，更多，以后I couldn’t hit him as he was beyond my reach.我打不了他，因为我根本够不着他。 pregnant adj.怀孕的The pregnant woman is drinking water.这个怀孕的女人正在喝水。 heat n.高温，【物理学】热vt.给…加热Be careful of the heat from the fire!小心这堆火的高温！ component n.零件adj.组成的These are the components of a car.这些是一辆车的零部件。 permanent adj.永久的，持久的Her eyebrows are being made permanent.这位女士正在做永久纹眉。 smog n.烟雾There is too much smog in this big city.这个大城市里烟雾弥漫。 cordless adj.（电器）不用电线的A cordless mouse is convenient for using your computer.操作电脑时，无线鼠标很好用。 backache n.背痛Since I got an office job,my backache has gotten much worse.自从我得到一份办公室工作，我的背痛越来越严重。 geometry n.几何学，几何形状Geometry is the study dealing with different kinds of shapes.几何学是研究各种不同图形的学科。 tractor n.拖拉机，牵引车We use tractors to farm.我们用拖拉机来耕地。 adequate adj.充足的，充分的，足够的，尚可的，过得去的I have prepared an adequate amount of food for 5 people.我为五个人准备了充足的食物。 delicate adj.易碎的，易坏的，脆弱的Porcelain cups are very delicate,do not drop them!瓷杯易碎，小心掉落！ beast n.野兽The beast dances with the beauty.野兽与美女共舞。 pulse n.脉搏v.（使）跳动，搏动，震动，（感情等）洋溢，充满The doctor felt the patient’s pulse.医生给病人把了脉。 新的学习fit n.匹配，相配，合身v.适合adj.合适的They two are a perfect fit and I’m sure they are good friends!这两个人太搭了！它们肯定是好朋友！ insure v.为…投保，保险，买保险He insures the cars against traffic accidents.他为车投保了事故保险。 come off phr.从…掉下，发生，举行，（计划）实现She looks surprised when her facial mask comes off her face.她面膜从脸上掉下来时她被吓了一跳。 savage n.野蛮人，粗鲁的人adj.凶猛的，猛烈的v.（狗等）乱咬Their wordy conversation made me feel like a total savage!他们文邹邹的对话让我觉得自己完全就像个野人！ actual adj.实际的，真实的The actual fact is that crocodiles walk underwater instead of swimming.事实上，鳄鱼在水下是靠走而不是游泳。 master n.主人adj.精通的，主要的v.掌握，精通The dog and its master are close to each other.这条狗和他的主人很亲密。 glad adj.高兴的I am very glad to hear from my mother.我很高兴收到母亲的来信。 fridge n.电冰箱I opened the fridge to get some food.我打开冰箱，拿点食物。 represent v.代表，阐明This hand gesture represents love.这个手势代表了爱。 modest adj.谦虚的，谦逊的These two businessmen may be rich,but they’re still very modest!这两位企业家也许非常富有，但他们仍然很谦虚！ ox n.牛，公牛The strong ox is angry now.这头强壮的公牛现在很生气。 nut n.坚果Yoghurt goes well with mixed nuts.酸奶和混合坚果很配。 conductor n.指挥，售票员The conductor is the leader of the band.指挥使乐队的老大。 well-known adj.有名的，著名的This is a well-known painting.这幅画世界闻名。 rescue v.营救，援救n.营救，救援The fireman rescued the little boy from the fire.消防员把小男孩从火中救了出来。 fee n.费用，酬金He was shocked by the huge amount of hidden fees behind such a haircut.他被这个发型背后的巨额隐形费用惊呆了。 autonomous adj.自动驾驶的，自治的，独立自主的The man is relaxing,reading a book in his autonomous car.这个男人正在他的自动驾驶汽车中悠闲地读书。 broad adj.宽的，宽阔的，广阔的This road is broad enough for many cars to drive on.这条路足够宽，可以容纳很多车行驶。 accomplish v.完成，做到，实现I have accomplished my tasks on schedule.我已经完成了计划上的任务。 neighbourhood n.社区I live in a friendly neighbourhood where everyone knows each other.我住在一个友好的社区里，那里每个人都相互认识。 organ n.器官Every organ plays an important role in our body.每一个器官在我们身体中都扮演着重要的角色。 ceremony n.典礼，仪式The student was awarded his certificare during the graduation ceremony.毕业生在毕业典礼上接受了他的毕业证书。 inventor n.发明家Thanks to the inventor of the telephone,we can talk anytime anywhere.多亏了电话的发明者，我们才能随时随地地聊天。 draft n.草稿v.起草This is just the draft design of a building.这只是建筑的草图设计。 patience n.耐心，忍耐Fishing demands a great deal of patience.钓鱼需要极大的耐心。 candidate n.（官职、获奖资格等的）候选人The candidate are presenting the speeches for the election.候选人正在为选举发表演说。 disturb v.打扰，妨碍，使烦恼His snoring really disturbs me at night!晚上，他的呼噜声真的很打扰我！ merchant n.商人，批发商The merchant checks the quality of his produce.商人在检查农产品质量。 construct v.建造，构筑The workers are constructing a tall building.工人们正在建造一座高楼。 dismiss v.开除，解散，摒除，不再考虑The boss was angry and dismissed the staff.老板很生气，并且开除了那个职工。 feed v.喂（养），吃饲料My mother would feed me when I was hungry.我饿的时候妈妈会喂我。 rapid adj.迅速的，急促的The rabbit ran at a rapid speed.那只兔子飞快的跑了。 humor n.幽默，诙谐The show is full of humor,hahaha!这个节目太幽默了，哈哈哈！ ridiculous adj.可笑的，荒谬的She looks ridiculous wearing this dress when walking in the street.她穿着这件衣服上街，看上去太可笑了。 fluency n.流利，流畅He speaks with perfect fluency.他说话极其流利。 yawn v.打哈欠n.乏味或枯燥的事物v.打着哈欠说The cat yawned lying on the grass.So cute!猫咪躺在草地上打哈欠。太可爱了！ boycott n.抵制vt.抵制The office workers are putting up a boycott.员工们在举行抗议活动。 certificate n.合格证书，文凭，证明，证明书I got my graduation certificate after finishing college.在完成大学教育后，我获得了毕业证书。 hug v.拥抱，抱紧n.拥抱The happy couple hug in front of their new home.这对开心的夫妇相拥在他们的新房子前。 pardon v.原谅，宽恕excl.请再说一遍n.原谅，饶恕，赦免The king pardoned the prisoner.君主赦免了那名囚犯。 fur n.毛皮，毛皮外套，人造毛A fur coat is very warm,but very expensive!皮毛外套很暖和，但也很昂贵。 jet n.喷气式飞机v.乘坐喷气式飞机Nowadays most long-distance travel is by jet plane.现在，大多数长途旅行都是用喷气式飞机。 bacterium n.细菌This kind of bacterium can cause a very dangerous disease.这种细菌能引发非常危险的疾病。 shoulder n.肩膀，肩部vt.肩负，承当The old man has pain in his shoulder.这位老年人肩膀疼。 polite adj.有礼貌的，客气的，文雅的The student is very polite to his teacher.那个学生对老师很有礼貌。 religious adj.虔诚的He is a religious believer,he goes to church every week.他是个虔诚的教徒，每周都会去教堂。 pupil n.小学生The pupils are walking to school.小学生们正在走路去学校。 outcome n.结果，后果The final outcome of the football game is 0:0.这场足球比赛的最后结果是0:0. unite v.团结，联合，统一，合并Let’s unite as one to defeat our common enemy.让我们齐心协力，击败共同的敌人。 seminar n.研讨会A teacher and some students are attending a math seminar.一名老师和学生们正在开数学研讨会。 sour adj.酸的The lemon has such a sour taste!柠檬真酸啊！ salute v.向…行举手礼，赞扬，赞颂n.致敬，欢迎The policeman salutes me as I walk by.当我走过时，这位警察向我行礼。 material n.材料，原料，资料adj.物质的，实体的Many different materials are needed for construction work.建造工程需要很多种不同的建筑材料。 pine n.松树v.（因死亡、离别等）难过，悲伤The pine tree on Huangshan is very famous.黄山的迎客松非常有名。 vacation n.休假，假期v.休假，度假The girl took a vacation on the beach.这个女孩在海边度假。

entry.title: 百词斩高中20190305
